story:
IALAC WORLD 

"I Am Lovable and Capable World" empowering young women & elevating positivity through affirmation-art-apparel designed by young artists. 

       

GIVING: 
IALAC WORLD will give as much as 30% of net proceeds back to the arts in the form of grants for visual and performing arts.  We will donate 5% of gross proceeds from this campaign towards performing arts scholarships.          
                                   
At IALAC WORLD our mission is to elevate positive thinking and empower young women around the world to feel good about themselves. We are doing this by positively connecting girls through affirmation-art-apparel and social media. Each of our pieces is uniquely designed with art and letter art by young artists and shouts out a positive affirmation. Help support girl empowerment and drive the success of our Indiegogo crowd funding campaign by shopping our apparel and accessories here. Shop now and we will donate 5% of gross proceeds towards performing arts scholarships. 

How to fund and get a great perk:
1.  Find your favorite IALAC WORLD product pictured below.
2. Then go to the perks column on the right and select your perk. Be sure to tell us what size you would like in the message section at the time of payment.  
4. Pay for your perk using credit, debit or PayPal. 
5. Share your support of our campaign by clicking one of the social media links. 
6. You will receive your product by November 2015 if not sooner depending on current availability. 


OUR GRATITUDE PERKS

There is no greater way to receive a gift other than to reciprocate with gratitude. 

Gratitude Collection

Letter art by Alyssa of San Diego, CA

GRATITUDE COFFEE MUG

GRATITUDE FOLDED NOTECARDS - It's not joy that makes me grateful, it's gratitude that makes me joyful.

RAW EDGE BLACK GRATITUDE TEE

RAW EDGE BLACK GRATITUD ES MI ACTITUD TEE

RANCER BACK GREY GRATITUDE TANK 

FAVORITE SOFT WHITE GRATITUDE TEE

SUPER COMFY BLACK GRATITUDE TUNIC TEE


BLACK CANVAS DUFFLE BAG

Art by Emily Tate

I AM THE CHANGE HEATHER GREY DECONSTRUCTED SWEATSHIRT
Artwork by Emily of Los Angeles; Letter art by Nuria of Barcelona, Spain

Art by Devina


I AM FREE TO LIVE MY DREAMS CHARCOAL GREY CROPPED HOODIE 
Artwork by Devina of Jakarta, Indonesia; Letter art by Alyssa of San Diego, CA


I AM FREE TO LIVE MY DREAMS CANVAS SATCHEL


I AM LOVABLE AND CAPABLE SWEETHEART ROSE TEE FOR GIRLS (SIZE 4-12)

Meet artist Emily Tate wearing her I am lovable and capable Sweetheart Rose Tee


Meet my daughter Pilar wearing her I AM LOVABLE AND CAPABLE SWEET AND SASSY QUINCY TEE FOR GIRLS (SIZE 4-12)

Artwork by Emily Tate of Los Angeles



I AM LOVABLE AND CAPABLE WRISTBANDS


Imagine a world where girls are free from negative messaging and proud of their unique contributions. How girls see themselves is vital to their well-being and success. We believe that exposing girls to positive affirmations about themselves is critical to building self-esteem and ultimately a joyful, fulfilling life. 'Words are powerful and what girls say about themselves can change their course.' (IALAC WORLD artist Rachel)  

It is well known that girls around the world suffer from low self-esteem. The statistics that prove this point are staggering.  
  • Once low self-esteem is formed negative messages permeate every thought and result in self-defeating behavior.
  • Of girls ages 15-17, 70% avoid normal daily activities as a result of feeling badly about their looks.
  • In college aged girls, 80% claim that their poor body image is linked to the negative remarks made by friends and family.
  • 75% of girls with low self-esteem versus 25% of girls with high self esteem engage in negative activities like cutting, bullying, smoking, drinking and disordered eating. 
  • 7 in 10 girls believe that they are not good enough or don't measure up in some way, including looks, performance in school and relationships with friends and family. 

From IALAC WORLD Founder Charmaine Winslow:

IALAC WORLD was conceived from my own passion to elevate positive thinking and empower not only my own kids, but young women around the globe with tools needed to help them be confident and strong. 

I made a commitment to follow my passion.  I asked myself, what if I create a company in which its sole purpose is to empower young women by showcasing their own art and affirmations on really cool clothing and accessories?  I knew immediately that my efforts would draw upon the acronym, IALAC (I Am Loveable and Capable), which was coined 25 years ago by world-renowned professor of education, Dr. Sidney B. Simon.  With my sights firmly set, IALAC WORLD was conceived. 

IALAC WORLD will highlight the talents of young, out-of-the-box thinkers from around the world who specialize in fashion design, visual arts, photography, videography and social media.  These young artists will help to coalesce a movement of positivity and self-affirmation that is sorely lacking in today’s society. Many tee-shirt and accessory companies are marketing messages of insolence:  “You Can’t Sit With Us,” “Live Fast, Die Young,” and “Good Girl Gone Bad” just to name a few.  IALAC WORLD will cut from the pack and fill the void that exists in the apparel market.  Our tees are inspiring AND creative AND catchy AND cool! Gratitude is My Attitude, I Am the Change I See in the World, and I am Free to Live My Dreams – just to name a few.

Last but not least, I am equally as passionate about reaping what I sow.  IALAC WORLD will be a giving company.  Our efforts will prioritize giving visual and performing arts grants to less fortunate children around the globe who want to pursue their own artistic dreams and talents.

How do we work? 

Girls love clothing and accessories. We will satisfy their desire for more than just trendy fashion but rather clothing and accessories that make them feel good about themselves while appealing to a greater cause.

  • Our hip apparel is sourced from manufacturers in Los Angeles that treat their employees with dignity; thus, the name IALAC WORLD Dignity Threads.  
  • Young artists from around the globe submit artwork via our website or social media to be selected for the IALAC WORLD clothing and accessory line.
  • We then print positive affirmations and artwork designed by young artists on trendy shirts, pants, jackets, bags and accessories that will appeal to young women based on beta market research done amongst young women.
  • Girls connect with IALAC WORLD's positivity via interactive social media platforms and our website to build brand awareness through advocate and influencer marketing. The power of positive peer influence cannot be underestimated and for this reason IALAC WORLD will disseminate its messaging to  young women leveraging their ability to positively influence themselves and their peers.
  • The outcome…girls elevate positivity by wearing their affirmation-art-apparel and accessories like a badge of honor to empower not only themselves but girls around them.

The response to the IALAC WORLD project has been phenomenal at the grass roots level but that’s not enough! In order to bring this project to life, making it possible to  positively impact  hundreds of thousands of girls around the world, we need your help funding this Indiegogo campaign. Help IALAC WORLD kick off this campaign to raise at least $15K of seed money and be the first to receive IALAC WORLD's affirmation art tees, hoodies, bags, coffee mugs and more... 

HOW WILL THE FUNDS YOU CONTRIBUTE HELP BUILD THE IALAC WORLD BRAND AND EMPOWER YOUNG WOMEN?

In order to build brand awareness and positively connect girls around the world, we need to hire young creative people who will build a public relations campaign, interactive social media platforms and an outstanding website. These platforms will drive young women and their parents to our interactive social networks giving girls the opportunity to use their power of positive influence as well as share positive exchanges such as " I AM SHOUT OUTS" and affirmation-art that will ultimately be used to inspire the IALAC WORLD clothing line.  

If we reach $100K, we will be able to allocate funds towards partnering with a vertical manufacturer in LA. This will give us greater control over the cost of our apparel while at the same time staying true to being socially responsible. It will also enable us to make more hip designs that girls love which is vital in a rapidly changing junior apparel market.  

IALAC WORLD will give back to the arts by contributing as much as 30% of profits in the form of grants for visual and performing arts to young people in less fortunate communities. In addition to art submissions from young artists around the world, our goal is to connect with talented artists involved with youth organization such as Make A Wish Foundation®, St. Jude Children's Hospital, Christopher's Haven™ and children's cancer networks to be featured on our clothes. The recipient organization will, in turn, get 30% of net proceeds from the sale of items with this artwork.

How can you help?

Help us make a difference by merging art and positivity on socially responsible  apparel and accessories with a purpose to empower and elevate positivity amongst young women around the world. Give the gift of art to youth in less fortunate communities. If youbelieve in the importance of empowering young women and in the impact  the IALAC WORLD project will have with elevating positivity, please share this link with your friends as well as family and pre-order your first IALAC WORLD product  today! We appreciate all levels of support and recognize that even if you don't fund this campaign there is great value in sharing this link on Facebook, twitter and email. 

IALAC WORLD has many great perks to choose from. Make it a special gift to yourself or a loved one.

Thank You!! 

Charmaine Winslow, Founder of IALAC WORLD

IALAC WORLD "I Am Lovable and Capable World" empowering young women & elevating positivity through affirmation-art-apparel designed by young artists.        GIVING: 
IALAC WORLD will give as much as 30% of net proceeds back to the arts in the form of grants for visual and performing arts.  We will donate 5% of gross proceeds from this campaign towards performing arts scholarships.          

                                   

At IALAC WORLD our mission is to elevate positive thinking and empower young women around the world to feel good about themselves. We are doing this by positively connecting girls through affirmation-art-apparel and social media. Each of our pieces is uniquely designed with art and letter art by young artists and shouts out a positive affirmation. Help support girl empowerment and drive the success of our Indiegogo crowd funding campaign by shopping our apparel and accessories here. Shop now and we will donate 5% of gross proceeds towards performing arts scholarships. 
How to fund and get a great perk:1.  Find your favorite IALAC WORLD product pictured below.2. Then go to the perks column on the right and select your perk. Be sure to tell us what size you would like in the message section at the time of payment.  4. Pay for your perk using credit, debit or PayPal. 5. Share your support of our campaign by clicking one of the social media links. 6. You will receive your product by November 2015 if not sooner depending on current availability. 


OUR GRATITUDE PERKS

There is no greater way to receive a gift other than to reciprocate with gratitude.

BLACK CANVAS DUFFLE BAG

I AM THE CHANGE HEATHER GREY DECONSTRUCTED SWEATSHIRT

Art by Devina

story:
Saintly Bags




Saintly Bags is a travel & fashion lifestyle brand. Designers of sumptuous, customizable, and hand-made leather products, Saintly aims to beautify and simplify your travel lifestyle.

Steeped in New York City heritage, Saintly’s NYC hand-production studios achieve the beautiful designs, exacting specifications, and tremendous build quality you would expect of a world class brand from such a world class city.

Click here to
win a Saintly Laptop Portfolio!



           

The All-American Weekender

The All-American is the first ever fully-customizable leather weekender. With options ranging in size, shoe and laptop pockets, leather, lining, hardware, and much more, you can design this gorgeous bag even more unique to your lifestyle.

All you have to do right now is:

1) Select the Flagship All-American
- or scroll lower and -
2) customize your own from scratch!

The Flagship All-American

We've pre-customized for you our Flagship design. This is a one-click purchase, but you can select monogramming as a $40 add-on at checkout.

Indiegogo Perk - $770
( Website - $1,145 )





The Customizable All-American

Draw inspiration from these beautiful designs, 
and customize your own bag from scratch!

Indiegogo Perk - $675
( Website - $1,050 )

Configuration Options
Laptop Pocket - $35
Shoe Pocket - $60
Monogramming - $40


After your purchase, you'll make your materials selections
(at no additional cost) on the Saintly Bags website.


Bison Scotch | Brown Lining | Antique Hardware



Longhorn British Tan leather  |  White lining  |  Antique hardware  | White zipper trim


Bison Red leather  |  Green lining  |  Brass hardware


Longhorn Black leather  |  Red lining  |  Silver hardware  | White zipper trim

Longhorn British Tan leather  |  White lining  |  Silver hardware  | White zipper trim



Bison Chocolate leather  |  Denim Blue lining  |  Antique hardware

Longhorn Mahogany leather  |  Stars & Stripes lining  |  Antique hardware



Longhorn Mahogany leather  |  Camo lining  |  Antique hardware


Features &
Customization Options


Size Edition

One Night Stand (left)   |   Weekend Fling (right)



  • The larger Weekend Fling is ideal for a long weekend and can handle 5-7 day trips with ease. Fold your suit flat on the bottom and rest your shoe pockets on it to keep it crisp.
  • The compact One Night Stand comfortably gets you through an overnight or 2-day trip, and compliments a rolling carry-on for much longer ones (note the handle attachment strap on the left of the red bag).  It also makes a great daily bag to carry your laptop, gym clothes, and shoes.




Laptop Pocket


This neoprene lined pocket protects your laptop, chargers, and magazines from shock and water.  It provides easy access at all times, making airport security an absolute breeze.  * The Weekend Fling’s Laptop Pocket can hold up to a 15″ laptop and some newer 17″ laptops. The One Night Stand comfortably fits tablets and 13″ laptops (not exceeding 9″ height).

          

Shoe Pockets



Placed on the ends of the bag, these pockets each hold up to 2 pairs of shoes, depending on size. Conveniently doubling as laundry pockets, they create separation between worn and fresh apparel. As they're soft, they collapse when empty for maximum space in the main compartment. You can select 1 or 2 pockets.

Quick Access Pocket

Drop your cell phone, wallet, passport and headphones into this pocket for convenient access and a safe, magnetically enclosed storage.



Leathers

Select from 9 gorgeous leathers in 3 lines, varying in tone, texture, & character.



Florentine is a very unique and charismatic cowhide leather from Italy. It will lighten slightly with time and gain character very quickly. It only comes in one color, a rich chocolate with some burgundy and purple hues. It is the lightest weight leather we offer.

Bison is a medium weight water buffalo leather coming from Italy. Because of its protective coat and finer grain, it scratches and wears the least of our leather offerings. It is available in Scotch, Terra Cotta, Chestnut, Chocolate, and Red.

Longhorn is a beefier and heavier cowhide coming from Brazil. As the leather is stitched and worked, its hue lightens slightly, giving it a worn character. It has a heavier grain and lighter protective coat, so it will wear in quickly. It is available in Black, Mahogany, and British Tan.



Duck Cotton Lining

Choose from a variety of patterns and colors, and protect your gear in style, like no other bag does.



Solid Brass Hardware & Zippers


Select from nickel, silver, brass, or antique, and we’ll match your hardware and zippers to your personal style.



Customizable Zipper Trim




We use the finest bag zipper* in the world, Lampo, and this allows us to provide you even more customization. Normally, we match your zipper’s teeth to your hardware selection and blend the zipper fabric to your leather selection. However, you can opt for another zipper fabric for a unique offset and pop.  

* Lampo is the choice of Prada, Gucci, Diesel, Tod’s, Bally, Zegna, Chanel, Burberry, Versace, Belstaff, and now Saintly.


Customizable Stitching


While normally blended to your leather selection, you can opt for an alternate stitching for a finer detail.


           

Monogramming




For that final individual touch, monogram up to 4 letters on the handle of your All-American. This is the most visible area of the bag to you as the owner, and every time you pick up your bag, you will be reminded of how unique it is to your individual style.                          

 

Customer Service


Have customization or other questions?
Contact us and we'll gladly help!

(844) STLY-NYC
Info@SaintlyBags.com

Play with our digital customizer
and discover your style!



Our Pioneer Customers Rave About Us...

Soft, smooth, and beautiful!  
- Comedian, Maz Jobrani

This is not only the nicest bag I have ever owned, but also the the nicest bag I've ever seen!  
- Paula's husband

These bags are HOT! So unique and well-made. They make the best gift. Jared absolutely digs his and uses it all the time!  
- Nora Cohen

I couldn't be happier with my Saintly All American. I have been searching for the perfect bag for years, As an avid traveler, a self proclaimed adventure capitalist, I needed something that would last, that looked great, and most importantly, something personal. All my experiences, all my travels, carry a deep meaning to me. It was extremely important that I had more than just a bag. I wanted something unique. When I first came across Saintly, I knew I found exactly what I was looking for. The attention to detail, the story behind the brand, the ability to completely customize my new travel companion made the experience that much more greater. I will carry my All American proudly with me on all my travels, spreading the ideals and values of the brand I've grown so fond of. Life is adventure. Be prepared.  
- Mike Rutledge

I do many 3 and 4 day trips all over the US and Europe for work and personal.  My Saintly custom bag is awesome and I get many compliments on it.  It's a perfect compliment with a suite and tie or jeans and t-shirt for travel!  
- Kevin Adams

I ordered the Weekender edition in black with burnt orange interior and nickel hardware with rush delivery as I needed it before some upcoming travel. The bag turned out just as I ordered and right on time. The quality of this bag is amazing – definitely worth the money – and something you would see at twice the price. The fact that I was able to customize it to my specifics was great. Don’t hesitate – get one now, you won’t regret it. Customer service was great too – I had confirmation and follow-up almost immediately.  
- Tom Schager

I purchased a bag for my husband, knowing that he would love the high quality leather.  The added bonus of being able to customize and add pockets was a  huge selling point because he travels a lot and hates having his shoes and dirty clothes in the same compartment as his clean clothes. When the bag arrived, the quality of the craftsmanship far exceeded our expectations because it was obvious that a great deal of time and attention went into constructing the bag.  And the fact that it is made in NYC as opposed to a far away place with questionable labor practices makes me proud to own such a unique, stylish bag. Thank you Saintly for this one-of-a kind bag! Can't wait to get one for myself.  
- Susan Payrovi

Truly a piece of art – harkens back to the days when travel was both elegant and sophisticated.  Durable enough to replace my long-haul business luggage,  stylish enough to bring to any 5-star resort or beach bungalow.  Looks better with each passing mile…  
- Drew Kelley

Happy to be one of the early contributors to the success of Saintly Bags! I travel extensively for both business and pleasure, and more often than not, someone make a comment in an airport or hotel about how handsome the bag is.  For me, however, the beauty is far from skin deep, as the bag has demonstrated that it can take a beating despite my best efforts to treat it kindly. We plan on ordering the Weekender size bag in the near future.  -
- Brian Faudoa


Laptop Portfolio

Saintly’s newly launched Laptop Portfolio is a perfect compliment to your All-American Weekender, teaming up to beautify and streamline your travel lifestyle.  Customizable it to match your bag or any other design.

Indiegogo Perk - $150
(Retail - $250)

Click here to
win a Saintly Laptop Portfolio!


Here are some of the portfolio's brilliant features:

  • Thin and sleek profile for a clean appearance
  • TSA Checkpoint Friendly - no need to pull the laptop out!
  • Magazine pocket
  • Leather business card holder in front of magazine pocket
  • Saintly embossed logo to indicate which side is up
  • End-opening zippers allow you to remove your laptop without fully opening
  • Access your charger from the opposite end-opening zipper
  • Monogramming available on the business card holder
  • Hiding handles
  • Fits perfectly into the laptop pocket of the All-American, Weekend Fling size
  • Customizable to match your All-American Weekender, or any other design





Your trip through airport security will soon be an absolute breeze. Our laptop portfolio fits TSA's Checkpoint Friendly requirements, meaning all you have to do is pull the portfolio out and lay it flat...no need to pull the laptop out!





Leather Valet


Saintly introduces its Leather Valet so you can keep your essentials together, and in style! This beautiful tray is a 6"x6" tray on it's inner edges, and 9"x9" from its outer corners.  It is stamped with the exclusive Saintly logo.

Indiegogo Perk - $40
(Retail - $60)

While normally blended to your leather selection, you can
opt for an alternate stitching for a finer detail.
           MonogrammingFor that
final individual touch, monogram up to 4 letters on the handle of your
All-American. This is the most visible area of the bag to you as the owner, and
every time you pick up your bag, you will be reminded of how unique it is to
your individual style.                            Customer ServiceHave customization or other questions?Contact us and we'll gladly help!(844) STLY-NYCInfo@SaintlyBags.comPlay with our digital customizerand discover your style!
Our Pioneer Customers Rave About Us...
Soft, smooth, and beautiful!  - Comedian, Maz JobraniThis is not only the nicest bag I have ever owned, but also the the nicest bag I've ever seen!  - Paula's husbandThese bags are HOT! So unique and well-made. They make the best gift. Jared absolutely digs his and uses it all the time!   - Nora CohenI couldn't be happier with my Saintly All American. I have been searching for the perfect bag for years, As an avid traveler, a self proclaimed adventure capitalist, I needed something that would last, that looked great, and most importantly, something personal. All my experiences, all my travels, carry a deep meaning to me. It was extremely important that I had more than just a bag. I wanted something unique. When I first came across Saintly, I knew I found exactly what I was looking for. The attention to detail, the story behind the brand, the ability to completely customize my new travel companion made the experience that much more greater. I will carry my All American proudly with me on all my travels, spreading the ideals and values of the brand I've grown so fond of. Life is adventure. Be prepared.  - Mike RutledgeI do many 3 and 4 day trips all over the US and Europe for work and personal.  My Saintly custom bag is awesome and I get many compliments on it.  It's a perfect compliment with a suite and tie or jeans and t-shirt for travel!   - Kevin AdamsI ordered the Weekender edition in black with burnt orange interior and nickel hardware with rush delivery as I needed it before some upcoming travel. The bag turned out just as I ordered and right on time. The quality of this bag is amazing – definitely worth the money – and something you would see at twice the price. The fact that I was able to customize it to my specifics was great. Don’t hesitate – get one now, you won’t regret it. Customer service was great too – I had confirmation and follow-up almost immediately.   - Tom SchagerI purchased a bag for my husband, knowing that he would love the high quality leather.  The added bonus of being able to customize and add pockets was a  huge selling point because he travels a lot and hates having his shoes and dirty clothes in the same compartment as his clean clothes. When the bag arrived, the quality of the craftsmanship far exceeded our expectations because it was obvious that a great deal of time and attention went into constructing the bag.  And the fact that it is made in NYC as opposed to a far away place with questionable labor practices makes me proud to own such a unique, stylish bag. Thank you Saintly for this one-of-a kind bag! Can't wait to get one for myself.  - Susan PayroviTruly a piece of art – harkens back to the days when travel was both elegant and sophisticated.  Durable enough to replace my long-haul business luggage,  stylish enough to bring to any 5-star resort or beach bungalow.  Looks better with each passing mile…   - Drew KelleyHappy to be one of the early contributors to the success of Saintly Bags! I travel extensively for both business and pleasure, and more often than not, someone make a comment in an airport or hotel about how handsome the bag is.  For me, however, the beauty is far from skin deep, as the bag has demonstrated that it can take a beating despite my best efforts to treat it kindly. We plan on ordering the Weekender size bag in the near future.  -- Brian Faudoa

story:
Dear Friends -

The team who are developing The Soul & Science of Caregiving and the staff of the Sacred Art of Living Center are extremely grateful for your contributions to our Soul & Science Indiegogo campaign. Reaching 34% of our goal will allow us to continue the work we have set out to do.  Your generous financial support and your faith in our project are both a blessing as we make strides to bring this deep soul work to new audiences all over the world.  To learn more about the project and its development, go to:  www.soulandscience.org. 

 

Richard Groves and the Soul & Science Team 

 

 

 

Soul & Science re-connects the soul and role of caregivers by offering support to both the technical skills and the deeply human dimensions of the care-giving vocation.

 

 What is Soul & Science™?

Soul & Science embraces a philosophy that believes people are much more than just their physical bodies, and that the choices they make while dealing with devastating illness and aging should be based both on the latest medical expertise as well as the art of what brings hope, meaning and connection to one’s deepest priorities.  Soul & Science introduces a unique set of teachings, programs and tools based on 20+ years of research to reduce the stress and trauma which is present in the daily lives of caregivers.

Soul & Science for Caregivers provides easy-to-access learning and support through a Web Portal and a series of specialized Mobile Apps.  Timely topics will become instantly available on a daily basis through mobile devices like your iPhone, iPad and Android devices. Soul & Science is the first program of its kind to interact with Apple’s HealthKit and Google Fit personal healthcare frameworks to enable  a unique and holistic approach to each individual Caregiver's wellness.

Your tax deductible donations will be used to produce a series of high quality video lessons and also to build out the software programming necessary to make Soul & Science accessible to millions of Caregivers around the world.
 

 

 

The number of caregivers needed to adequately support our aging populations far exceeds current and projected resources, while caregiver trauma and stress continues to take it's burdensome toll.

Soul & Science offers a holistic and pragmatic solution for…

1)  Supporting the well-being of our existing health care professionals and,

2)  Offering affordable and valuable resources for the millions of home based caregivers who thoughtfully sacrifice daily for their loved ones.

 

Leading educators and inspirational speakers will be featured on video learning sessions called “Take 5 for Caregivers.”  These video segments make it easy for patients, caregivers and their health providers to access information and inspiration when and where it is needed regarding timely critical issues and concerns.  For caregivers wanting deeper study and research, the same website will also provide advanced clinical skills and continuing education.

When care providers, and those they care for, tap into the wisdom and meaning that manifests from Soul & Science, the result is significantly decreased stress, better symptom management and enhanced quality of living.  After watching the sample video segments on this site, please feel free to contact us with questions about how to participate in this exciting new vision for health care education and support.  Our Soul & Science team is eager to help you and your organizations become part of this first-of-its-kind transformational learning experience!
 

 

 

 

 

 

REASONS TO SUPPORT SOUL & SCIENCE™…

Soul & Science is PROVEN

Lessons will be created based on twenty+ years of experience in a wide variety of health care venues.  Video based teachings will be created through the Sacred Art of Living Center with an international reputation of highly acclaimed education and training programs.  More than 20,000 health care providers from North America, Europe and Asia have completed the award-winning Sacred Art of Living & Dying series that integrates history, quantum science, in depth psychology and cultural diversity.

 

"Sacred Art of Living has a reputation for consistently producing world-class education programs…"

–Ira Byock, MD

 

Soul & Science is CONVENIENT

Information is only a click away, when you need and where you need it.  Video and print components will be available through almost any portable electronic device using simple MOBILE APPS and a WEB PORTAL.  Information is easily updated and also shared interactively between caregivers, family members and care receivers.

"Our stories are just data with soul."

–Brene Brown

 

Soul & Science is TIMELY

There is a growing movement on the part of both health care consumers and research institutions to bridge the gap between science and technology AND the art and soul of care-giving.  Soul & Science is on the cutting edge of a more integrated science that is "measuring the immeasurable" and supporting a whole person approach to healing and wellness.

"We no longer have to make a false choice between science and soul. We are creating a space where caregivers are discovering new horizons for what it means to be well"

-Richard Groves

 

Soul & Science creates COMMUNITY

Every Soul & Science lesson for caregivers is part of a larger body of work.  Video components will be integrated into a complete program series for deeper study and research.  Social Media forums will enable caregivers and care receivers alike to network with others around important topics for mutual support and learning. 

"Rejoining soul and role requires a rare but real form of community."

–Dr. Parker Palmer

 

 


Soul & Science EMPOWERS people

When people face serious or long-term illness we believe that there are important choices based on emerging best practices as well as the experience of others who have faced similar situations.  Soul & Science believes that knowledge is power.  By listening to leading voices in the health care community that include physicians, nurses, aides, social workers, chaplains and community health workers – patients and their loved ones can consider unmet needs and options that are sometimes overlooked when the focus has been primarily on the biology of illness.

"It is more important to know what sort of person has a disease than to know what sort of disease a person has"

–Hippocrates

SOUL & SCIENCE: A CREATIVE APPROACH FOR ON-GOING LEARNING

An ingenious aspect of Soul & Science is the fact that each Take Five For Caregivers video stands alone as a story and lesson that can be easily shared with family caregivers through a Smart Phone App, YouTube channel and Social Media sites.  However, the same video lessons can also be a portal for deeper study and clinical application as it is only one component of an entire program series.   

 
After watching this video, please click the following link to learn more  and view sample sessions and program materials at   www.SoulandScience.org
 
Eternal Flame Glass Sculpture

Produced by Bend Cloud
BendCloud.com

story:
Short Summary

We are a group of friends with complementary skills. We have many years of experience in the fashion industry as well as a strong business background.

We are fashion lovers who also love to save money, this led us to the invention of the TieBow Clip!

TieBow Clip, patent pending, is the 1st and only universal accessory item that turns any necktie into a bow tie in seconds! Think about all of the ties that are just hanging in your closet that can be instantly re-purposed.

Bow ties are not only for formal occasions, they can be used to add a special touch of style. Trendy, formal, casual, edgy, for kids, costumes and don't forget your pet. 

Create endless varieties of looks with one Tiebow Clip.

* Tuxedos, Caterers, Airline Personal, Concierge Services, Boutiques.

*Entertainers, Uniform Companies, Church Choirs, Hotels, Pets and Kids.

 Tiebow Clip gives anyone a fast and inexpensive option when having to dress up to change the mood for any occasion.

What We Need & What You Get

We funded most of this project by using our own resources.There was cost in mold creation/invention and patent fees. 

The money raised will mostly further marketing efforts including trade shows, sales representatives; monies will also be used to secure additional product in order to reduce cost.

The Impact

The men's neck-wear business is an $800 million dollar per year industry. Men's neck-wear has not seen  a new product introduction in over a century laying fertile ground for the long-term viability of Tiebow.

Due to the unique nature of this product, we have a patent pending and many more unique accessories to follow!

We have one goal:  To bring  Creativity & Re-purpose style for everyone!

A rigorous Shark Tank Campaign is already underway. 

Risks & Challenges

Being able to fund the high demand for the product without proper funding is a risk that we want to avoid.  

Challenges: we want to continue to deliver a high standard of customer service and quality products that surpasses expectation. While experiencing high consumer demand we do not want to be underfunded!

Capitalization and good management skills is the proper way to decrease the risks and challenges.  

Our focus is on consumer connection, cutting edge accessories and quality as well as timely delivery!

Other Ways You Can Help

We ask that you spread the word, share our website,  and purchase your TieBow Clip, re-post to Instagram, Facebook and Twitter.  Post your pictures to our social media, show how  TieBow Clip re-purposed your old collection of ties.

If there is synergy between your current line of work and the Tiebow Clip we would love to hear from you with ideas on how we can work together.  We offer wholesale and representative opportunities.

One lucky person or group will be chosen to be featured in our up and coming marketing campaign!

story:
Bad Soles, LLC was created on the notion of fashion with a purpose.  As a kid, I was bullied, and I imagined that things would taper off and slow down as I grew older. I soon realized that I was my own worst enemy by always dwelling on my own flaws. I was bringing myself down, lowering my self-esteem and confidence.  Issues of low self-esteem can affect anyone, regardless of race, gender or sexual preference. The purpose of my company is to reach people everywhere by using fashion. I came up with the idea of putting negative words on the bottom of each and every shoe to signify the value of keeping negativity beneath you. I created Bad Sole shoes to help remind people that they are above the hate and the negativity of the world with each step they take. My shoes encourage men and women to walk tall and stand proud, while being highly fashionable. When people stop and ask you about the shoes you are wearing then you can tell your own story of standing tall, above hate.

My mission is to capital to get inventory into stores nationwide

story:
YOU CAN NOW PURCHASE YOUR LANCASTER ROBERTS TIMEPIECE VIA OUR WEBSITE.

ALL WATCHES ARE GUARANTEED TO BE POSTED TO BACKERS BY AUGUST 28TH.



Lancaster Roberts' first 3 collections are diverse, yet showcase the same core values and principles; simplicity and class.


Our First Editions range, pioneering classic suede straps, are the bench mark for which we base our entire philosophy. Proving that even the most humble of materials can walk hand in hand with some of the most precious.


Secondly, our Catena Series. A collection of chain straps in 3 distinct colours- a perfect way to steal the limelight when entering a room.


Lastly, we have our Limited Edition Hirsch Leather Collection. With only 250 pieces of each design able to be made worldwide, this collection really showcases our ambition to become one of the most respected names in the watch industry.


      


Every Lancaster Roberts watch comes secured in our uniquely designed packaging. Our luxurious presentation case is lined with genuine Onyx Black leather with an interior of sesame cream, this is not just any packaging.

However where Lancaster Roberts diversifys from every other watch manufacturer in the world today, is we offer the opportunity to make a timepiece your very own.


It all started when our group of friends and watch lovers began to wonder what actually defined a luxury watch? Although there is a huge selection of designs and straps available,  we found that leading luxury watches from the likes of Rolex and Tag Heuer are just too expensive for the modern day professional.



To find the solution to our problem, we really needed to understand what actually makes a luxury timepiece. 

The best watchmakers in the world spend endless hours refining every element to perfect the overall look and feel of their creation. However, for many craftsmen, the obsession with detail doesn't stop there.


We decided, if we want to brush shoulders with the best watch-makers in the world, we need to meet them and learn from them. We bought some last minute tickets to Switzerland to attend Baselworld, the biggest watch convention on the planet.

We got advice from the likes of Rolex, Tag Heure and Raymond Weil, which resulted in us being introduced to our amazing Swiss manufacturer who we are now working with to make our next range of watches officially Swiss made.


In other words, the watch should take your breath away. You should be excited to wear it every time you open the presentation case.

Overall, we feel that a luxury timepiece is a concert of 3 distinctive characteristics:

Design - A beautifully manufactured design using the highest quality materials with focus on celebrating the finer details of watch making.

Everyday - It should be timeless (excuse the pun), but you should be able to wear it casually, whilst also dressing for more formal events in your finest attire.

Purpose - Lastly, the watch should be completely unique to the wearer. That personal touch can make all the difference.




Your Time is a service which simply shows how much we care about each and every watch we make. Our dedicated team will find the personal time zone which your address belongs to and set your Lancaster Roberts so it is ready to wear the second you lay your eyes on it. Just a little extra special detail, but it's the small details that can make the biggest difference.

One section of the watch industry we want to rejuvenate is the problem of straps being too big or too small when you receive your watch. This is a problem we had encounterd ourselves, so that's how we developed our unique Wrist Assessment procedure.



We worked with Hirsch Leather to develop a measuring instrument which measures the exact circumference of your wrist and lets us know exactly how big or small we need to make your strap, so it fits perfectly.

We also appreciate that waiting for a product can be tough. Our team have been through the exact same process, it can be hard not knowing where your product is and when it will be arriving.



This inspired us to develop an app for iPhone & android smart phones, which allows every backer after the IndieGogo campaign, to fully track their watch through out the entire manufacturing process. You will know exactly where your unique watch is at all times whilst waiting for it to arrive.



We spent countless hours trying to find a logo or symbol that could really express what Lancaster Roberts actually stood for. Then we got it.

A leaf is a direct product from a tree's growth, but although that tree may produce hundreds of thousands of leaves, every single one is completely unique.




This is where we found a harmony within Lancaster Roberts between the company’s philosophy and passion for delivering exclusive products to every single individual.



We are extremely lucky to have a team of highly skilled, passionate people working with us to help make our dream a reality.

We have also been fortunate to work with some of the worlds best watch manufacturers, using their years of experience to help us refine and develop our first range.

We took inspiration from the most luxurious companies in the world to perfect our designs and the overall presentation of our product. Working tirelessly and obsessing over every little detail, we finally completed our very first collection.

We wanted to keep the overall design simple. As we know, class is not who speaks most or loudest, but who makes the most sense. We decided on a 2 hand classic watch face and designed our mechanism to sit in the comfort of our 6.3mm reinforced casing, this was to achieve elegance whilst also maintaining durability.


Each design is available to men and women and come in both a 40mm or a more dainty 36mm model. This is to make sure our watches fit every wrist flawlessly and with complete comfort.

Every watch comes readily installed with scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass and driven by a 4-Jeweled Swiss Quartz movement.



We wanted to make a truly beautiful timepiece that has everything a luxury watch should have, just without the extortionate price tag. We wanted to cut out the middlemen and go straight to the consumer, to maximize savings which are then passed on to you. 



This is why we are giving every IndieGogo supporter the chance to have their very own Lancaster Roberts timepiece before our watches can be found in jewellery retailers and they mark up their prices.


We have teamed up with an amazing technology company to help log and register everyone's orders and details, simply to organize our backers accordingly. 

Doing this will not only help us deliver the watches faster then our deadline, but also deal with your watch order in an organised manner which allows us to make every element extra perfect.


Visiting their facility to meet the amazing team, so we could go into every detail and make sure the finished product was exactly what we wanted. 



Each partner understands our specifications to the last tiny detail. This is the level of accuracy a luxury watch company must work to. 

The likes of Rolex, Tag Heuer and Breitling all showcase this skill. And although our product is at a more accessible price point, we would like to think we work with that same elite precision that truly defines world class watch making.


Every Lancaster Roberts comes supplied with an international warranty card to ensure you piece of mind.

We have the ultimate trust in the engineering of our watches. If anything were to happen to your watch within 5 years, we will personally repair or replace the timepiece completely free of charge.


    

•Face Diameter: 40mm/36mm

•Thickness: 6.3mm

•Case Material: Reinforced Stainless Steel

•Clasp: Classic Buckle Clasp 

•Sapphire Crystal Glass

•Display: Analog 

•Movement: Swiss Made Gold Ronda 4 Jeweled Quartz Movement

•Power: Swiss Made 1.55V Renata Battery 

•Water Resistant: 3 ATM 

International 5 year Warranty 


Our brief has been submitted to our manufacturer and we have surveys ready to send to all our backers and gather relevant information in regards to design, size and engraving details. Once the IndieGogo is successfully funded, we will begin the manufacturing process to make sure every backer gets their Lancaster Roberts watch on time.



Your support can help us do that and really get our journey on the road. Not to mention you will be one of the first people on the planet to own a Lancaster Roberts timepiece.



Our team consists of a distinct  team of creatively fueled product designers with a extraordinary passion for timepieces and packaging. Embracing over 15 years of collective experience in designing products, logistics and marketing.



With an amazing team bound together by a passion for fine watches, we really can’t wait to share our timepieces with the world.



Lancaster Roberts campaign on IndieGogo is simple and secure, and open to everyone around the world.

  • Log into your IndieGogo account, or create a new account. 
  • Select the Perk of your choice from the right side of our campaign screen.
  • Enter your shipment details so we know where to send your Wrist Assessment & Lancaster Roberts Watch.
  • Submit your payment information and that’s it! 

You should receive a confirmation email moments after you submit the form. IndieGogo accepts debit or credit card associated with Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay and Paypal.

 All payments are in US dollars. 

Note: Transactions are processed immediately after purchase is completed. So if you can't pay until near the end of the campaign, but you have your eye on a very particular watch, please message us and let us know. We will try our very best to reserve it for you.



Help Us By Sharing Lancaster Roberts With Your Family & Friends!

Need help? We're here for you.

If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@lancaster-roberts.com.




Once our IndieGogo is funded we are ready to go. We have spent all the time before hand planning and assessing problems previous IndieGogo campaigns has come up against, therefore when if any happen, we can deal with it effectively and in a manner which will not affect our deadline. The Lancaster Roberts team are fully aware that when the time comes, we need to be fully organized in having each and every individual watch engraved and distributed as soon as possible. We have invested a lot of effort in pre-planning our manufacturing and distribution strategies, this is obviously to give our valued backers the best service possible, but also to showcase our approach to customer service when we begin to develop the company afterwards.
story_txt:
YOU CAN NOW PURCHASE YOUR LANCASTER ROBERTS TIMEPIECE VIA OUR WEBSITE.
ALL WATCHES ARE GUARANTEED TO BE POSTED TO BACKERS BY AUGUST 28TH.





Lancaster Roberts' first 3 collections are diverse, yet showcase the same core values and principles; simplicity and class.






Our First Editions range, pioneering classic suede straps, are the bench mark for which we base our entire philosophy. Proving that even the most humble of materials can walk hand in hand with some of the most precious.Secondly, our Catena Series. A collection of chain straps in 3 distinct colours- a perfect way to steal the limelight when entering a room.
Lastly, we have our Limited Edition Hirsch Leather Collection. With only 250 pieces of each design able to be made worldwide, this collection really showcases our ambition to become one of the most respected names in the watch industry.      Every Lancaster Roberts watch comes secured in our uniquely designed packaging. Our luxurious presentation case is lined with genuine Onyx Black leather with an interior of sesame cream, this is not just any packaging.However where Lancaster Roberts diversifys from every other watch manufacturer in the world today, is we offer the opportunity to make a timepiece your very own.Including a complimentary engraving service, you are free to engrave any message or text on the back of your chosen watch. This can of course be for yourself, or even as part of a unique present for a special someone.
It all started when our group of friends and watch lovers began to wonder what actually defined a luxury watch? Although there is a huge selection of designs and straps available,  we found that leading luxury watches from the likes of Rolex and Tag Heuer are just too expensive for the modern day professional.To find the solution to our problem, we really needed to understand what actually makes a luxury timepiece. We found that the quality of the watch is the most important, but just as much so, was everything else that comes with it.The best watchmakers in the world spend endless hours refining every element to perfect the overall look and feel of their creation. However, for many craftsmen, the obsession with detail doesn't stop there.





They have put their heart and soul into a beautifully engineered piece of wrist wear. Buying a genuine luxury watch isn't just buying a watch, it's buying into a lifestyle.We decided, if we want to brush shoulders with the best watch-makers in the world, we need to meet them and learn from them. We bought some last minute tickets to Switzerland to attend Baselworld, the biggest watch convention on the planet.We got advice from the likes of Rolex, Tag Heure and Raymond Weil, which resulted in us being introduced to our amazing Swiss manufacturer who we are now working with to make our next range of watches officially Swiss made.In other words, the watch should take your breath away. You should be excited to wear it every time you open the presentation case.Overall, we feel that a luxury timepiece is a concert of 3 distinctive characteristics:Design - A beautifully manufactured design using the highest quality materials with focus on celebrating the finer details of watch making.Everyday - It should be timeless (excuse the pun), but you should be able to wear it casually, whilst also dressing for more formal events in your finest attire.Purpose - Lastly, the watch should be completely unique to the wearer. That personal touch can make all the difference.Your Time is a service which simply shows how much we care about each and every watch we make. Our dedicated team will find the personal time zone which your address belongs to and set your Lancaster Roberts so it is ready to wear the second you lay your eyes on it. Just a little extra special detail, but it's the small details that can make the biggest difference.One section of the watch industry we want to rejuvenate is the problem of straps being too big or too small when you receive your watch. This is a problem we had encounterd ourselves, so that's how we developed our unique Wrist Assessment procedure.We worked with Hirsch Leather to develop a measuring instrument which measures the exact circumference of your wrist and lets us know exactly how big or small we need to make your strap, so it fits perfectly.We also appreciate that waiting for a product can be tough. Our team have been through the exact same process, it can be hard not knowing where your product is and when it will be arriving.This inspired us to develop an app for iPhone & android smart phones, which allows every backer after the IndieGogo campaign, to fully track their watch through out the entire manufacturing process. You will know exactly where your unique watch is at all times whilst waiting for it to arrive.We spent countless hours trying to find a logo or symbol that could really express what Lancaster Roberts actually stood for. Then we got it.Our philosophy is to deliver a beautiful, elegantly designed range of watches, all of which are individual in their own distinctive way.A leaf is a direct product from a tree's growth, but although that tree may produce hundreds of thousands of leaves, every single one is completely unique.
This is where we found a harmony within Lancaster Roberts between the company’s philosophy and passion for delivering exclusive products to every single individual.




We are extremely lucky to have a team of highly skilled, passionate people working with us to help make our dream a reality.



We have also been fortunate to work with some of the worlds best watch manufacturers, using their years of experience to help us refine and develop our first range.
We took inspiration from the most luxurious companies in the world to perfect our designs and the overall presentation of our product. Working tirelessly and obsessing over every little detail, we finally completed our very first collection.
We wanted to keep the overall design simple. As we know, class is not who speaks most or loudest, but who makes the most sense. We decided on a 2 hand classic watch face and designed our mechanism to sit in the comfort of our 6.3mm reinforced casing, this was to achieve elegance whilst also maintaining durability.




Each design is available to men and women and come in both a 40mm or a more dainty 36mm model. This is to make sure our watches fit every wrist flawlessly and with complete comfort.
Every watch comes readily installed with scratch resistant sapphire crystal glass and driven by a 4-Jeweled Swiss Quartz movement.







We wanted to make a truly beautiful timepiece that has everything a luxury watch should have, just without the extortionate price tag. We wanted to cut out the middlemen and go straight to the consumer, to maximize savings which are then passed on to you. 



This is why we are giving every IndieGogo supporter the chance to have their very own Lancaster Roberts timepiece before our watches can be found in jewellery retailers and they mark up their prices.



We have teamed up with an amazing technology company to help log and register everyone's orders and details, simply to organize our backers accordingly. 
Doing this will not only help us deliver the watches faster then our deadline, but also deal with your watch order in an organised manner which allows us to make every element extra perfect.




         
We wanted to make sure we had an established manufacturing group with years of experience in making high quality watches to work with us to build our first collection. Lancaster Roberts stand by a company ethos of developing long term and fruitful relationships with our partners. 
Visiting their facility to meet the amazing team, so we could go into every detail and make sure the finished product was exactly what we wanted. 




Each partner understands our specifications to the last tiny detail. This is the level of accuracy a luxury watch company must work to. The likes of Rolex, Tag Heuer and Breitling all showcase this skill. And although our product is at a more accessible price point, we would like to think we work with that same elite precision that truly defines world class watch making.Every Lancaster Roberts comes supplied with an international warranty card to ensure you piece of mind.We have the ultimate trust in the engineering of our watches. If anything were to happen to your watch within 5 years, we will personally repair or replace the timepiece completely free of charge.    •Face Diameter: 40mm/36mm•Thickness: 6.3mm•Case Material: Reinforced Stainless Steel•Clasp: Classic Buckle Clasp •Sapphire Crystal Glass•Display: Analog •Movement: Swiss Made Gold Ronda 4 Jeweled Quartz Movement•Power: Swiss Made 1.55V Renata Battery •Water Resistant: 3 ATM International 5 year Warranty Our brief has been submitted to our manufacturer and we have surveys ready to send to all our backers and gather relevant information in regards to design, size and engraving details. Once the IndieGogo is successfully funded, we will begin the manufacturing process to make sure every backer gets their Lancaster Roberts watch on time.

This is where IndieGogo comes in. We need your support to help launch our first range of luxury timepieces. Our manufacturer has our designs and samples have been approved. They are simply waiting for the green light. Your support can help us do that and really get our journey on the road. Not to mention you will be one of the first people on the planet to own a Lancaster Roberts timepiece.

Our team consists of a distinct  team of creatively fueled product designers with a extraordinary passion for timepieces and packaging. Embracing over 15 years of collective experience in designing products, logistics and marketing.








We are currently working on designing a new Aeon series comprising of an Automatic movement and hopefully our first 10k gold watch. 
With an amazing team bound together by a passion for fine watches, we really can’t wait to share our timepieces with the world.




Lancaster Roberts campaign on IndieGogo is simple and secure, and open to everyone around the world.

Log into your IndieGogo account, or create a new account. 
Select the Perk of your choice from the right side of our campaign screen.
Enter your shipment details so we know where to send your Wrist Assessment & Lancaster Roberts Watch.
Submit your payment information and that’s it! 

You should receive a confirmation email moments after you submit the form. IndieGogo accepts debit or credit card associated with Visa, MasterCard, Apple Pay and Paypal.
 All payments are in US dollars. 
Note: Transactions are processed immediately after purchase is completed. So if you can't pay until near the end of the campaign, but you have your eye on a very particular watch, please message us and let us know. We will try our very best to reserve it for you.




Help Us By Sharing Lancaster Roberts With Your Family & Friends!


Need help? We're here for you.
If you have questions at any time, during or after the campaign has closed, you can always reach us at support@lancaster-roberts.com.





Once our IndieGogo is funded we are ready to go. We have spent all the time before hand planning and assessing problems previous IndieGogo campaigns has come up against, therefore when if any happen, we can deal with it effectively and in a manner which will not affect our deadline. The Lancaster Roberts team are fully aware that when the time comes, we need to be fully organized in having each and every individual watch engraved and distributed as soon as possible. We have invested a lot of effort in pre-planning our manufacturing and distribution strategies, this is obviously to give our valued backers the best service possible, but also to showcase our approach to customer service when we begin to develop the company afterwards.

story:
Founder, Company and Brand

I'm an Italian entrepreneur, ski instructor and CEO of H-Com LIMITED, owner of the brand "Hill". I've developed my skills, working for important Italian sportswear and sports equipment companies, both related to all mountain activities.


One year ago I created the brand "Hill outdoor”, where the logo represents the double "ll" of the word “Hill” within a rectangle, recalling the pause symbol.

The Hill collection is designed for mountain, leisure, cycling and running. Our goal is to offer sportswear and leisure apparel at an advantageous price, by choosing high quality fabrics, high quality accessories and "made in Italy" production.

Our business, is mainly based on the e-commerce and e-booking sales on: www.hilloutdoor.com

E-booking, is a new concept to promote Hill outdoor products selling directly to the customers with no additional cost, like:

  • traditional sales network
  • retails
  • middlemen

Why you should contribute to this project?

  • Because the product is best of quality (fabrics, accessories and handicraft)
  • Because the product is 100% real Made in Italy (Veneto Region)
  • Because you can book and buy the product any time, any where independently of the season
  • Because you will be the first ambassadors of the brand and testimonial of the product

Donations will be used to cover the costs of:

  • Web development (20%)
  • Design (16%)
  • Products development (48%)
  • Online marketing strategies (16%)

What We Need & What You Get

We need your support and sharing "Hill outdoor" apparel with your friends.
Our goal is to offer "hill Outdoor" apparel at an advantageous price, selling directly to the customers that often buy online and those who do not trust in buying online because they want to see how does it fit. 
How to engage the last?

  • Developing an innovative web site, a smart app and an algorithm called "personal shopper online" (that after taking some body measurements to the consumer, compare the volumes of consumer with those of clothing chosen and it choose the most proper size).
  • By presenting periodically apparel collections and offering to the consumers to see the projects in progress and have their feedback
  • Publishing photos, videos and descriptions that explain the product, its features
  • Using social media network and their ADS campaigns
You will be the protagonists of the product that we will offer.
The Impact

Buying the product using the e-booking formula brings multiple advantages to the final customers, as for the example the possibility to: 

  • always finding the right size and color available 
  • always finding new collection and their restyle
  • always finding the product in the 4 seasons versions 
  • always having an advantageous price because you directly buy from the company without any logistic chain costs in the middle
  • always being the product's principal
For the company the advantages are:
  • optimizing the production and produce without generating stock 
  • not adopting the banking system and its monetary constrictions
  • reducing production costs 
  • using one single sale channel, online
  • selling over produced products on the e-commerce 
  • using most important web market-places to position the product and save marketing costs 
  • avoiding non-regulamentation of the price generated by online players that creates final customer confusion in his choice

Risks & Challenges

The risks and challenges that this business model could have are the following:

  1. the buying system and the product booking, customers would like to try before buying 
  1. the timeframe between the order and the delivery of the product, customers would like to use the product straight away
To satisfy the customers and overcome these risks, the solution to these problems are the following: 
  1. the production of tutorial videos showing the products, its wearability and the way to choose the size thanks an "online personal shopper" system
  2. we will care about the client by sending him personalised sms and email during the waiting timeframe, with the reminder of the production phase its product is in, in order to care about him more and make him feeling the waiting time shorter 

Other ways you can help us

Share the presentation using  the Indiegogo share tools!

_____________________________________________________________________________

This jacket is intended as a mid layer or standalone piece in cool, dry conditions.
Lightweight, closely to the body trapping heat closer to your core and durable enough to wear every day.

This jacket is intended as a mid layer or standalone piece in cool, dry conditions.

With clear and minimalist design, constructed with care, attention to detail and highest levels of craftsmanship. High warmth-to-weight ratio.

2126ADM1 - Hard Shell 3 layer (M)

Waterproof hooded jacket with clean styling and multi-sport versatility. 
It's light, breathable and weather-protective,features a tall collar and quick access with a high level of comfort.
The jacket is made with YUSHAN® extreme fabric 3 layers.
Full taped seams, taped waterproof zippers and fixed hood, with single back adjustment.
Phone pocket on the inside of the jacket, in order to prevent moisture damage.
Its articulated shaping provides athletic mobility.

It's light, breathable and weather-protective,features a tall collar and quick access with a high level of comfort.

1116FIM1 - Insulated Jacket (M)

Light, flexible, warm, waterproof and functional padded hooded jacket.
Made with waterproof, breathable YUSHAN® extreme 2-layer outer fabric, Thermore® ARIA EU 115 syntetic insulation and micro rip-stop inner lining.
Full taped seams, laminated YKK® zippers and fixed-hood with single back adjustment.

Its articulated shaping provides athletic mobility for year-round backcountry use.

Full taped seams, laminated YKK® zippers and fixed-hood with single back adjustment.
Phone pocket on the inside of the jacket, in order to prevent moisture damage.
Its articulated shaping provides athletic mobility for year-round backcountry use.

1247AIM1 - Insulated Pants (M)

Insulated and waterproof ski pants with a clean design.
They have a medium cut and, waterproof, breathable, YUSHAN® extreme 2-layer outer fabric, Thermore EcoDown® light SC insulation and micro rip-stop inner lining.
The pants are weather protective and warm.
Essential features include die-cut Velcro® adjustable waist belt, gaiters bottom leg and removable gaiters waist. Laminated YKK® zippers, 2 big pockets on sides legs, bottom hem leg with Superfabric™ patches stand up against damage from boots and ski edges while you're seeking out steeps and riding chairlifts to peaks, detachable suspenders.

1247AIW1 - Insulated Pants (W)

Insulated and waterproof ski pants with a clean design.
They have a medium cut and, waterproof, breathable, YUSHAN® extreme 2-layer outer fabric, Thermore EcoDown® light SC insulation and micro rip-stop inner lining.
The pants are weather protective and warm.

1247EIJ1 - Insulated Pants (J)

Insulated and waterproof ski pants with a clean design.
They have a medium cut and, waterproof, breathable, YUSHAN® extreme 2-layer outer fabric, Thermore EcoDown® light SC insulation and micro ripstop inner lining.
The pants are weather protective and warm.
Essential features include elastic waist, gaiters bottom leg. Laminated YKK® zippers, 2 side pockets and 1 on front leg, detachable suspenders.

1247BIM1 - Insulated Pants (M)

Insulated and waterproof ski pants designed with fashion fabric.
They have a comfort cut and, waterproof, breathable, laminated fabric 2-layer resistant DENIM outer fabric, Thermore EcoDown® light SC insulation and micro rip-stop inner lining.
The pants are weather protective and warm.
Essential features include die-cut Velcro® adjustable waist belt, gaiters bottom leg and removable gaiters waist. Laminated YKK® zippers, 2 big pockets on sides legs.
Bottom hem with same DENIM fabric patch stand up against damage from boots and ski edges while you're seeking out steeps and riding chairlifts to peaks, detachable suspenders.

1247BIW1 - Insulated Pants (W)

Insulated and waterproof ski pants designed with fashion fabric.
They have a comfort cut and, waterproof, breathable, laminated fabric 2-layer resistant DENIM outer fabric, Thermore EcoDown® light SC insulation and micro rip-stop inner lining.
The pants are weather protective and warm.
Essential features include die-cut Velcro® adjustable waist belt, gaiters bottom leg and removable gaiters waist. Laminated YKK® zippers, 2 big pockets on sides legs.
Bottom hem with same DENIM fabric patch stand up against damage from boots and ski edges while you're seeking out steeps and riding chairlifts to peaks, detachable suspenders.

1247CIM1 - Hard Shell 3 layer Pants (M)
and
1247CIW1 - Hard Shell 3 layer Pants (W)

Made with YUSHAN® extreme fabric 3 layers, provides complete weather protection and is engineered for backcountry and freeride.
Forward leaning articulation in the knees and seat delivers complete freedom of movement, and the ¾-length side zips open to dump heat rapidly or adjust for ventilation.
Side pockets and back pockets, large front thigh pockets to accommodate bulky items needed at the ready, laminated YKK® zippers , detachable suspenders, gaiters bottom leg and removable gaiter waist. Superfabric™ lower leg reinforcement and bottom leg gaiters.

2237DDM1 - Thermore ARIA EU 60 3/4 length
and
2237DDW1 - Thermore ARIA EU 60 3/4 length

Insulated 3/4 length, made with synthetic insulation and micro rip-stop fabric.
Padded with Thermore® Aria EU 60 syntetic insulation to provide unrivalled warmth and comfort.
TERAGON® fabrics on the sides, ensures flexibility and a close fit.
This item is intended as a mid layer ideal to use under shell pants 1274CIM1 and 1274CIW1.
Extra light, constructed with care, attention to detail and highest levels of craftsmanship. Highly compressible.

222L2QM1 - Flexible trekking pants (M)
and
222L2QW1 - Flexible trekking pants (W)


These breathable and silent pants are made out of soft and durable MiCor fabric (corduroy 95% PES - 5%EA) and are reinforced with water repellent and abrasion resistance of Schoeller Keprotec fabric on knees and seat.
Two side pockets, one back pocket, bottom hem leg adjustable side with zipper, adjustable waist drawcord and elastic tightening around ankles.
Perfect for trekking, leisure in drier weather and all temperatures.

story:
Welcome to Tranquilo

The lightweight, flexible, versatile and completely portable vibrating mat for babies

Why settle for old-fashioned and inconvenient soothing methods? Tranquilo Mat is completely PORTABLE and provides all the VERSATILITY you could possibly need. Designed by a Registered Nurse, Tranquilo Mat is soft, compact and lightweight – the perfect companion for today’s busy, on-the-go parents.


Happy baby = Happy parents








What’s it all about?


We all know that babies cry. But sometimes they really cry. And cry. And cry. And nothing seems to soothe them. They’ve been fed, burped, changed and cuddled, but still they go on crying. 

Working in a hospital nursery, I saw first-hand the challenges many parents and professionals face when trying to calm a crying baby. And I could feel their frustration, anxiety and stress rising, which would only exacerbate the situation.

I hunted high and low, but struggled to find the perfect soothing method or product:

Swaddling can be a difficult skill to master, and can even be dangerous if not done correctly. 

Swaying, rocking, bouncing, walks or long car rides require a lot of time and energy, which most sleep-deprived parents don’t have in abundance! 

Infant swings, vibrating chairs and vibrating mattress pads are bulky, difficult to transport and don’t encourage bonding, as they require putting your baby down.


So I decided to create my own!


After considering the difficulties I’d seen so many parents experience, and the features and benefits that were lacking in existing soothing methods, I developed the Tranquilo Mat. It’s a simple to use, battery operated vibrating mat that’s lightweight and flexible for optimal portability and versatility. It comes in 2 sizes and its unique design makes it effective either as a stand-alone product, or in conjunction with any of the methods listed above.

Calm happy baby = calm, happy parents

And what’s more, moms and dads can benefit even further, as Tranquilo Mat can also be used for adults. It’s great for soothing and relaxing tired muscles, like those aching necks and backs so often experienced by parents. So Tranquilo keeps on working even after your baby outgrows it.

What people are saying about Tranquilo Mat

“I have to tell you the mat really, really works (as if you don't already know that)!!! I wasn't sure how she'd react, since she never responds to the vibration mode in her bassinet, but she stops crying almost immediately with this! It's amazing! What a God send for fussy babies!” – Kristen N. 

“It worked well and we used it almost every day to help keep her calm, mostly in conjunction with the activity mat. She really seemed to like the “slow wave” mode. It was nice to have a few different modes to try out depending on her moods.” – Derrick S.
“It’s a great idea. I can definitely see a use for this in our nursery! Especially for the really fussy babies.” - Scott L., Pediatrician 
“My 4-year-old son loved to use it to calm his sister. Every time she would cry, he would run to get the mat and then turn it on before handing it to me to place it near her.” – Jude S.

“It’s a great idea. It’s the ‘neurologic white-noise’ I always tell parents their babies love and need because it reminds them of the womb.” – Laura N., Pediatrician

“I would love to have a few of these to use in our nursery!” – Deb D., maternity RN

“I was amazed because it calmed him in his car seat and he HATES his car seat. He normally cried the entire time he has to spend in there, which is especially tedious on a long car ride. For that reason and that reason alone, I’d pay you $100 for one right now!” –Lindsey B.

“It helped my daughter enjoy ‘tummy time’ for a bit longer than she normally would, which was a relief because I know how important ‘tummy time’ can be” – Allison D.

“Where was this when I needed it 17 years ago??!!” –Nancy M.

“I wish I had it when mine was a newborn. He was a crier!!!” –Katerina T.

"Love it! I love how flexible, simple, and easy to use the mat is!" -Emily M, doula & pre-natal yoga instructor

Features


The Tranquilo Mat is CPSIA safe. It has been tested by a third party laboratory here in the USA that is ACLASS accredited. The mat is designed to exceed all CPSIA testing and standards.


Product details


Small Mat

Dimensions: 8in x 11in

Weight: 8.5 oz (with batteries)


Large Mat

Dimensions: 12in x 22in

Weight: 1lb 3.3oz (with batteries)


All Tranquilo Mats:

  • are powered by 2 AA-batteries (NOT included)
  • feature a choice of 5 modes: low, high, wave 1, wave 2, random
  • include a removable 100% cotton cover in sage green 



How far we've come


We’ve been working on Tranquilo Mat for over two years. Your support will turn our working prototypes into reality and bring Tranquilo to crying babies everywhere.


Backers will help fund:

  • Sourcing the highest quality components
  • All necessary and voluntary safety testing and certifications
  • Production tooling and first production run


Risks & challenges


After more than two years of hard work, our team is committed to executing Tranquilo’s innovative idea to the world as smoothly as possible to ensure a timely full-scale production. However, despite our best efforts, we cannot fully predict the future. So we’ve identified a few potential risks that we want you, our loyal supporters, to be aware of:

Manufacturing: Creating an innovative product for babies can be expensive, challenging and time-consuming due to the numerous – and totally necessary – safety standards required. As such, we’re working with a team of professionals – manufacturers, engineers, doctors and lawyers – with many years of experience in Juvenile Product Manufacturing, to ensure we meet and exceed all these rigorous safeguards.

Additionally, in order to produce on a large scale, we will need to meet increases in tooling and production equipment. So, although we’ve already worked closely with our manufacturer to ensure a high quality Tranquilo product is produced, the additional volume could cause some delays.

Product Adjustments: In order to deliver an optimal product, we may need to undergo some minor adjustments to the final design. Any and all improvements will be made with safety and user benefit in mind. We will also be sure to communicate with our customers exactly how and why any changes are made.

Fulfillment: Despite our best efforts, due to the complexities of manufacturing a new product, there may be factors we cannot control such as equipment malfunction, transport or supplier delays. We hope that your support will enable us to begin production on a commercial scale without delay, and in anticipation of this campaign we have already established a well-oiled supply chain to help us smoothly roll out Tranquilo. However, if there is an overwhelming demand, we may need to scale up the factory or set up manufacturing operations in additional locations.

We will do our utmost to produce Tranquilo as quickly as possible, whilst ensuring the highest quality and safety standards of every product. And we will prioritize early backers to ensure they’re first in line to receive their Tranquilo Mat.

Lastly, to ensure we’re fully prepared, we’re also in the process of establishing additional, secondary supplier relationships to meet any complex production-related issues that may arise.



What we believe in


Tranquilo believes it is every business’s responsibility to serve their community and give back to those in need.   

As part of our community outreach, we will donate Tranquilo Mats to local shelters in the Boston area serving homeless women and children. Whilst we already have a few organizations in mind to receive our donations, please feel free to reach out to us if you know of any other deserving charities.

Additionally, 3% of all proceeds – both from this campaign and future Tranquilo sales – will be donated to Operation Shanti. A charity based in Mysore, India, Operation Shanti works hard to meet the basic needs – food, shelter, education, medical assistance, and lots of comfort and stability – of the poorest and neediest school-aged children escaping life on the streets. “Every child deserves the opportunity to reach their fullest potential.”


Other ways you can help


If you like our project but you’re unable to contribute, please consider sharing it with friends and family using the share buttons under the video above. This will help us enormously to spread the word and generate excitement about Tranquilo Mat!
