story:
My name is Jessi Sader. I am the woman behind FXDressed, a clothing line that has been made in Maine since 2008 on antique Singer sewing machines. With a little help from my amazing seamstresses and a loving sales rep, I have been able to distribute FXDressed throughout New England. 

        The time has come for FXDressed, myself and my tribe including  my lovely 16 year old daughter Nyxie, the 2 pups, and 3 kitty cats to relocate to northern California in my 1984 Winnebago Chieftain generously gifted to me by a FXDressed patron and customer!

         This campaign will help FXDressed physically arrive in California. I have used alot of my financial resources getting the RV solid for a cross country road trip. This campaign will help raise money for gas and any potential mechanical problems that may arise. Any extra money left over will help FXDressed find a studio/showroom space in California sooner than later.

             After the move FXDressed will be made in both Maine and California by independent seamstresses on antique Singer sewing machines. The move will bring fresh energy to the line and allow distribution growth while still holding true to the grassroots appeal of simplicity and comfort. The mix of the Maine coast and deep woods will blend well with the foggy mists of the Redwood Giants, and the historic hardworking New England ethic with the North West's environmental consciousness.

          With every donation comes a special perk. Ranging from a personal thank you postcard while we are on the road to FXDressed items made only for this campaign. Any donation is a great donation! Even if I do not meet the campaign's financial goal the funds will still be used for the trip cross country. If you can't donate please help spread the word by sharing this campaign and SMILE, good vibes will get us far!

story:
Covenant label is more than just a clothing line fit for kingdom men and woman of all ages; it is a modern evangelistic venture that's sweeping the nation. Through this ministry we aim to equip  the body of Christ with tools that will enable you to share the Gospel of Jesus Christ with any and every person that you come in contact with. We the disciples of Jesus have an obligation to proclaim the Gospel of Jesus Christ to ALL people regardless of nationality, color, or creed! What better way to begin fulfilling the great commission then through attire (something that all people wear and all people see). With your help, we can deliver the message of our Lord's love, peace, forgiveness, deity etc. to the world and you are guaranteed to catch an eye and a few conversations.

What We Need

So let's see where the money will go:
  • $15,000 will go to opening our store front
  • $15,000 will go towards equipment for producing merchandise
  • $6,000 will go towards the inventory
  • $2,000 will to create legal entity for Covenant Label
  • $2,000 will go towards shipping cost and indiegogo expenses

The Impact

For every shirt sold, Covenant Label will donate a portion to Sharing Hope International Ministries. While we are sharing the Gospel of Jesus Christ through apparel, we are helping to feed the hungry, cloth the naked as well as providing funding for schools and housing in impoverished communities. For more info on the Sharing Hope International Ministries, please go to www.sharinghopeim.org.

Risk and Challenges

The fashion world is more noticeable now than ever. The problem is that there are not a lot of fashionable Christian wear companies that attract the multitude. It is a hard thing to get the message of Jesus out through apparel. Christian clothing companies are battling to get the attention of fashion lovers while sharing the message of Jesus but struggle through the trend setters of this world. Our clothing does not just share the message, but it's designers merge trendy and holiness all in one fabric!
story_txt:
Covenant label is more than just a clothing line fit for kingdom men and
 woman of all ages; it is a modern evangelistic venture that's sweeping 
the nation. Through this ministry we aim to equip  the body of Christ 
with tools that will enable you to share the Gospel of Jesus Christ with
 any and every person that you come in contact with. We the disciples of
 Jesus have an obligation to proclaim the Gospel of Jesus Christ to ALL 
people regardless of nationality, color, or creed! What better way to 
begin fulfilling the great commission then through attire (something 
that all people wear and all people see). With your help, we can deliver the message of our Lord's 
love, peace, forgiveness, deity etc. to the world and you are guaranteed to catch an eye 
and a few conversations. 
   What We Need 
So let's see where the money will go:
$15,000 will go to opening our store front
$15,000 will go towards equipment for producing merchandise
$6,000 will go towards the inventory
$2,000 will to create legal entity for Covenant Label 

$2,000 will go towards shipping cost and indiegogo expenses


  The ImpactFor every shirt sold, Covenant Label will donate a portion to Sharing Hope International Ministries. While we are sharing the Gospel of Jesus Christ through apparel, we are helping to feed the hungry, cloth the naked as well as providing funding for schools and housing in impoverished communities. For more info on the Sharing Hope International Ministries, please go to www.sharinghopeim.org. 
 Risk and Challenges
The fashion world is more noticeable now than ever. The problem is that there are not a lot of fashionable Christian wear companies that attract the multitude. It is a hard thing to get the message of Jesus out through apparel. Christian clothing companies are battling to get the attention of fashion lovers while sharing the message of Jesus but struggle through the trend setters of this world. Our clothing does not just share the message, but it's designers merge trendy and holiness all in one fabric!

story:
Why do I have nothing to wear?

This is a question you've asked yourself before a lot right? Why does it seem like although your closet is stuffed full of a bajillion things you've bought for the past 5 years you still can't manage to put together a decent outfit for your friend's wedding or simply a night out? 

This is where Mooch steps in. 

We're creating a solution that will allow you to extend your wardrobe and enable you to enjoy new and popular fashion trends without the expensive price tag (in fact, for totally free!). 


What is Mooch? 

A new mobile app that makes it easy & convenient to share wardrobes with friends!

-Find new & exciting outfits or complete the perfect outfit.

-Enjoy fashion trends by having a 10 times bigger wardrobe.

-Save money by avoiding one time purchases.


So how does Mooch work?

Using Mooch Is Easy!

1. List what you don’t really wear and lend it to your friends. 

2. Browse & borrow outfits and other wardrobe items from your friends.

3. Wear the perfect outfit or complete an incomplete outfit (ex: when you need the right shoes or handbag to go with the dress!). 

4. Return and rate your experience!    

Awesome features you can enjoy with Mooch

- No need to create a profile, just Login with Facebook in seconds!

- Borrow & lend outfits and other wardrobe items with your friends. 

- List & Lend wardrobe items you don’t really wear anymore for your friends to borrow (in-app camera feature & description fields make this easy!)

- Browse & Borrow Dresses, heels, shoes, accessories, jewelry, sweaters/jackets, athletic wear or any other wardrobe item from your friends.

- In-app maps features allows you to select the distance you feel comfortable walking or driving to pickup the outfit/item you want to borrow.

- Select pick-up and drop-off times & send your friend a borrow request! 

- As a lender edit pick-up & drop-off times as needed.

- In-app messaging allows you to chat with your friend about pick/drop logistics, information about the item or anything else! 

- Push notifications remind you when you need to pick up & return your item or when your item is scheduled to be returned.

- User ratings help you evaluate the credibility of the borrower! 

- “Info” page is included to show you a step by step on how to use Mooch as well as answer FAQ’s. 

- Your profile page helps you keep track of what you are borrowing, your pending requests, requests for your listings, what you are lending & your current listings. 

Mooch makes sharing wardrobes with friends a breeze!

  

Our exciting plans

The Mooch team is passionate about reaching our goals, but we can't do it without you. With your help, Mooch will be able to reach the following major milestones: 

Once we raise $25,000 - Launch the Mooch app as soon as possible & bring it to your area.

If we raise $50,000! - There's a lot of cool features we have in mind but we can't squeeze them all in our first version. With your help & support we want to include the following awesome features to our app:

- A "borrow to buy" option for those times you think "Hmm this dress is way too cute.. can I just go ahead and keep it?!" 

- Create groups with your close friends and join organizations in your area. Use this feature for shoutouts - need something specific like a sequin red dress? let your fellow moochers know. 

- Looking for new outfit ideas or simply want to keep up with trending celeb fashion? The Mooch featured and trending fashionistas section will let allow you to keep up with that new romper Taylor Swift's been rockin' on magazine covers.

- Organize events with local fashionistas to enjoy a glass of wine & swap outfits while making new friends. 

- Ability to share your shameless Mooching activities on different social media platforms, show off those sparkly heels you found on Mooch, that you didn't even pay for ;)

If we raise $100,000! - It doesn't stop at nationwide app launch & a bunch of exciting new additional features. 

If we cross this stretch goal we want to expand our app internationally and make mooching even more convenient for you! A larger budget like this will allow us to build partnerships with delivery companies and partner with new clothing brands so you can be the first to mooch trending fashion, the opportunities are endless. 

So you've got some more questions..

What kind of things can I list to lend? 

You can list any wardrobe items including dresses, skirts, heels, accessories, jewelry, tops, scarves, belts, jackets/sweaters, athletic wear, etc. 

How can I make sure my stuff is returned in good condition?

We want you to only lend items you feel comfortable lending, and only to people you trust. Although Mooch cannot reimburse you for lost, stolen or damaged items, we do offer you a way to rate your borrowing and lending experience with your fellow moochers. We highly encouraged borrowing & lending amongst trusted friends, especially those who have good ratings! 

When will I get my stuff back?

As the lender, you can modify the return date. If the borrower needs to pickup/return your item(s) sooner or later they can communicate with you via the in-app chat but ultimately you make the decision to edit pickup/drop off dates. 

When do I rate the person I lent my item to?

Once the drop-off time has passed, you as a lender have the option to rate your experience with the borrower. If you want to give the borrower more time to return the item before you rate them, you can just change the return date.

What if I need to change the pick-up/drop-off up dates, but I'm a borrower?

You can communicate with the lender via the in-app chat, if the lender is okay with modifying the pick-up/drop-off dates they can change these at their discretion.

Do I have to pay to borrow something?

Nope, mooch is a completely free borrowing and lending platform. You should never ask or be asked to provide money on the side in order to borrow or lend using mooch.

Is mooch for women’s clothing items only?

Yes, Mooch is currently only for the women’s clothing & fashion space. Mooch Group, Inc. is working on plans to launch similar apps for men’s clothing & other items such as electronics, books, games, etc. in the future. 

If you love our app, we'd love your help.

We've been building a fantastic app that pre-beta users already love, but we need your help in finishing development & rolling out the app nationwide as soon as possible.

We need $25,000 which will be used exactly as listed below: 

  • $20,000: Finishing app development, beta testing, app improvement & fixes.
  • $2,500: Marketing & Promotional costs to bring Mooch to you. 
  • $2,500: Building an initial inventory of wardrobe items.

Mooch Group, Inc. promises that every dollar you contribute will be used for the purpose of finishing app development, improving the app, bringing the app to your area & building a base mooch inventory.

If you are unable to help financially, please see below for other ways you can help make Mooch a success! 

How can I help spread the word about Mooch? 

If you can't help financially but still want to help we completely understand & appreciate your time & support! Below are ways you can help make Mooch a success: 

  • Like & Follow our Social Media accounts on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram & Pinterest.
  • Share our campaign page on your social media platforms. 
  • Tell your friends and family about Mooch.
  • Contact us if you interested in becoming part of the team in any way. 

(Find our social media pages on www.mooch.xyz under "Contact")

Facebook: facebook.com/themoochapp

Instagram, Twitter & Pinterest: @themoochapp


Subscribe Now to Get Mooching!

Our App launch is less than a month away! Visit our website to learn more and be one of the first users! www.mooch.xyz

Mooch Some Cool Rewards!

$5 Level: The Quick sMooch!

our supporters get a big THANKS from the Mooch team on Twitter!


$10 Level: VIP Fashionista!

As a VIP Fashionista enjoy early access to exciting features such as: 

 - A "borrow to boy" option (instead of only borrowing, you have the option to buy) 

- Create groups with your close friends & make shoutouts when you need something specific ("Anyone have a red sequin dress my size I can borrow for the weekend?!") 

- Access our featured fashionista section to see who has the cutest trending outfits around you. + more exciting surprise features! :)

- Organize local borrow/lend/swap & Mooch events with those in your area!
- Show off what you found on Mooch by sharing it on social media! 
+ more surprise exciting features!! :) 

$10 Level: The Mini-Moocher Pack!

- A big Thank you shoutout from the Mooch Team on Twitter
Plus a Mooch Bumper Sticker to show off your Mooch-e-ness!


$25 Level: The Trend Setter Pack!

- A big Thank you shoutout from the Mooch Team on Twitter

- Mooch Bumper Sticker to show off your Mooch-e-ness!

Plus Score a Premium Mooch Membership for a year! A $60+ Value!


$35 Level: The Fashionista!

- A big Thank you shoutout from the Mooch Team on Twitter

- Mooch Bumper Sticker to show off your Mooch-e-ness

- Score a Premium Mooch Membership for a year! A $60+ Value!

Plus a Mooch brand Teaser Tank top, color of your choice!


$55 Level: The Big Moocher Pack

- A big Thank you shoutout from the Mooch Team on Twitter

- Mooch Bumper Sticker to show off your Mooch-e-ness

- Score a Premium Mooch Membership for a year! A $60+ Value!

- Mooch brand Teaser Tank top, color of your choice

Plus a Mooch Promo 3-in-1 Fashion Emergency Kit!

Of course, the greatest reward we can offer to you for contributing to Mooch is rolling out the app nationwide as soon as we can, allowing you to unlimit your wardrobe. 

The Mooch difference

With your help & contribution Mooch can help you and your friends enjoy a 10 times bigger wardrobe without spending an extra penny. 

Contribute today & get a head start on mooching!

Our Team

Mooch Group, Inc. is a team of passionate entrepreneurs with one goal in mind: to create the most trusted sharing communities in the world. 

We came up with the idea of Mooch because we believe in a sharing community where people can enjoy diverse, exciting & limitless wardrobe options without breaking the bank. 

Our current team consists of:

  • Shubhankan Jain: Co-Founder & CEO 
  • AJ Silverman: Co-Founder & COO/CTO
  • Harsh Jain: Head of Strategy
  • Gozde Basar: Marketing & Social Media 
  • Brian Heller: iOS Front-End Development Lead
  • Shelby Simpson: iOS Back-End & Android Lead
  • Carlton Bishop: IndieGoGo Campaign Manager

Together, as a team of 7 we come from diverse backgrounds including Software Design, Project Management, Computer Science, Accounting & Finance, Marketing, and of course.

One thing that brings us together is our love for fashion. 

Our team is working aggressively to finish app development so we can bring the app to market & into your hands. 

Thank you for your interest & support,
The Mooch Team

story:
*We love feedback, requests and questions! You can email us at hello@dauntless-clothing.com 

Dauntless is a cruelty free and sustainable outerwear brand from New York City. We require additional funding to launch our inaugural capsule collection without compromising our principles of sustainable production methods and fair wages. 

Our mission is to bring affordable and socially conscious fashion to the masses, through high end designs, top quality materials and a well-tailored fit for fashion forward consumers.

We will show customers that even if it is sustainable or reused materials, quality is not compromised. Technology today has allowed us to recycle, be sustainable and have the same quality as the virgin material. We need to move away from this misconception. We want to keep our designs on trend in order to build our customer base and cause ‘regular’ fashion consumers to join our philosophy.




We are looking for funding because we need help to start our production, so we can launch our brand and our first collection. 
As with any venture there are challenges.  With your help we can overcome these hurdles and launch a great brand with an important mission. 

With the funds and exposure you will help this woman owned company come to life and create brand awareness. Fashion shouldn’t and doesn’t align with animal cruelty or exploitation of labor, low wages or damage to our environment. Building personal relationships with our factory is important to us. We make sure that the conditions of the factory workers are up to our standards.

We are opting for a locally produced line in small quantities – this is crucial to the success of a clothing start-up. We don't want to create such a big inventory because it leads to waste. We are trying to be as sustainable as possible. 

We want to continue to explore new innovative ways to remain or become sustainable and eco-friendly with our garments. We want our materials to be consistently improved and updated with composites that are less harmful to our environment. For example lining coming from recycled water bottles, or recycled trims. 

This campaign is crucial in making this brand a reality. It is our generation's responsibility to save our planet and create awareness for those who dismiss this important issue. 

The outerwear line consists of vegan leather and wool jackets, all 100% cruelty free and made with sustainable production methods. The lining of the jackets varies because we use surplus fabrics from the garment district in New York City. 

The faux/vegan leather and wool is sourced to have the best sustainable production methods. It’s important for us not to use leather. We don’t like hurting animals and care about the welfare of the planet. Various vegan leathers are used in production, the scientific terms is PU (polyurethane). We continuously try to improve the sustainability of all our materials. 

Global consumers are changing what they wear based on how and where the materials are being sourced from. They are more conscious when buying clothing.

We only collaborate with factories that are in line with our mission and vision. Furthermore, thanks to their durability and strength of our garments can last, hence, are sustainable products.

Dauntless aims to instill a sense of innate and powerful confidence in the wearer while becoming the staple jacket of their wardrobe, spreading the idea of socially conscious fashion.

We strongly believed in word of mouth and when a friend or family member recommends a product, you tend to believe it more than what you see in the media. The story of our inspirations helps our customers understand what they are acquiring, which subsequently builds a relationship with us. 

Become a leader of this movement and part of our community to be sustainable and conscious of how we live and what we consume!


Behind the scenes street-style photoshoot in collaboration with
other sustainable brands.


Dauntless-Clothing, LLC was founded in 2015 in New York City by Paula Maldonado, a Colombian designer and entrepreneur. Her experience in the global luxury market and creative agencies made her realize the need to bring socially conscious and affordable fashion to the masses.  A mixture of her affinity for the perfect fit, her passion for sustainability and the need for conscious pricing led to the conception of Dauntless. Our initial collection was designed with a global customer in mind – a citizen of the world who craves quality of materials, a well-tailored fit, and a fashion forward silhouette at an accessible price.  

"We are trying to change the way people live on this planet, not taking advantage of it and the beautiful animals that live in it. We are far from perfect, but somebody has to do it." - Founder

Behind the scenes street-style photoshoot in collaboration with other sustainable brands.



Dauntless-Clothing, LLC was founded in 2015 in New York City by Paula Maldonado, a Colombian designer and entrepreneur. Her experience in the global luxury market and creative agencies made her realize the need to bring socially conscious and affordable fashion to the masses.  A mixture of her affinity for the perfect fit, her passion for sustainability and the need for conscious pricing led to the conception of Dauntless. Our initial collection was designed with a global customer in mind – a citizen of the world who craves quality of materials, a well-tailored fit, and a fashion forward silhouette at an accessible price.  


"We are trying to change the way people live on this planet, not taking advantage of it and the beautiful animals that live in it. We are far from perfect, but somebody has to do it." - Founder

story:
Button™ is a revolutionary device that allows you to alert your loved ones with your whereabouts when you’re under an emergency situation, no matter where you are. You can alert loved ones without letting people around you know, shall the need arise, as it is very small and can be hidden in your clothes.

Button™ is constantly connected to your mobile phone, through an easy sync process. When you click the Button™, our app immediately finds out your location. Your phone immediately starts recording audio, and starts streaming this to our servers. 

Both your location and the audio that’s being recorded is then sent to a list of predetermined people or authorities. 

They are first alerted through a text message and an e-mail. If a receiver doesn’t click the link to check out the voice recording within the 45 seconds, they are alerted via a phone call. And if you are worried about clicking the Button™ accidentally, worry not. The way the Button™ is designed makes this impossible.  

Follow us on Facebook for more safety information!

We have competition that knows what they're doing - but the Button is undoubtedly better.

It's much easier to click the Button™ than ROAR, thanks to its bigger clickable part. This ensures that you can alert loved ones easier and with precise timing, with no mistakes. 

Button™ makes your phone record and live stream sound from its microphone, enabling your loved ones or authorities to precisely know what's happening around you. Ask any 911 operator - this function is crucial.

Button™ vibrates when you click it - ROAR emits a very loud noise. This could prove to be dangerous, as in certain situations that involve physical assault, the noise might motivate your attacker to be more violent.

Button™ is designed for maximum stealth. What would an assailant do if you took out your phone and called 911 during a robbery? Letting them know you alerted people is not worth the risk.

You know Button™ sent a distress signal with a vibration only you can feel. You can cancel the signal by holding the Button™ down for 5 seconds, only within 20 seconds after clicking it for the first time. 

And finally, Button™ is for everyone. From women who are worried about safety, to elders who are worried about possible bitter scenarios. Men who undertake dangerous jobs or drive a lot. 

Button is for everyone. It is for you.



Our mobile app is going to be available for iPhone and Android. It is going to have additional features that will help you be safer. It is designed to work perfectly with Button™.



We have a working prototype, and need very few adjustments to be ready for final production.

We have contacts in Europe and Asia that are ready to start the production process as soon as we have the funds.

We'll get the plastic injection mold developed as soon as our campaign is over. We are in talks with production factories in the U.S., Europe, and Asia - and we'll go with the one that proves most effective in terms of quality.

We have electronical/computer engineers ready to perfect our circuitry - we are aiming for absolute perfection.

If you've read this far, you're a person who'd rather be safe than sorry.  That's smart.

After all, what is more important than safety?


We're handing out Button™ a ridiculous price of $69 for our backers! We are really grateful for your support!  

Button™ is perfect for elderly people. All they need to do when something goes awry is click the Button™, and help will get to them before it's too late. Give the gift of safety to your parents!

With your help and encouragement, this project will be a success. We will make a safety device like this accessible to the public, and potentially save thousands of lives. Together.

You can easily wear Button™ under your clothes and hide it for maximum stealth and safety.

Long road trips? Attach your Button™ to your car's dashboard, and you'll be able to reach loved ones or authorities ASAP if something happens. Instantly.

Button's wristband attachment lets you use it stylishly on the go. Available for free with all perks, along with the necklace and belt clip accessories!

Do you think someone you love needs to be safer? Share us with them on Facebook, and enter a raffle to get one of the 5 Buttons™! (You don't need to do anything other than sharing us with them.)


1) Does Button use up a lot of my phone's battery, since it's connected to it all the time?

A: Barely. Button might use around 5-8% more than normal throughout your day, but nothing substantial. Safety is worth the 5% battery capacity. :)


2) Does Button work everywhere in the world?

A: Yes! As long as you have an active data or Wi-Fi connection on your phone, Button will work perfectly anywhere in the world.

3) How long does the battery last?

A: Our current circuit, which runs on BLE 4.0, barely consumes any power on Button's current 135mAh battery. We estimate around 2 to 3 months of battery life right now, with possible improvements to the final version.

4) How does the voice recording and GPS tracking features work?

A: When you click the Button, your phone immediately finds out where you are, and starts recording sound through its microphone.
It's essentially recording evidence that can help your loved ones or authorities get to you faster.

story:
Muchimoo was founded in 2017 with the dream of bringing something different to the world of fashion.

Muchimoo grew up in Salento, the southern part of the Apulia region, a sun-kissed territory fringed by two seas, the Adriatic and the Ionic. The area boasts a fabulous landscape tinged with Middle Age Oriental hue and drystone walls and between these magical lands a millenary treasure is to be found: olive trees. 

Deeply proud of its heritage, Muchimoo creates in this very region unique classic loafers. The company has spent one whole year working on a new design and is now looking forward to launch it.  But what is the link between olives trees and a young fashion startup?

Today, olive orchards in Salento are in danger, the whole Salento is in danger. By 2013, olive trees started to show unusual symptoms of decline. It was discovered that several olive trees were affected by Xylella Fastidiosa, a terrible bacteria that would not leave until the death of the tree. Today, the bacteria is spreading at an increasing rate. Farmers whose families have tended olives for generations watched their trees dry up and their businesses plummet.

We, from Muchimoo, needed to do something. We had our new loafer model ready to go to market, so we partnered with Save the Olives, a local NGO focused on protecting century old olive trees. We designed  four limited olive tree themed loafers, which we are offering at an amazing price here on Indiegogo. Part of the revenue from the sales will fully fund a program aimed to re-plant bacteria resistant Olive trees in the most affected areas of Salento.

 

Our goal was to create a loafer that was extremely comfortable, 100% made in Italy, with first class quality, and with high price value. It seemed impossible...but we made it! We took inspiration from the classic and timeless designs but we added innovation and a touch of brilliance!

Below you can find Muchimoo's four different models, each comes in red, black, dark green or dark blue and each model has a male and a female version.

 

 

 

 

                                  

 

THE LOAFERS ARE NOT MANUFACTURED UNTIL THE ORDER IS CONFIRMED  PRODUCTION CAN TAKE UP TO 3 WEEKS

   

We can proudly say that within these loafers, traditional values and technology go hand in hand. Every piece is cut, binded, glued, skived and lasted by expert hands hand with the support of the latest technologies.   

   

   

                             

Our suppliers are all in Salento and we managed to centralize all our processes from production to final shipment, drastically reducing our environmental impact and our final costs. 

 

Xylella fastidiosa is a pathogen bacterium transmitted by the insects that feed on the plants’ lymph. It was believed to be isolated into South America until when it was discovered in Salento in 2013. It might have traveled from South America to Europe by importing ornamental plants hosting the bacterium. 

Olive trees are so important that are considered as the "cultural heritage" of Salento.  Olive trees are not merely a decorative natural item to the landscape. The Salento area without olive trees is inconceivable and the economy would suffer terribly. To date the olive oil production has fallen by 65% and if no action is taken the situation will worsen. 

Science has not found a solution yet. It has been proposed to create buffer zones by deforesting areas wide as 20 km, form one side to the other of the Apulia region. But such containment measures encountered serious challenges, from public reluctance to lack of effective actions by governmental authorities.

Now, due to Xylella fastidiosa, the scenery has terribly changed. Entire fields of centuries-old olive trees have been severely injured and killed. Thousands have remained untreated and have rapidly dried up. Green has changed into brown and life has turned to death.

Following the outbreak of Xylella Fastidiosa in 2013 in Salento, the bacterium has the ability to spread throughout the Mediterranean basin starting from our peninsula. After having infected the Apulia region, it can spread in all Italian regions where quality olive cultivation is practiced (Tuscany, Sicily, etc.). Crossing the Italian borders the bacterium is already present in France, Spain, and Iran with imminent risk of arriving in all the Mediterranean countries. If no effective containment measures are taken, the outcomes could be catastrophic for the biodiversity, economy and landscape of the whole Mediterranean region.

Until the olive trees fell ill, Xylella had never been seen in Europe, and its identification in Salento set off alarm bells across the scientific and political communities. Farmers desperately tried to save their olive groves, but without success.

We from Muchimoo, do not have a science lab yet, therefore our way to fight back the bacteria, is by supporting the local communities in planting bacteria resistant olive trees (Leccino and Favolosa species).

 

We have partnered with Save the Olives, a local NGO detached by politics and believing in a sustainable future for agriculture in their beloved Salento. With the funds generated by this campaign, Save the Olives will plant-bacteria resistant olive trees in target fields of South Salento, the area most affected by Xylella Fastidiosa.
story_txt: Muchimoo was founded in 2017 with the dream of bringing something different to the world of fashion.Muchimoo grew up in Salento, the southern part of the Apulia region, a sun-kissed territory fringed by two seas, the Adriatic and the Ionic. The area boasts a fabulous landscape tinged with Middle Age Oriental hue and drystone walls and between these magical lands a millenary treasure is to be found: olive trees. Deeply proud of its heritage, Muchimoo creates in this very region unique classic loafers. The company has spent one whole year working on a new design and is now looking forward to launch it.  But what is the link between olives trees and a young fashion startup?Today, olive orchards in Salento are in danger, the whole Salento is in danger. By 2013, olive trees started to show unusual symptoms of decline. It was discovered that several olive trees were affected by Xylella Fastidiosa, a terrible bacteria that would not leave until the death of the tree. Today, the bacteria is spreading at an increasing rate. Farmers whose families have tended olives for generations watched their trees dry up and their businesses plummet.We, from Muchimoo, needed to do something. We had our new loafer model ready to go to market, so we partnered with Save the Olives, a local NGO focused on protecting century old olive trees. We designed  four limited olive tree themed loafers, which we are offering at an amazing price here on Indiegogo. Part of the revenue from the sales will fully fund a program aimed to re-plant bacteria resistant Olive trees in the most affected areas of Salento. Our goal was to create a loafer that was extremely comfortable, 100% made in Italy, with first class quality, and with high price value. It seemed impossible...but we made it! We took inspiration from the classic and timeless designs but we added innovation and a touch of brilliance!Below you can find Muchimoo's four different models, each comes in red, black, dark green or dark blue and each model has a male and a female version.                                       THE LOAFERS ARE NOT MANUFACTURED UNTIL THE ORDER IS CONFIRMED  PRODUCTION CAN TAKE UP TO 3 WEEKS   We can proudly say that within these loafers, traditional values and technology go hand in hand. Every piece is cut, binded, glued, skived and lasted by expert hands hand with the support of the latest technologies.                                      Our suppliers are all in Salento and we managed to centralize all our processes from production to final shipment, drastically reducing our environmental impact and our final costs.  Xylella fastidiosa is a pathogen bacterium transmitted by the insects that feed on the plants’ lymph. It was believed to be isolated into South America until when it was discovered in Salento in 2013. It might have traveled from South America to Europe by importing ornamental plants hosting the bacterium. Olive trees are so important that are considered as the "cultural heritage" of Salento.  Olive trees are not merely a decorative natural item to the landscape. The Salento area without olive trees is inconceivable and the economy would suffer terribly. To date the olive oil production has fallen by 65% and if no action is taken the situation will worsen. Science has not found a solution yet. It has been proposed to create buffer zones by deforesting areas wide as 20 km, form one side to the other of the Apulia region. But such containment measures encountered serious challenges, from public reluctance to lack of effective actions by governmental authorities.Now, due to Xylella fastidiosa, the scenery has terribly changed. Entire fields of centuries-old olive trees have been severely injured and killed. Thousands have remained untreated and have rapidly dried up. Green has changed into brown and life has turned to death.Following the outbreak of Xylella Fastidiosa in 2013 in Salento, the bacterium has the ability to spread throughout the Mediterranean basin starting from our peninsula. After having infected the Apulia region, it can spread in all Italian regions where quality olive cultivation is practiced (Tuscany, Sicily, etc.). Crossing the Italian borders the bacterium is already present in France, Spain, and Iran with imminent risk of arriving in all the Mediterranean countries. If no effective containment measures are taken, the outcomes could be catastrophic for the biodiversity, economy and landscape of the whole Mediterranean region.Until the olive trees fell ill, Xylella had never been seen in Europe, and its identification in Salento set off alarm bells across the scientific and political communities. Farmers desperately tried to save their olive groves, but without success.We from Muchimoo, do not have a science lab yet, therefore our way to fight back the bacteria, is by supporting the local communities in planting bacteria resistant olive trees (Leccino and Favolosa species). We have partnered with Save the Olives, a local NGO detached by politics and believing in a sustainable future for agriculture in their beloved Salento. With the funds generated by this campaign, Save the Olives will plant-bacteria resistant olive trees in target fields of South Salento, the area most affected by Xylella Fastidiosa.

story:
Short Summary

I am a streamer on Meet Me, and an ambassador/model for several companies. I recently decided to stop spending so much money on makeup that only did the bare minimum. I found a company based out of North America, and decided to partner up with them to create and sell an AMAZING product! I hope you love these products just as much as I do!
story_txt:
Short Summary
I am a streamer on Meet Me, and an ambassador/model for several companies. I recently decided to stop spending so much money on makeup that only did the bare minimum. I found a company based out of North America, and decided to partner up with them to create and sell an AMAZING product! I hope you love these products just as much as I do!

story:
The PD 5 Series Watch was originally launched in July 2020 on Kickstarter. Unfortunately it did not reach its goal. We are eternally grateful for all the support and positive feedback we received from surprisingly places as far away as Japan. This gave us renewed vigor to bring the PD 5 Series Watch to the luxury affordable watch ethos.

Some feedbacks were hard to read but they were mostly informative and constructive. 

These were mostly the common themes and this is how we remedied them.

 

  1. Introductory price (Super Early Bird): The main contributing cost to producing our watch was having two (2) separate companies fabricate specialized aspects of the watch (The Dial). We have consolidated this issue by acquiring a manufacturer capable of performing both functions without reducing the quality of the components. 
  2. Rewards Adjustments: We have reduced the quantities per reward level as recommend via feedbacks. However, there is a significant reduction in unit price due to restructuring our manufacturing set up. The minimum reward discount is now 50% of MSRP all across the board.

We were so grateful to succeed on our second attempt on Kickstarter with funding of 367% of goal. Now we are expanding our community to Indiegogo.

The PD 5 Series Watch is an authentic attempt to create a true high quality, affordable hybrid watch. It’s sporty yet elegant, highly precise and reliable, with a wealth of unique features that make it wear incredibly comfortable on your wrist. This design is Panathenaic inspired and strives to integrate premium marble into a modern contemporary style.

 

These timepieces are the test of our skill and ambitions through which we want to develop a strong brand with individuality in our signature watches. Below you can learn even more interesting things about the PD 5 Series and view spectacular photos of the first prototypes. Hope you'll like it!

We shared the pre-Production Prototypes to a private Facebook Group of watch enthusiasts around the world to see what they thought of the PD 5 Series Watch. 

Here is what they had to say.

It may seem tricky to tell the time on the PD 5 Series, but it's pretty easy! After some practice you'll be feeling yourself comfortable in telling the time with precision.

 

The PD 5 Series is a great everyday watch that can be worn in any situation. Perfect for an elegant occasion on a leather strap, at the beach or during a mountain bike ride with a silicone strap, this watch won’t let you down. It is built as robust as any watches but has an elegant twist to it. For the weekend warriors, the watch nerds, the outdoor survivalists and the office heroes alike, the PD 5 Series is the perfect fit for people who appreciate the fine art of watchmaking and the beauty of intricate mechanics. The PD 5 Series is a watch for people who wander off the beaten path and are looking for something unique, with all the assurances a successful and experienced watch brand can offer.

LIKE & SHARE

Join our social media communities to learn the receive the freshest news faster and get cool pics of our watches directly to your feed. And don't  forget to share our posts with your friends or drop us a comment in the comment section! We'll be very grateful for your assistance and you still can support our campaign with a good word.

 

Risks and challenges

We are still new to Indiegogo, but our manufacturing team has over 10 years of experience in the watch industry. We are aware our project is complex and that there are always unforeseen issues, but we have anticipated and planned for potential risks and have built a production and delivery plan. Firstly, Our production is quite advanced, and you can be confident about our capacity to provide high-quality products on time. We spent over 8 months designing, developing, and receiving finalized samples while working with the master. Secondly, we have skillful and professional manufacturers who do not anticipate delays in our timeline. It supposes to set up two periods for our customers. However, if by chance, anything unexpected happens, we promise to keep you informed, both during the campaign and afterward. Thanks for all the support! We are excited to take this next step with you, the Indiegogo community!

story:
In order to prevent the spread of infectious diseases, face masks & face coverings have become a necessity & a requirement. 

The safety of our most vulnerable members of society are compromised by this necessity. Members of our community who are already at risk of physical injury due to their occupations, lifestyle choices, age, stature, mobility etc, are further compromised by the potential of not being seen while out in public or on the job. 

This group includes cyclist, bike messengers/delivery men, joggers/runners, crossing guards, the elderly, small children, sanitation workers, skaters, & construction workers, to name a few.

The Hi-Visibility Reflective face mask was developed & designed with their safety in mind. 

  • Lime background color for daytime high visibility & 2 inch silver reflective stripes for low light visibility.
  • Infused with teflon fabric protector to repel liquids & prevent stains & fading, increasing the life span & effectiveness of the mask.
  • Inner & outer orange mesh provide a double layer of protection & comfort.
  • Elastic straps fit comfortably over ears for longterm wear.
  • Adjustable nose wire.
  • Styles may vary.

The response to the Hi-Visibility Reflective face mask has been gratifying but also overwhelming. Keeping up with the growing demand has proven to be more difficult than previously anticipated. Since the beginning, the OD LOCAL Hi-Visibility Reflective masks have been manufactured & distributed by a staff of one, working diligently around the clock, in a small NYC apartment. The manufacturing process from start to finish is labor intensive & has become too much for one person to handle. This operation has outgrown its origins. 

This campaign is only the first step to the necessary expansion needed to supply the demand of the Hi-Visibility Reflective Face Masks. ODLOCAL needs your help bringing this product to the public.

    ODLOCAL is seeking $15,000 in contributions

    Pledges will help to achieve very specific goals & address very specific needs while creating LOCAL jobs & giving back to our LOCAL communities.

    • Hiring two LOCAL full time summer employees.
    • Securing a larger workspace for increased production.
    • Acquiring TWO new sewing machines.
    • Purchasing necessary materials (Fabric, Elastic, Labels, Packaging, Needles, Thread, Etc)
    • For every pledge made, ONE child sized Hi-Visibility Reflective face mask will be donated to children living in LOCAL homeless shelters.

story:
Story

Design and entrepreneurship have always been passions of mine. Through this company, I use board graphics to showcase my interests and inspirations, because I've found many skate graphics don't really represent my friends and I. Another motive in starting Sequoia is to bring awareness to certain issues in today's society, knowing the skater community is an amazing source of outreach and we can unify for any cause.

Currently, I have a couple of digital designs for boards, mostly nature oriented, because my first goal is to raise awareness for climate change and our earth.

I've also designed a couple logos and have received 3 sample boards with my first 3 designs. I can contribute great boards and products to the skating community. Not only will the launch of Sequoia fulfill a lifelong dream, It will also provide awesome skateboards and products aimed at celebrating nature and life.

Risks and Challenges

Some of the risks and challenges I might face are shipping uncertainties, due to the whole pandemic thing, but I have set the estimate date a bit later in order to factor in shipping delays or any other problems. In order to mitigate financial risk, I plan to sell my product through Five Points Skateboards and other local skate shops, as well as an online store.

story:
There is NOTHING worse than being hot with no way to cool off!  Sure, we all love warm weather, but I think we can all agree that we don’t like being uncomfortable... That’s why blö's creator Rob, decided his next project in life would be to create a portable device to help people cool off when it’s too hot!

Introducing blö, the future of wearable cooling technology....

blö is a patent pending cooling device that is small, lightweight, and rechargeable.  You can use blö to cool off during a variety of activities such as running, hiking, biking, working out, and anything else!  

The reality is, our climate has changed throughout the passing years. The temperatures have continued to soar higher and higher.

With overall temperatures increasing, blö is the quickest and most convenient way to stay cool, calm, and collected during hot weather. 

blö was designed to keep you cool without being clunky or noticeable. The honeycomb structure (the larger, round part) is actually the air intake.  The skinny part is where the cool air is released….

Keep your blö micro cooling device charged on the go! Our blö Power Bank fully charges your blö in just 1 hour and 15 minutes! Get yours today and stay cool wherever you go! 

Clip on blö to the shirt collar, air down the back / inside of the shirt…..

Clip blö on to your front collar, send air down the front, inside of your shirt….

Clip your blö on to the back of your waist.  The air goes up the back, and inside the shirt....

blö can be used in any situation where you need to beat the heat and keep cool. Whether you're working on your fitness, taking a stroll with your kids, or simply just want to enjoy the warm weather without the sweat, blö will keep you cool and comfortable.

blö can be used even when you're dressed up and can blend in with your outfit while you're walking to work, or even going out with friends!

Not only is it your very own portable cooling device, but by combining the airflow with special attachable essential oil inserts, blö allows essential oil users to enjoy the health benefits of their small diffuser on the go.

Using peppermint oil makes the air come out much colder. Not only that, it smells great too and has healing properties!

We also recommend using lemongrass essential oil! It both repels mosquitos and relaxes you at the same time, but you can add other oils as well.

The cool thing about blö is it is designed so you can add whatever essential oils you want depending on your preference! The possibilities are endless!

Here at blö, we strive to keep the Earth as cool and comfortable as we do you! That's why our essential oil inserts are created using sustainable materials: recycled tin, plastic, and felt! 

blö comes in a variety of colors to fit into your life and style.

Choose what color you want when you back the campaign! 

 

 

 

How did we get here? Here’s the quick version. Founder and CEO, Rob Lupi, served four years in the Marine Corps working in the intelligence field. As anyone in the military knows, they carry excessive amounts of gear in brutally hot climates. It’s not even remotely comfortable, in fact it’s downright miserable. Unfortunately, there wasn’t much he could do about it.

After Rob left the military, he went to UCLA, studied psychology, and surfed as much as he could. Upon graduating, his plan was to take government contracting jobs (the ones where if he told you, he’d have to kill you ;-) Jk! ), all over the world and surf. Rob did that for several years and lived in some awesome places!  Almost all of them were hot and humid, and nothing existed that you could take with you to cool off outside. This was a reoccurring problem for him and there was no solution in sight….

Eventually Rob made his way back to Los Angeles where he was attending business school at USC. One day he was out drinking with some friends during a heatwave in downtown LA. Rob and his friends were “literally” dying...they were all dripping buckets of sweat. It was the fifth day of 100-degree weather, with no end in sight. While they were bar hopping, and complaining about how hot it was outside, Rob casually mentioned that it would be great if there was portable AC that you could clip in your collar that would cool you off while you were walking outside. Rob's friends loved the idea and they talked about it the rest of the night. Little did he know, this was the beginning of blö.

 

THANK YOU!

We (Rob, Andy, Collin) are very excited to have created this micro cooling device, and to be able to finally share it with you. We hope you love your blö just as much as we do! Here's to keeping you cool, calm, and comfortable. Thank you to all backers for helping make blö a reality!

story:
Short Summary

I'm Masato Jones since graduating from the prestigious Central St Martins in 2009 since then I have worked in a couture setting with Giles Deacon, Bruce Oldfield, Henry Holland, Galia Lahav (Israel), English National Ballet as well as many red carpet events, film, TV, theatre and clients such as Beverley Knight. Many others I have created which I will not mention as confidentiality is key to me.  

What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to create an experience for Leeds that gives bespoke clothing at an affordable price for my expertise. 

We are looking to raise enough funds to create a high quality refurbishment of Thorntons Arcade shop the 1st floor will be an invitation only atelier space where you can consult a design of you're own for a birthday, wedding, event and the ground floor will be a space for my designs and other designers who are looking for exposure. 

We have unique perks to support us from £5 as a lift to get things off the ground to a special discounted offer of one to one tutorial or a bespoke piece of clothing. 

There is a risk we may not reach our £9000 goal if we do not receive this we will be able to use the monies raised and build up as we go. 

Why Leeds 

I love Leeds and love the nature around Yorkshire. 

Yorkshire inspires my imagination and create my style much stronger and unique.

What I love to have is a personal relationship with my clients helping to feel special with my garments that is made especially for you. Every time visiting Leeds just making me feel belong strongly and simply want to connect by what I do.

Risks & Challenges

There are few risks as we have signed the lease for the shop and we have the funding for the initial months. 

Risks if any are Covid19 and the perks may need to move forward eg August or September 2021 however the intention is to deliver the perks in the months allocated and agreed between us. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can contribute £5 please do if not please on your socials give us a plug so we can achieve the least which is £500.
story_txt:
Short Summary
I'm Masato Jones since graduating from the prestigious Central St Martins in 2009 since then I have worked in a couture setting with Giles Deacon, Bruce Oldfield, Henry Holland, Galia Lahav (Israel), English National Ballet as well as many red carpet events, film, TV, theatre and clients such as Beverley Knight. Many others I have created which I will not mention as confidentiality is key to me.  
What We Need & What You Get
We are looking to create an experience for Leeds that gives bespoke clothing at an affordable price for my expertise. 
We are looking to raise enough funds to create a high quality refurbishment of Thorntons Arcade shop the 1st floor will be an invitation only atelier space where you can consult a design of you're own for a birthday, wedding, event and the ground floor will be a space for my designs and other designers who are looking for exposure. 
We have unique perks to support us from £5 as a lift to get things off the ground to a special discounted offer of one to one tutorial or a bespoke piece of clothing. 
There is a risk we may not reach our £9000 goal if we do not receive this we will be able to use the monies raised and build up as we go. 
Why Leeds 
I love Leeds and love the nature around Yorkshire. 
Yorkshire inspires my imagination and create my style much stronger and unique.
What I love to have is a personal relationship with my clients helping to feel special with my garments that is made especially for you. Every time visiting Leeds just making me feel belong strongly and simply want to connect by what I do.
Risks & Challenges
There are few risks as we have signed the lease for the shop and we have the funding for the initial months. 
Risks if any are Covid19 and the perks may need to move forward eg August or September 2021 however the intention is to deliver the perks in the months allocated and agreed between us. 
Other Ways You Can Help
If you can contribute £5 please do if not please on your socials give us a plug so we can achieve the least which is £500.

story:
We're DUXS. And we have created a knitted all-terrain travel shoe, that doesn’t compromise on comfort, style, or performance. It’s a blend of a comfy city shoe that meets the outdoor lifestyle footwear. A stylish simplistic, comfortable, waterproof, and lightweight shoe that’s designed to make every adventure worth the sweat.  

It started for a few reasons. One, we felt it was really hard to find a really simple shoe. Many shoes are over-designed, overly colorful, overly logo-ed. We saw the opportunity to create a knitted travel shoe that focused on form and was extremely disciplined in its execution, a shoe is such a simple thing but a really hard thing to construct well. 

DUXS is the only shoe you will ever need. A shoe with comfort so freeing, so easy to slip on, you’ll cherish every moment with or without socks. We forged the shoe to be super light, a rubberized heel profile will securely hold your foot in place, and it’s slip-proof “footprint” sole design allows you to take the shoe anywhere without worry. Made with our unique 3d knitted blend making it super waterproof. Forget about wet socks and dirty shoes, with DUXS you can be a trendsetter and always travel in style. 

The travel sneaker was created to meet the requirements of modern adventurers who want to always be ready for a new adventure anytime, in a minimal comfortable city shoe.

There is a shoe for every need: sneakers, hiking shoes, aqua shoes, outdoor shoes, and slippers. This becomes a problem while packing for the next big adventure, sacrificing on convenience and comfort. 

The simplicity of the shoe was our goal at DUXS. An everyday sneaker that you can do anything in. What you can't see, it's what matters the most. Simple Design, less is more. 

DUXS was built to be sustainable, making it light on your feet but also light on waste. Producing on average 60% LESS WASTE, compared to our competition. Our upper recycled polyester material is the future of footwear. Using less is doing a lot more for the environment. 

On average it rains over 150 days a year, and even more in Seattle. This inspired us to create a shoe adapting to your everyday lifestyle. Are we the first waterproof shoe? No. Is DUXS the best? Yup. 

DUXS are the best travel shoe. Take them with you from mountain tops then back to the city. Never worry about being caught in a rainstorm. Travel with them through the rain, mud, and snow. DUXS will always keep you protected, where ever you go. 

100% waterproof, and very breathable - The most comfortable shoes for your everyday needs, you can wear your pair of sneakers all year-round. DUXS are super light, slip them on and you'll forget you were even wearing them. Until you start searching around for Puddles, Slush, Mud, and Sand to jump into! Show your friends how much better your DUXS are. They're built to last every season, take them traveling on adventures around the world or just around the city - because that's part of the journey too. 

You won't find another shoe like us, anywhere in the world. The technology behind it is a permanent constructed knitted blend mesh that is 60% recycled. (It’s not a spray coating) Keep the water out but allow your feet to breathe at the same time. And on top of that, be comfortable, stylish, and ready for any adventure, DUXS will keep your feet protected.  

New color option - Black and White (Stretch goal unlocked)

 

 

 

Risks and challenges

Here at DUXS, we will always be transparent with you. We will inform you with any to the slightest problem that may arise. We do not anticipate to run into any problems since we have researched and thought of every solution to every problem that may occur. Some problems that might arise are delays in manufacturing or processing in shipping. But, we promise to work endless nights if need be to suffice to our customers.

We at DUXS are 100% accountable on delivering what we promise, We will make it our mission to deliver you the best sneaker for all of your traveling needs.

story:
Short Summary

My name is Derrick Bass and I am the founder of The Opulent Brand. The Opulent Brand is an urban streetwear brand that provides opportunities to youth from underserved communities through the sales of its fashion. We use our clothes to breakdown educational and social barriers, as a portion of all of our proceeds go to charities who serve under resourced communities.

What We Need & What You Get

We need about $1,500 to complete this project. This amount will allow us to purchase a top of the line heat press for our products. Below find you can find the perks of supporting our campaign:

  • $10 supporters will receive a personalized email from me expressing my gratitude for your support
  • $25 supporters will receive a "Thank You" card and a "The Opulent Brand" button
  • $50 supporters will receive a "The Opulent Brand" Dad hat
  • $75 supporters will receive a "The Opulent Brand" tee-shirt

If we do not reach our goal, the funds that we do receive will towards finishing our website, as that is the priority for us at this moment. Since we are an e-commerce, we want to ensure the online shopping experience is like no other.

The Impact

Since 2015, our philanthropic efforts include donations to a local charter school to help students with uniform purchases, we have provided clean water and diapers to victims of Hurricane Harvey in Houston, TX and helping Chicago Public School students with their prom cost. As we continue this journey, we want to do more and your contribution will help us!

Risks & Challenges

As with any business, we face many risk, but our top risk right now for this stage of our business are the following:

  • Ensuring we make a profit in order to fulfill our social-entrepreneurial mission.
  • Expanding our current customer base in order to increase our market reach.
  • Keeping enough product on hand, to ensure we meet the demand of our customers.

We plan negate these risk by the current market opportunity:

  • T-shirts alone have grossed $3 billion in annual sales  
  • Demand for online original design T-shirts has been rising as consumers increasingly shop with e-tailers for convenience
  • The popularity of internet retailers has skyrocketed to about $367 million  
  • High-end streetwear helped boost global sales of luxury personal goods by 5 percent this year to an estimated €263 billion ($309 billion), according to a new study released Wednesday by consultancy Bain & Company

In 2018, more than 1,875 fashion retailers shut down. This year, projections reported by WWD place the number at just under 10,000, “up 53 percent from the number of doors that went dark amidst the Great Recession in 2008.”

Digital innovation, rising globalization, and changes in consumer spending habits have catapulted the fashion industry into the midst of seismic shifts.

Driving this growth are four notable opportunities:

Expanding global markets outside the West

Increasing online access and smartphone penetration

Emerging worldwide middle-classes with disposable income

Innovating technologies to create experiential ecommerce

Fashion consumers will also have more buying power, as the number of potential customers is projected to grow to more than 1.2 billion by 2020. The good news for fashion is that the majority of these new consumers are within the 16 to 24 and 25 to 34 age groups.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that everyone will not be able to contribute financially, but we ask that you share our campaign in your personal networks, on your social media and with your family and friends. The more our campaign is shared and seen the more opportunities it will present for us to reach our goal.

story:
We are more than just beautiful clothes!

We are AGAATI, a sustainable womenswear brand designing eco-conscious wearable art. Our mission is to offer you lifetime of experiences with gorgeous designs and while doing that empower the hand behind the handmade. 

Get to know us more!

 

 

Vote with your Dollar to make the prototypes into pre-orders

Our latest collection titled The Himalayan Mystique, launched at New York Fashion Week 2018, is a statement of our commitment to take eco-conscious wearable art, global. The art form used in this collection has never been done on apparels, before now. 

With your funding we will scale the impact of eco-friendly production, preserve craftsmanship, empower the artisanal community and  market the mission to a global audience. Each of you are unique individuals with specific tastes. We have therefore, created a variety of products, ranging from greeting cards to scarves to dresses and blazers to cater to your choices.

Design Inspiration for the Prototypes 

Design symbolism: The Ashoka, the second of the trinity of holy flowers, sprouts from the holy water-front symbolizing the transformation from greed to discriminating wisdom 

 

Design Symbolism: The Phoenix is endowed with all of the magical qualities of auspiciousness: longevity, resurrection, the solar and alchemical fire and symbolizes peace and tranquillity.

 

Design Symbolism: Flowers that surround the deities with the clouds giving company.

 

Design Symbolism: The Phoenix that has sprung out of the ocean escaping with a beautiful lotus. The lotus rooted in the mud grows up through the water emerging as a beautiful flower. This symbolizes the growth of the soul from the dirty physical world into the bright sunshine of enlightenment.

Proud to represent artisans, artists and makers at NYFW !

Himalayan Mystique - Wearable Art like never before

The Himalayan Mystique collection is inspired by an ancient painting technique called Thangka Art (see more on Thangka Art History in the link below). Thangka art is a Tibetan Buddhist painting style serving as important teaching tool depicting the life of Buddha. We have translated the elements of nature from the different paintings into our textile surfaces. The paintings were done by  talented artists from the Himalayan region of Sikkim, India . This technique in its truest form has never been done on apparels before now. 

AGAATI worked closely to create each prototypes with the artists using the technique in its truest form. Every inch of the colourful yarn and fabrics used as well as the embroidery are handmade. We are thankful to bring art into fashion in a way that has never decorated apparels like you see now. Below is the dream team that made this collection possible.

The Impact We Want to Create with YOU!  

We are excited to share that in 1.5 years AGAATI engaged and employed 24 artisans, supported 5 non-profits and offset 10 tonnes of CO2.  This was possible with the help of funds from family and friends. In the next phase we aspire to scale our production and impact and make Agaati more than just a beautiful clothing brand. Join us to do more!

       

Contribution from funds raised.

Scaling AGAATI and growing artisanal craftsmanship go hand in hand as our business is about bringing artisanal fashion mainstream. Funds raised through this campaign are expected to be deployed as follows

 

What makes us unique?

  1. A rebellious point of view!  In a world overridden by mass trends and overconsumption, we want to inject originality, creativity and conscious designs.  
  2. Our clothes are made by artisans using age-old hand craftsmanship techniques passed from generations. Each piece of clothing therefore, narrates a story of its maker and their rich culture.
  3. Every design is produced by skilled makers from India who have over 15 years of mastery of tailoring. 
  4. We work directly with the makers, artists, artisans, weaver, removing the middleman which makes our limited and luxury collection affordable
  5. The design process that incorporates eco-friendly textile, zero waste philosophy and up-cycling of waste
  6. When you wear Agaati, you wear Clothes with a Purpose! Clothes that Empower You & Others

 

History of Thangka Paintings

A thangka, variously spelt as thangka, tangka, thanka, or tanka (Nepali pronunciation: [ˈथान्का]; Tibetan: ཐང་ཀ་; Nepal Bhasa: पौभा), is a Buddhist painting usually depicting a Buddhist deity, scene, or mandala. Thangka serve as important teaching tools depicting the life of the Buddha, various influential lamas and other deities and bodhisattvas. More on the history of this art - https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thangka#History

Delivery Information

We will make deliveries of the perks between November 28 and December 10th, 2018 provided we get atleast 2 months to develop the pre-orders. The sooner you confirm, the sooner we get started! For any questions please email us at support@agaati.com

Size Guide

 

Founder story 

        

 

Mentioned in

 

Supported

 

Other fun ways you can help!

1) Share this campaign. Spread the word to friends and other lovers of art + fashion!

2) Get on our email list to hear about events and stay updated on the collection’s launch.

3) Follow us on Instagram and Facebook @agaati.california 

4) Spread awareness - Watch the environmental and social impact of fast fashion at: https://truecostmovie.com/

5) Keep an eye out for a surprise announcement in a few weeks!

story:
Descendez plus bas pour nous lire en français.

 

Guaranteed delivery (no matter if we reach our goal or not). 

 

Order now, receive it in time for Christmas! 

 

Say hello to sumptuous organic cotton basics made in Quebec, Canada under ethical working conditions. 

 

 

We create exquisitely sustainable clothes

Gaia & Dubos is a Canadian sustainable fashion brand founded by ambitious mompreneur Léonie Daignault-Leclerc. Our women's line being an ever-growing success since 2017, we decided to launch our very first men's collection.

Your precious contributions will turn this project into yet another success!

Pre-order the pieces that make your heart flutter. You'll receive them at your doorstep early to mid December.

 

Top of the tops

We created the top of the tops for you. Exquisite fabrics. Classic fits. Casual styles.

Crafted by highly-skilled local artisans with organic cotton. What's not to like?

We have 6 different styles and 13 product combinations to choose from.

Simply select the perk that speaks the most to you, whether it is one garment or all six of them!

 

 Scroll down to access our SIZE GUIDE. 120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.

 

Our organic cotton t-shirts - White or Black

 

Our organic cotton long-sleeve shirts - Black or Cream

 

Our organic cotton casual shirts - White or Blue

 

Scroll down to access our SIZE GUIDE. 120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.

 

 

We're all about sustainability

 

Did you know organic cotton contains no chemicals nor pesticides, and that it requires much less water to irrigate the fields? Plus, it is up to 93% less toxic than conventional cotton.

All of our premium organic cottons were handpicked by our founder.

And they're all certified by Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS).

 

Our founder visited each of our Quebec manufacturers in person.

They're small teams of a couple dozens employees. They're paid above minimum wage. They enjoy flexible schedules and work under 40 hours a week. Plus, they get 4 to 5 weeks off every year.

Our clothes are and always will be crafted under humane, ethical conditions. 

 

A t-shirt should cost more than a latte and a caramel donut. 

That's a fact: Sustainable fashion costs more than fast fashion.

Products made with eco-friendly materials and crafted locally in Quebec, Canada under ethical working conditions are and always will be more expensive.

But if you're read this far, you already know this. 

 

 

A little more about us

 

I am the designer and founder of Gaia & Dubos. I'm also the creator behind each of our products. I have a masters degree in sustainable fashion and I'm the author of a book on this very topic.

But mostly, I'm a 28 year-old mompreneur on a mission to change the fashion industry.

And together, we can do it. Will you help me turn this aspiration of mine to reality?

 

We have big ambitions for this campaign, because this is not our first. Two years ago, we raised $33,000 for our women's line. And we've grown so much since then.

The $80,000 we will raise through this current campaign will help cover a part of our men's line production costs. We already invested a rather large chunk of our piggy bank to fund this men's line, since we have the fabrics in hands. This was all well thought-out, so that the turnaround times would be shorter.

For you, my loves. 

Want to embark on this adventure with us?

Select the perk that speaks the most to you. We promise you'll fall in love with your new Gaia & Dubos clothes.

120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.

 

Our manufacturers already have our fabrics, patterns and supplies in hand. Thus, production will start even before this campaign ends. In a matter of weeks, you'll receive your package at your doorstep.

 Just in time for the holidays.

Shop for yourself or your loved ones. 

120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.

 

Free shipping in Canada on orders over $90

 

Free worldwide shipping on orders over $200

That's right! 

Better make it count! 

Free returns and exchanges

If for any reason you're not 100% happy with your Gaia & Dubos clothes, we will provide you with a free return label within 120 days of the date of purchase.

Guaranteed delivery. Even if we don't reach our funding goal.

Our project will still happen even if we don't reach our $80,000 goal. We guarantee delivery of your order, no matter what. And you can ask for a refund within 120 days of the date of purchase.

 

What size to choose?

 

Longer fits for lazy men

No offense, but (some of) you guys tend to throw everything in the dryer... 

Even if we highly recommend to lay our products flat to dry, we understand that mishaps can occur. This is why we elongated the sleeves and hems of all of our men’s products.

To allow slight shrinkage (for slightly lazy men).

 

Real sizing for real men

You normally wear Large? Choose Large!

Our clothes fit true to size. 

 

Size guide

Here are three easy steps to determine the perfect size for you.

You will need a measuring tape, and we recommend asking someone to help you (if not, make sure you stand in front of a mirror if you're by yourself).

Don't add any extra to account for shrinkage. We've already taken this into account!

 

1) NECK (for button-down shirts only)

Run a measuring tape around the base of your neck, where the shirt collar lays. 

Leave one finger under the tape for comfortable breathing room.

 

2) CHEST 

With your arms raised, run a measuring tape around your chest. Take the measurement at the fullest part of your chest, without squeezing.

Make sure the tape is level around the whole body (in parallel with the floor).

 

3) COMPARE YOUR MEASUREMENTS TO OUR SIZE CHART

The Sleeve Lengths are just provided as indicators but they won't affect your size selection.

 

SIZE GUIDE IN CM

 

SIZE GUIDE IN INCHES

 

120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.

 

Shop our women's line  

 

Looking for elegant, comfy, sustainable clothing for women? We've got you covered!

Visit our website to shop sustainably.

Enter code INDIEGOGO at checkout to get 10% off your order (valid until November 15th).

 

 

Help us by sharing this campaign

 

You can have a tremendous impact simply by sharing our campaign with your friends and family. Help us spread the word about sustainable fashion! 

 

120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.

Guaranteed delivery (no matter if we reach our goal or not). 

Order now, receive it in time for Christmas!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

 

Dites bonjour à nos somptueux basiques en coton bio faits au Québec dans des conditions de travail éthiques. 

Pourquoi vous nous avez lues en anglais jusqu'ici? Parce qu'on a de grandes ambitions! Et nul besoin de dire que l'anglais est la langue la plus parlée au monde. 

(aussi, Indiegogo ne nous permet malheureusement 

On a quand même créé des sous-titres en français pour la vidéo, et voici maintenant un court résumé de notre sublime projet dans la langue de Molière! 

En résumé

On a créé de somptueux basiques en coton bio pour les hommes. Tous nos produits sont fabriqués localement au Québec dans des conditions de travail éthiques. Sélectionnez vos vêtements préférés parmi nos 6 styles offerts et nos 13 combinaisons de produits. 

Notre guide des tailles est disponible juste un peu plus haut, en cm ou en pouces. La livraison est gratuite au Canada sur les commandes de 90$ et plus, et les retours sont entièrement gratuits pendant 120 jours suivant l'achat.

Vous recevrez votre commande juste à temps pour les fêtes!  Écrivez-nous à info@gaiaetdubos.com pour toute question! Il nous fera plaisir de vous assister. 

 

Livraison garantie (même si on n'atteint pas notre objectif de financement). 

 

Commandez maintenant, recevez-le à temps pour les fêtes!
