Descendez plus bas pour nous lire en français.
 
Guaranteed delivery (no matter if we reach our goal or not). 

 
Order now, receive it in time for Christmas! 

 
Say hello to sumptuous organic cotton basics made in Quebec, Canada under ethical working conditions. 

 


 
We create exquisitely sustainable clothes
Gaia & Dubos is a Canadian sustainable fashion brand founded by ambitious mompreneur Léonie Daignault-Leclerc. Our women's line being an ever-growing success since 2017, we decided to launch our very first men's collection.
Your precious contributions will turn this project into yet another success!
Pre-order the pieces that make your heart flutter. You'll receive them at your doorstep early to mid December.
 
Top of the tops
We created the top of the tops for you. Exquisite fabrics. Classic fits. Casual styles.
Crafted by highly-skilled local artisans with organic cotton. What's not to like?
We have 6 different styles and 13 product combinations to choose from.
Simply select the perk that speaks the most to you, whether it is one garment or all six of them!
 
 Scroll down to access our SIZE GUIDE. 120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.
 
Our organic cotton t-shirts - White or Black

 
Our organic cotton long-sleeve shirts - Black or Cream

 
Our organic cotton casual shirts - White or Blue

 
Scroll down to access our SIZE GUIDE. 120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.
 
 
We're all about sustainability
 

Did you know organic cotton contains no chemicals nor pesticides, and that it requires much less water to irrigate the fields? Plus, it is up to 93% less toxic than conventional cotton.
All of our premium organic cottons were handpicked by our founder.
And they're all certified by Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS).
 

Our founder visited each of our Quebec manufacturers in person.
They're small teams of a couple dozens employees. They're paid above minimum wage. They enjoy flexible schedules and work under 40 hours a week. Plus, they get 4 to 5 weeks off every year.
Our clothes are and always will be crafted under humane, ethical conditions. 
 

A t-shirt should cost more than a latte and a caramel donut. 
That's a fact: Sustainable fashion costs more than fast fashion.
Products made with eco-friendly materials and crafted locally in Quebec, Canada under ethical working conditions are and always will be more expensive.
But if you're read this far, you already know this. 
 
 
A little more about us
 

I am the designer and founder of Gaia & Dubos. I'm also the creator behind each of our products. I have a masters degree in sustainable fashion and I'm the author of a book on this very topic.
But mostly, I'm a 28 year-old mompreneur on a mission to change the fashion industry.
And together, we can do it. Will you help me turn this aspiration of mine to reality?
 

We have big ambitions for this campaign, because this is not our first. Two years ago, we raised $33,000 for our women's line. And we've grown so much since then.
The $80,000 we will raise through this current campaign will help cover a part of our men's line production costs. We already invested a rather large chunk of our piggy bank to fund this men's line, since we have the fabrics in hands. This was all well thought-out, so that the turnaround times would be shorter.
For you, my loves. 
Want to embark on this adventure with us?
Select the perk that speaks the most to you. We promise you'll fall in love with your new Gaia & Dubos clothes.
120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.
 

Our manufacturers already have our fabrics, patterns and supplies in hand. Thus, production will start even before this campaign ends. In a matter of weeks, you'll receive your package at your doorstep.
 Just in time for the holidays.
Shop for yourself or your loved ones. 
120-day free returns and exchanges on every order.
 
Free shipping in Canada on orders over $90
 
Free worldwide shipping on orders over $200
That's right! 
Better make it count! 
Free returns and exchanges
If for any reason you're not 100% happy with your Gaia & Dubos clothes, we will provide you with a free return label within 120 days of the date of purchase.
Guaranteed delivery. Even if we don't reach our funding goal.
Our project will still happen even if we don't reach our $80,000 goal. We guarantee delivery of your order, no matter what. And you can ask for a refund within 120 days of the date of purchase.

1) NECK (for button-down shirts only)

story:
CJR’s newest watch, the Commander Series, blends beautiful aerodynamic curves with industrial, sturdy design. There is a clear focus to highlight various mechanical and design features found on various aircraft from around the world. These special details make the watch look like it's always moving at Mach speed. 

The hands of a watch are just as important as the gauges on a fighter jet. They require accuracy and precision in order to convey information concisely. This is why the hands on the Commander Series have contrasting, colored tips for clarity. The custom-cut hands also make it seem like the wearer is staring directly at the instrumentation of their own aircraft. 

The aircraft industry is all about innovation and this feature is something wonderfully unique. The traditional second hand of the Commander Series has been scrapped in favor of a second wheel. This wheel moves like the turbine of a plane and propels time forward. Not only is it very functional, but it is seriously cool to look at. Just like flying, time should never be boring.

 

This feature was designed for the jetsetters and frequent flyers. When traveling between time zones, it is easy to lose track of time, particularly whether it is AM or PM. That’s where the Commander Series’ 24-hour indicator comes in. By showing the hour of the day, time never eludes the wearer. 

Curves are beautiful and aerodynamic. The front glass of our newest watch aims to make the wearer feel like a pilot. The smooth curve of the glass as it blends seamlessly with the body of the watch mimics the cockpit canopy found on aircraft. Who says pilots always have the best views? 

  

Mechanics in motion is magical. The Commander Series features layer upon layer of intricate, mechanical parts all moving in perfect harmony. Just like with the exposed engines of vintage aircrafts, the wearer will be able to see each carefully-considered piece of the Miyota 82S7 that brings life to this timepiece . 

 

A watch must make a statement at all times. Taking into consideration comments from our AIRSPEED project backers, we have ensured that this watch glows in the dark. The night helps the Commander shine with the Super Luminous added to the hands and hour markers of our watch. Telling time in the dark is now a breeze.

 

The design of a watch does not stop at its face. Our carefully crafted straps ensure that the overall color scheme of the watch has a complete look. However, we know that taste is not uniform, so we have made our straps easily detachable for extra customizability. At a lug width of 22mm, just about any watch strap can be used in conjunction with the Commander Series.  

Our previous timepiece, AIRSPEED, did not allow the wearer to service the watch easily. Taking this feedback into consideration, we have now introduced a screw-back design that allows wearers to access the watch’s internal adjustments as required.

story:
ITALIAN EYEWEAR

Inspired by the ancient art of origami, our hinges are made, and cast using a single sheet of spring steel, simply cut, and folded like origami paper. The result is an extremely lightweight, yet durable frame meant to last you a lifetime.

 

 

VERSATILITY

TOOL FREE ASSEMBLY & EASY MOUNTING

Using revolutionary joint technology, each handcrafted eye frame can be customized to match anyone's unique style using removable clip accents. Mix and match accents and frames for a range of looks for any occasion, without any tools! It takes less than 5 seconds to create your own look.   

 

ONE FRAME IS ALL YOU NEED

Is it possible for one pair of glasses to replace your entire collection? At ViageA, we believe it is. We make highly customizable modular eyewear, designed for the minimalist, traveler, or everyday wearer looking for the most versatile eye frame.

 

THE ART OF CUSTOMISATION

The concept is about giving you the freedom to create your perfect pair of personalised glasses.   Using revolutionary joint technology, each handcrafted eye frame can be customized to match anyone's unique style using removable clip accents for your next pair of VIAGEA glasses.

By customizing frames with easy-to-install accent clips, we have made it so you can get more, with less.

 

 

 

 

NO MORE NOSE MARK

 

DURABILITY

 

 

NO LOOSE SCREWS, NO MAINTENANCE


Traditional eye frames are made with individual parts joined together with screws, that need maintenance and loosen over time. We patented our Screwless Hinge system to do away with all the non-essentials: no screws, no rivets, and no soldering.

 

 

 

INTERCHANGEABLE TEMPLE

 

Designed for work, study, or play, the straight temple arms are the timeless style choice for everyday use to match any outfit or look. 
 

Made with curved temple arms and lightweight construction so your frame comfortably stays on your face during any physical activity.  Add the Active Temple Arms for €50. 
 

 

 

TAILORED FLEXIBILITY & STYLE

 

 

 

 

 

Customize Your Perfect Pair at Every Step

 

 

 

 

 

A Variety of Styles on a Single Frame. 

Edgy Accents Clips Switch Up Your Look in Seconds. Select your desired base frame shape AND accent clips through the survey after the campaign.

 

 

 BLUE LIGHT BLOCKING LENSES: Work in front of a screen all day? Smartphones, TV’s, computer screens, & LED’s emit blue light that can cause eye strain, result in headaches, and negatively affect sleep. Our premium Blue Light Blocking Lenses are made for people who spend a lot of their time indoors and are exposed to blue-violet light.

 

UV SUN LENSES:  Our sun lense guarantee protection against UV radiation and glare, resulting in comfortable vision with clear contrast and each pair of glasses is hand made locally by expert hands. We have 3 color options: BLACK, BROWN, GREEN for SUN LENSES and you can choose this after the campaign.  

Can I add my prescription lenses? Unfortunately, we do not currently offer prescription lenses for our frames, but your optometrist will be able to easily add prescription lenses and extra adjustments for comfort. We cover indexes (thicknesses) from 1.50 to 1.74.

 

ALL ABOUT DETAILS

 

REWARDS

Each includes your choice of one base frame from any of the 3 designs AND one or three Accent Clip from any of the three designs outlined in the above section. For each frame that you order, you will also receive a protective pouch, warranty (1year), authenticity certificate and microfiber cloth.

 

Our Design Philosophy is Less is More

 

 

This short two-minute video shares real user feedback and the inspiration behind ViageA's transforming eyewear.


 



 

 

 

 

 

We believe the journey to your true self is the most adventurous journey to embark on. Our brand VIAGE (journey) A (to) a way to Journey to (your true self). ViageA is much more than a brand name - it's a philosophy - own fewer things, be resourceful, and seek adventure.
 

Our founder Mijin Lee received media acclaim by FréquenceOptic at the International Optical Show for one of the most innovative design products.


 

WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT: To make this project as successful as possible in both feedback & sales, we need your help! Whether it's purchasing a pair, sharing this project on social media, or just telling a friend about it, your support is much needed & genuinely appreciated.

Share the ViageA campaign and get 10% cashback at the end of the campaign!

You can earn your pair of ViageA Milano eyewear for free by sharing the campaign! We are offering a 10% cashback reward for every person who backs the campaign from your unique share link, to be paid at the end of the campaign!

To qualify for the Cashback Program you must:

  1. Have an Indiegogo account
  2. Back the VieageA campaign

You can use either the Facebook, Twitter, or Link button at the top of the campaign, to grab your unique referral URL. You must be logged into your Indiegogo account to get your unique URL. 

At the end of the campaign, we'll tally up your results and reach out about getting you your cashback! Stay tuned for a few exciting updates where we'll share our stretch goals.

 

 

Risks and Challenges

Our forward-thinking Italian-made prototypes disrupt the eyewear industry by omitting all screws, rivets, and welding from your glasses, giving you a sleek, high-performance pair that’s built to last. We already have finished the laboratory test for certificate- CE. We offer delivery worldwide for all orders, except conflict zones, and our orders are delivered by express courier. You'll receive a tracking number shortly after placing your order. Thank you again in advance for your support!

story:
**
"The new treat we're offering is for backers who contribute more than £30 and we'd love see it through, we can only do this if we meet our funding goal so we acquire the necessary funds to make it happen"
**

We’ve come to Indiegogo with our first ever project to hit the website in need of fans and supporters of our work and what we do to reach our dreams (Read more here).

It’s been a tough road to get here and months of development and trials - and errors - have finally lead to our flagship product called ‘The Gentle One’s Instruments’. Appropriately named for two complementary pens which define the quality we focus on achieving and the luxury experience even the simplest writing tool can deliver.


Sketches began in March of 2015 where we visioned the idea to settle our knowledge and shoot for the moon with our finest product, it began with a fountain pen and the question ‘How special can we make this?’ and thus high quality polished wood and a custom engraved silver nib were implemented. The pen lids were no exception, with high gloss finished silver rims and a polished piano black shell, it was too special to us to launch alone which takes us to the next part…


Contrary to belief, the ballpoint pen wasn’t actually in scope at all until after the idea of a handmade leather case was brought to the table. We realised our fountain pen would make a great collectible but as our lead designer put it (shout out to Michael Shulver - we love you!), he said “Wouldn’t you want a pen that you can use everyday - I know! Let’s complement this with a regular pen, what do you all think?”


We loved it! Extending the design deadline, we introduced the sibling - the ballpoint pen and doubled the case. Like a parent seeing their newborn finally arrived, it took a while for us to take our eyes off in reminiscence of our journey through the year.


For The Gentle Wood Co., money is a valuable object, something we weren't spoilt with; in came Indiegogo, the perfect platform to reach real fans and people who will take a personal interest in The Gentle Wood Co. just as we do. We’re reaching out to you to, our aim is simple and the process is even simpler, help fund us - what’s important to remember is that gaining fans and supporters of our work is more important than the money - we’ve implemented multiple rewards to meet the likings our backers, have a look through and you may find one you prefer - whatever you do, please, support us!

P.S: Check out the Image Gallery...

Love from

 The Gentle Wood Co.
story_txt: **"The new treat we're offering is for backers who contribute more than £30 and we'd love see it through, we can only do this if we meet our funding goal so we acquire the necessary funds to make it happen"**We’ve come to Indiegogo with our first ever project to hit the website in need of fans and supporters of our work and what we do to reach our dreams (Read more here).It’s been a tough road to get here and months of development and trials - and errors - have finally lead to our flagship product called ‘The Gentle One’s Instruments’. Appropriately named for two complementary pens which define the quality we focus on achieving and the luxury experience even the simplest writing tool can deliver.Sketches began in March of 2015 where we visioned the idea to settle our knowledge and shoot for the moon with our finest product, it began with a fountain pen and the question ‘How special can we make this?’ and thus high quality polished wood and a custom engraved silver nib were implemented. The pen lids were no exception, with high gloss finished silver rims and a polished piano black shell, it was too special to us to launch alone which takes us to the next part…Contrary to belief, the ballpoint pen wasn’t actually in scope at all until after the idea of a handmade leather case was brought to the table. We realised our fountain pen would make a great collectible but as our lead designer put it (shout out to Michael Shulver - we love you!), he said “Wouldn’t you want a pen that you can use everyday - I know! Let’s complement this with a regular pen, what do you all think?”We loved it! Extending the design deadline, we introduced the sibling - the ballpoint pen and doubled the case. Like a parent seeing their newborn finally arrived, it took a while for us to take our eyes off in reminiscence of our journey through the year.For The Gentle Wood Co., money is a valuable object, something we weren't spoilt with; in came Indiegogo, the perfect platform to reach real fans and people who will take a personal interest in The Gentle Wood Co. just as we do. We’re reaching out to you to, our aim is simple and the process is even simpler, help fund us - what’s important to remember is that gaining fans and supporters of our work is more important than the money - we’ve implemented multiple rewards to meet the likings our backers, have a look through and you may find one you prefer - whatever you do, please, support us!P.S: Check out the Image Gallery...Love from  The Gentle Wood Co.

story:
Haz click aquí si prefieres ver nuestra campaña en español.

 A dress that changes people’s lives, made from high-quality, natural BAMBOO fabric, fits EVERY body shape and converts into more than 50 styles: GUARANTEED for ANY OCCASION!

 

(Media pack available here: 
https://www.dropbox.com/sh/iqhsohp6sg0p2fw/AAA9H69gGO8H-ze_aZMgHqdFa?dl=0 )

The 3 reasons why you need The ONE dress right now

  1. This dress will flatter YOUR figure. This was the challenge we gave ourselves: designing a dress that would look good on every woman. More than 50 real woman of all ages and sizes have already tried it on..and loved it! It is SO versatile that in one way or another it will for sure flatter YOU.
  2. VERSATILE  for any occasion. We asked our friends to think about three occasions where they could use The ONE dress and they came up with the styles below, but with your own creativity, other pieces of your wardrobe and some accessories the options are endless!
  3. It is made out of BAMBOO. If you have never experienced bamboo before, think about the softest, most comfortable and luxurious cotton you can imagine: That´s bamboo. It is also UV protective, hypo-allergenic and possesses anti-bacterial and anti-fungal properties AND one of the most EARTH-FRIENDLY fabrics available. If you want to know more about bamboo fabric, please check http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bamboo_textiles

 

More importantly, The ONE dress is revolutionary because it represents a new life opportunity for mothers of very sick and disabled kids.

 Have you ever sat by a sick friend or a relative who is stuck in bed? Isn't it tedious? Now, imagine you have to stay there by your baby´s bed for weeks, even months waiting for a surgery or while her treatment is ongoing. Imagine that to make matters worse, you can not work so you can not support your family so your financial situation becomes critical. Then, staying by a hospital bed is not tedious anymore, it is desperate.  

There are thousands of woman in this situation in China and our mission is to keep these women employed so they can stay at their child's side. 

However, there is not so much you can do by a hospital bed. We needed something small, easy to learn, valuable and hand-made. So we came up with The Good Knot: Accesories made out of knots and clothes that include knots as details and buttons. There are 7 of these life changing knots featured on The ONE dress and just ONE dress is enough to keep someone employed and paid for a day.


What you get 

We wanted to create a dress that would help the ever running urban woman to go from the office to dinner afterwards. And the mom that doesn´t have much space for her own stuff in her suitcase anymore and needs a one-for-all dress. And specially create a dress  for the woman who cares: the one that doesn't want excess of fabrics polluting her land or exploited people producing her clothes. 
For all of them, for YOU, we have created The ONE dress: 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Check the coming up videos and our Pinterest board for more pictures of real woman wearing The ONE dress in multiple ways!


Choose the perfect color and the perfect size

The ONE dress is reversible and once the campaign is over you will have to choose among one of the following pairs of colors: 

  1.  Dark blue and light grey
  2.  Dark green and cream
  3. Deep red and dark grey 
  4. Black and White

Once the campaign is over we will contact you to get your color and your size and be sure that your dress will fit you perfectly. These are the measures we will use just for reference, but don't worry if you don't find your size, we will of course do your dress, remember it is for EVERY woman:

 

 

The Impact

We are a group of women living in China where thousands of babies are still abandoned each year. In the time we have lived here, we have develop close relationships with organizations taking care of very sick orphans and fundraising for the treatments and surgeries these children need. The incredible organizations explained us that some of the mothers that abandoned their babies do it because they can not pay for the surgeries and treatments they need and they think is the only way to actually save their lives. Their hope is a wealthier family would adopt them or an orphanage would take care of them.

Most likely that won't be the case. A sick baby without family support is far less likely to survive. Some successful programs such as  "One Less Orphan" was created to convince mothers not to abandon their babies. They say "You just take care of your baby and we will take care of the rest" and they go out and fundraise for the treatment the baby needs.

For those brave mothers that decide to keep fighting the situation is not easy, the usually have to move from their hometown to Shanghai for better medical care. They are usually uneducated and have no access to any unemployment or social welfare funds. The financial pressure on their family is immense. 

We saw all of this with our own eyes and decided we wanted to be part of the change. What we want to give those mothers a source of revenue so they can sustain themselves while they are at the hospital. They need something to do by the hospital bed, with little space and means. We designed our dress as well as a collection of accessories and clothes full of little Chinese knots that they can produce for us, from the hospital: That is The Good Knot. Each dress has 7 knots (three on the jacket, two on the bottom, two on the bag) which is enough to keep employed one mother for one day and pay her a living wage



That´s the impact you are creating when you get The ONE dress: ONE mother has ONE more day to take care of her baby.

 


 

 

 

The Perks

Thank you so much for supporting The ONE dress! These are the perks we have prepared for you:

 

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • Get the word out and make some noise about us!
  • Stay in touch for other Good Knot products
  • Introduce us to relevant stores, journalists, bloggers you might know

Thanks!


Risks & Challenges

We have dedicated months to plan the launch of this campaign and we have years of experience in the industry. We are committed to only provide garments of the highest quality and as we are shipping our products through the mail, from China to the world, so there are risks of handing off your  ONE dress. Your products will be shipped from Shanghai and the arrival time for your package may vary depending on courier requirements and timings. We thank you for your patience in advance.



 THE ONE DRESS:

Un vestido que se TRANSFORMA en 50 y TRANSFORMA vidas 

 

Un vestido capaz de cambiar vidas, hecho de tela de BAMBOO, para todas las mujeres y que se transforma en más de cincuenta estilos: GARANTIZADO para CUALQUIER OCASIÓN

 

 (Media pack disponible aqui:

https://www.dropbox.com/sh/iqhsohp6sg0p2fw/AAA9H69gGO8H-ze_aZMgHqdFa?dl=0)

Las 3 razones por las que necesitas The ONE en tu vida ahora mismo:

1. El vestido te quedará perfecto a TI. Ese fue el reto que nos propusimos: diseñar un vestido que le quedara bien a todas las mujeres. Más de cincuenta mujeres reales todas de diferentes edades y tallas se lo han probado ya y les ha encantado. Es tan versátil que no importa cómo sea tu cuerpo, de un modo u otro te favorecerá.

2. VERSATIL: Para cualquier ocasión. Le pedimos a nuestras amigas que pensaran tres ocasiones en las que les gustaría usar el vestido y ellas decidieron los estilos de las fotos, pero con tu propia creatividad, otras piezas y accesorios ¡las opciones son infinitas!

3. Está hecho de BAMBOO. Si nunca has usado bamboo, piensa en el algodón más suave, cómodo y lujoso que puedas imaginar: Eso es bamboo. También protege contra los rayos ultravioleta, es hipoalergénico y posee propiedades antibacterianas y antihongos. Y además es uno de los téjidos más RESPETUOSOS con el medio que existen. Si quieres saber mas acerca del bamboo haz click aqui http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Bamboo_textiles

Aun más importante, The ONE dress is un vestido revolucionario porque representa una oportunidad vital para madres de niños enfermos y discapacitados.

 ¿Alguna vez has tenido que hacer compañía a un amigo o familiar hospitalizado? Es tedioso ¿no es cierto? Ahora imagina tener que pasar semanas o incluso meses al lado de tu hijo hospitalizado esperando para que le operen o mientras recibe tratamiento. Imagina que además no puedes trabajar y no tienes ningún ingreso con el que mantener a tu familia. Entonces, ya no es tedioso, es desesperante. 

Miles de mujeres en China viven en esta situación y nuestra misión es darles un trabajo que puedan hacer mientras cuidan de sus bebés.

El problema es que no son tantas las cosas que uno puede hacer junto a la cama de un hospital. Necesitábamos algo pequeño, fácil de aprender, valioso y hecho a mano. Así nace "The Good Knot": Accesorios hechos con nudos y prendas que incluyen botones con distintos tipos de nudos. The ONE tiene 7 nudos, suficiente para mantener una madre empleada un día.

 

 


Lo que tu recibes

Queríamos crear un vestido que ayudara a la mujer urbana, siempre corriendo de la oficina a una cena justo después. Y a la madre a la que ya no le caben sus propias cosas en la maleta de las vacaciones y necesita un vestido para todo. Y sobretodo un vestido para la mujer a la que le importa saber que al hacer su ropa se está teniendo en cuenta el medio ambiente y nadie está siendo explotado. 
 

Para todas ellas, para TI hemos creado The ONE:

 

 

 

Revisa los nuevos videos que iremos publicando y nuestro Pinterest para ver más mujeres reales vestidas con The ONE.

Elige el color y la talla perfecta

The ONE es reversible y una vez que la campaña haya terminado podrás elegir entre los siguientes combinaciones de colores:

  1.  Azul oscuro y gris claro
  2. Verde oscuro y crema
  3. Rojo oscuro y gris oscuro
  4. Blanco y negro 

Una vez la campaña haya terminado te contactaremos para que nos digas qué color quieres y tu talla para estar seguros de que el vestido te queda perfecto. Aquí tienes las medidas que usamos, para que tengas una referencia, pero no te preocupes si no encuentras tu talla, igualmente haremos tu vestido.

El Impacto

Somos un grupo de mujeres viviendo en China donde aun hoy miles de bebés son abandonados cada año. En estos años viviendo aquí hemos estado en contacto con diversas organizaciones que se encargan de huérfanos enfermos y consiguen los fondos que necesitan para ser operados o tratados. Fueron estas personas quienes nos explicaron que muchas mujeres abandonan a sus bebés precisamente porque no pueden pagar el tratamiento que necesitan para salvarles la vida y creen que así una familia con más medios le adopte o el orfanato pueda pagar los cuidados médicos.

Lo más probable es que no sea así. Un bebé enfermo tiene muchas menos posibilidades de sobrevivir sin sun familia. Por ello, algunos programas como "Un huérfano menos" intentan convencer a madres en riesgo de abandonar a su bebé de que no lo hagan. Básicamente les dicen: "Tú encárgate de cuidar a tu bebé y nosotros nos encargamos del resto" y así lo hacen, consiguiendo los fondos necesarios para tratar al niño.

Para las mujeres que deciden seguir luchando la situación no es en absoluto fácil, normalmente tienen que mudarse de su pueblo a Shanghai para obtener los cuidados médicos que necesitan. Normalmente son mujeres que no han podido estudiar y que no tienen acceso a ningún tipo de ayuda de desempleo. Es una situación insostenible a nivel económico.

Cuando vimos todo esto decidimos que queriamos ser parte del cambio. Lo que queremos ofrecer a las madres que se encuentran en esa situación es la posibilidad de generan ingresos para mantener a su familia mientras sus hijos están ingresados. Algo que puedan hacer junto a la cama del hospital, con poco espacio y medios. Así, hemos diseñado nuestro vestido y una colección de accesorios y ropa llena de pequeños nudos chinos que puedan producir para nosotros, desde el hospital: Eso es "The Good Knot". Cada uno de los vestidos tiene siete nudos (tres en la chaqueta, dos en la falda y dos en la bolsa) y son suficientes para mantener empleada una madre durante un día y pagarle lo que necesita para vivir.

 

Ese es el impacto que estás consiguiendo cuando compras nuestro vestido, una madre tiene un día más para cuidar de su bebé.

 

Cómo puedes participar

Gracias por ser parte de The ONE dress. Hay distintas maneras de colaborar con nuestro proyecto:

 

 

Otras maneras de ayudar

No todo el mundo puede contribuir con dinero, pero todo el mundo puede ayudar:
  • ¡Comparte nuestro proyecto!
  • Siguenos para saber más sobre nuestros productos
  • Preséntanos a otras tiendas, periodistas, bloggers que conozcas..

¡Gracias!

 

Riesgos del proyecto

Hemos dedicado meses a planear esta campaña y tenemos años de experiencia en la industria. Nuestro compromiso es ofrecer productos sólo de la máxima calidad. No obstante al enviar el vestido desde China a cualquier punto del mundo hay ciertos riesgos y el momento exacto de entrega dependerá de los requisitos y tiempos de las empresas de paqutería. Te agradecemos de antemano tu paciencia.

story:
Milele Atelier is a womens wear apparel line that is cultivated from culture. I find inspiration in everything from insect patterns to architecture!

20 % of all proceeds from each sale goes directly to the ALS Association to help families and individuals diagnosed with Lou Gehrig's Disease.

I'm a one woman team who does everything from pattern-making, sketching, branding, to writing my own press releases, so when I finally completed my first women's wear collection, I felt a sense of accomplishment!!

I was recently contacted by Vancouver Fashion Week to debut my collection this year. This would be a spectacular experience for me. This event would create the much needed exposure for the brand.

With your help, I will be able to kick start my journey into a world that I was born for. A world where humanity and style merge to create a undeniable connection of adornment, expression and understanding.

Please help me get to Vancouver Fashion Week to debut my line, Milele Atelier. All monies collected from this campaign will go directly toward my designer's fees associated with showcasing at VFW.

Please visit mileleatelier.com  to experience the culture.

Thank you for reading and supporting my dream.

Erika Hicks
designer

story:
Most of you know by now that I've started my own clothing brand. If you didn't, well now you know. 

Black Label started as a side project and now I want to create something that's much bigger than I ever imagined. A successful brand. Ambitious? Yes. Doable? Certainly. 

 

How can you help?

If you've made it this far down the page, you're probably thinking "How can I help?". There are a number of ways you can help a brother out listed below.

 

"I want one of your TShirts!"

Glad to hear it! Head over to www.blacklabelfashion.co.uk for the full collection and make your purchase.

 

"I can't see anything I like." 

Don't worry, I won't be offended. I know my style isn't for everyone which is why you can also make a pledge of any amount you like to this page. 

"What will I get from my pledge?" I hear you ask. Below is a list of what you'll get. All items are currently limited edition and are not for sale on the Black Label Fashion website.

 

£5 - Black Label Tote Bag (Perfect for your shopping trips #5pBags)

 

£10 - Black Label Beanie (I know it's summer but that means nothing in Britain)

 

£15 - Black Label Back Pack (Because you can never have too many)

 

Don't know how much to pledge? Here's a handy list of what you would have to sacrifice for each amount:

£1 - 4 Freddo Bars (Yup only 4, I checked.)

£3 - A decent Coffee

£5 - A good Pint (Take your pick. Beer, Cider, Expensive Orange Juice?)

£10 - Your favourite bottle of Wine or Prosecco (When it's not on offer)

£15 - A Black Label T-shirt (If there's one you like)

If your not keen on any of the items above but want to pledge some money, you still can using the big pink 'Back It' button to pledge however much you like.

 

"I want to help, but I'm not able to pledge"

I'm well aware it's difficult to part with your hard earned cash and there is still a way to help without doing so. All you have to do is follow Black Label Fashion on social media and help spread the word!

Instagram: @blacklabelfash or https://www.instagram.com/blacklabelfash/

Facebook: www.facebook.com/blacklabelfashionuk

Twitter: @blacklabelfash or www.twitter.com/blacklabelfash

 

"What do you plan on doing with the money"

The money that I raise will go towards more equipment, supplies and products as well as advertising Black Label Fashion to gain further exposure. I would also like to set up a popup store or shared shop for a few days but it all depends on how much I can raise. I had to put a minimum goal of £500 but I will be more than happy with however much I raise.

 

Thanks for taking the time to read my story and a double thank you for your help and support!

4 - STAFF CONCEPT  

V-WATCH.Technology


   Florence,  Administrator Manage the Company.

Florence after studies in law, received a entrepreneurial training acquired in a Swiss institute, 

Jean-Louis,  Administrator, Design and Industrialization.

And yes I'm born "Alarm-Clock Street" in France, is not a trick!

Grégoire, IT Department.

Gregoire has followed traditional schooling and after a handicap during  four years, victime of influenza   vaccine, immobilizing him in a handicap chair, his companion was his computer he took advantage of that situation to handle  Keyboards & Software he is OK now and operational to  incorporate V8.Watch Technology and to assume  concepts and studies for all products.

Today, V8-427 WATCH 

is born and we are ready to launch this project...!

THANKS

TO OUR SWISS WATCHMAKER 

And 

ASIANS MANUFACTURERS

Without their technology, their advices and experiences, we could not launch this new collection of these watches.

Our watchmaker BT.Technology manufactury is specialized in quality of innovation and personalized, allowing the realization of our creations and in the heart of the Swiss watchmaking industry, "La Chaux-de-Fonds", which gave birth to the most big names and international brands of watches.

This is his knowledge and his methods that permit to enter in the industrial phase when the budget is ready. 

V8-WATCH-427 RS.RACING

V8-WATCH-427 VINTAGE RACING

HERE A TRADITIONAL BOX

BUT  THE V8-WATCH-427 BOX IS VERY SPECIAL

ALSO TRANSCENDENCE BOX

YOU WILL DISCOVER!


5 - WHY INVEST IN V8-WATCH-427 Racing ?

Because the Passion is Passion without Frontier and we Require the same Passion for the Orignal Watch with a Swiss Quality

And 
Pay Homage to those Fabulous V8 Engines

 2015 and 2016 correspond to the 50 years of US V8-427 engines that have equipped the Ford GT40, AC Cobra, Mustangs, on one hand and on the other the Chevrolet Corvettes and Camaros, Fabulous V8 which do still happiness Motorsport enthusiasts with Great Sounds and so special, and that for 50 years has carry the glory of the USA in industry motorsport 

Today those V8 always in NASCAR.

But 2016 will be the 50th Anniversary of the first Victory at 24 Hours of Le Mans with FORD GT 40 equipped by V8-427 engine.

There are plethora of watches on the market, but not all have the originality, the interchangeability of the topic or quality "Swiss made and American Soul " as here and it completely, allowing to have a quality watch, aesthetic , modern or vintage at your choice and option and these watches will go in collections.


6 - WHAT ARE THE PRODUCTS ?

We wish develop this year 3 range of Watches 

6.1 - V8-WATCH-427.Vintage Racing - 8 Basic Models but also evolutive.

Version QUARTZ & AUTOMATIC

6.2 - V8-WATCH-427 RS . Racing - 6 Basic Models 

but also evolutive.

Version QUARTZ & AUTOMATIC

The basic products are:

A range of Watches Men and Women V8-427 WATCH available in 3 grades of steel, Steel Color Gold, Titanium, Black and High-end custom in Gold.

These Watches outside of the initial target objective, 50th Anniversary of the V8.427 Engine and the Victory of Le Mans, are original, unusual and very attractive, but also evolutive you can change the look to pass in Vintage with a RS Watch or Pass in RS with a Vintage Watch, conserving the standard dial.

This Watch Chronograph format Ø 42 mm and Heigth 12,7 mm for men of a reasonable weight and adapting to all types of wrists

The Straps will be chosen by the Client, leather, colors Black or Fawn, synthetics color Black and Strap Steel, colors Gold, Silver, Chrome, Black or Mixed.

 For now, the bracelets are those shown in the pictures.


6.3 - V.WATCH TRANSCENDENCE R2 & R3 EVOLUTION

 6.3A : TRANSCENDENCE R2 MOVING RING.

Delivery September 2016


6.3B :  TRANSCENDENCE  R3  EVOLUTION 

CONNECTED & AUTONOMIC

Delivery November 2016


7 - FINANCIAL ASPECTS 

& 

RAISING FUNDS

To launch this program we must raise $ 50,000 USD

A. Starting Plan:

The initial financial aspects can be Summarized as Follows:

    - Implementation manufacture and tests of three Pre-SERIE models Watches             - Advertising, Communication.                                                                                                         - Impact Salaries and Expenses was 5 months.                                                                           - Travel and accommodation costs.                                   

                                  Funds invested in programm at this date around   =   € 15.000

   -  Producing Costs and Stock for the US market V8 Watch                         € 75.000

   - The budget  necessary to industrial phase of production & Stock    =   € 90.000

To launch this program 50,000 USD are adequate to delivery the first Watches in August 2016 and to be operating in the US market.

This first step is essential, when the website seller will Operational  to make known the products and develop turnover, ensuring a sufficient financial steering wheel to achieve the 2016 objectives.

Also us we have the passion of Muscles Cars 

and

 NASCAR


8 - LOCATIONS

2016

With the Crowdfunding Budget we can do it...!!!

- Concept and Design : Dij
on Burgondy - France.
- Watchmaker : La Chaux de Fonds - Swiss.
- Headquarter : V.WATCH Technology, La Chaux de Fonds - SWISS
- Priority US Market .
- US Retailers: Charlotte, Daytona, Los Angeles, Miami, Indianapolis, Austin, Phoenix, New York

.


WEB MARKET

The implantations of retailers are evidentes but the Web Market is very important and efficient and we will go with a big agressivity to communicate with this potential of marketing.

Tomorrow you can say, I have contributed to launch this company and I'have allways my V8-WATCH-427...! Seriously...?


 YES, because V8-WATCH-427 

    GUARANTEE 7 Years...!


If your watch is broken your V8.Watch 427 Swiss Madefor reason of default of manufacture it's will be substituted by the same model by V.WATCH.Company after technic control of our services all fee taken in charge by V.Watch Company.


All Watches V8-WATCH-427 SWISS MADE

ARE GUARANTEE 7 YEARS,

story:
Wood Love

Wood Love project was created to help people get something different. When I was little kid I fall in love with wood. I liked to touch and smell wood. This is why I start making wooden ring. I want to let people to feel wood and human harmony.

I start this campaign to have opportunity to make more different rings of different wood. Also I want to start making wooden rings with steel and for that need expensive machines for steel.

Every contributor will push me closer to my goal and dream which let me to give something unique back.

What We Need & What You Get

For this campaign Im trying to reach 2000$ goal for steel lather machine. It would really help with creating new designs.

Campaign perks let you to get unique wooden rings with different kind of inlay. Every single ring is made with hands and love of wood. Wooden rings are not even close to metal rings. Wood is worm it feels nice on finger that you even forget that you are wearing it.

If it will be that im not gonna reach the goal all funds will go to create more designs of rings with rear wood and stones.

Risks & Challenges

This is my first Campaign and I guess that I will have some challenges, but I will do everything to solve it. I guaranty that everyone who will fund me, will get on time what they deserve.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cant contribute there is other ways. You can contact with us on facebook and order ring throw there. Or if you like our project and what we are making, just let other people know about us. The word is very important to us.

story:
Bags that #reversepoverty

Purses. You can never have too many. They are a part of your life. The shape, color, size, and design make a statement about your style and inside you carry your whole world. But have you thought about the story your bag tells? The history behind it? 

Take a look your bag. Go ahead, look at it. Do you know where it was made? Who made it? The money you spent on it, do you know where it goes? More than likely it was made in a factory, the money being used to make more money. It may be a great bag with a fancy brand, but do you know the story behind the person making it? 

Let’s take a look at a TenThirtyThree bag. These bags are handmade by real women with real needs. Here’s the story. Women in the Middle East are often abused. Her husband does little to care for her and the children. Because she is a woman, it is almost impossible for her to make her own living. Despite everything she has against her, she works hard anyway. She has learned to make bags with love and care so she can provide for her family. The income she receives is spent feeding and clothing her children and she gets whatever is left for her own care. 

Every bag has a story; we invite you to join ours. How will you continue the story? 

Empowering Women in the Middle East through Business Development

Ten Thirty Three purses, totes, and accessories have been hand made by impoverished women in the Middle East since 2011. By purchasing these products, you are helping Ten Thirty Three teach marketable skills and create sustainable sources of income. Thank you for joining us in our effort to affirm dignity, inject hope, and promote freedom for those in hurting communities.

Risks & Challenges

Two of our greatest difficulties are purchasing sufficient local fabric and connecting with new customers.  This campaign, we believe, will help to put us in a better position to overcome these hurdles.  First, by allowing us to measure the bag purchases we can purchase the correct amount of fabric, eliminating excess stock. And lastly, we believe that this campaign will allow us to connect in a new way to our existing customers and also, add new customers.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand that not everyone needs a new bag right now,  but what you can do is share, share and share our story.  Indiegogo has built in share tools to help.  Let your friends know about us and about our story.  Tell them about your recent bag purchase.  Ultimately, connect the dots for them to show how their purchase helps reverse poverty in the Middle East.

story:
A tin can or a stoma bag - which would you choose?

Millions of people worldwide have a stoma – where an opening has been made on their abdomen which allows bodily waste to pass out of their body. For these people, a stoma bag is necessary to securely, conveniently and safely collect output from their stoma.  

However, thousands of people with a stoma across the world are forced to use tin cans, carrier bags and bits of cloth because they are unable to afford the cost of a stoma bag. In Papua New Guinea there are only two stoma care nurses in the entire country: in the Philippines a single bag costs a week's wages.

For people with a stoma in developing countries, infection and hernias are extremely common as a result of them having to use tin cans and carrier bags. Many people are left unable to work or leave their home because of embarrassment and medical complications.


What is Stoma Aid?

Each month, tens of thousands of stoma bags are thrown away in the UK as they are no longer needed. We will collect these unused bags and distribute them to people in need in developing countries across the world.
Money raised with your help will help fund:
  • A dedicated staff-member to oversee and manage the Stoma Aid project as well as volunteers.
  • A warehouse where stoma bags can be collected and stored.
  • Education about stoma care in developing countries across the world.
The project is supported by the Colostomy Association - a national charity that supports people with a stoma throughout the UK. 


Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't give any money you can still help make Stoma Aid a reality.

  • Share our campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Instagram and other social media.
  • Tell your friends, families and colleagues about Stoma Aid.

Stoma Aid will change the lives of thousands of people across the world. Change someone's life and give them a #BagOfLife

story:
The 'Beside the Seaside ' Collection is the latest concept collection from Off With Her Head Millinery by Lisa Jones. Lisa is a Scottish-based milliner known for creating amazing millinery with an alternative twist.

This collection is inspired by the good old-fashioned British seaside holiday! Think building sandcastles on the beach, enjoying fish and chips straight out of the newspaper wrapping, devouring a 99 cone, trying not to break your teeth on a stick of rock, tram rides, paddling in the sea... all those lovely picture postcard memories in one beautiful collection of hats and fascinators!!


The collection will comprise of:
An 8 Piece Couture Collection - 8 one of a kind hats/fascinators all based around an individual theme.
A 4 Piece Ready-to-Wear Collection.
And an exclusive 'Beside the Seaside' themed hair flower, that will only be available to Indiegogo backers!

Putting together a collection is no easy business.. from the initial designs, to the hours of work in the studio creating the pieces and the promotion afterwards to get the collection seen around the world. It all costs time and more importantly MONEY! And that's where you can help...  by supporting the 'Beside the Seaside Collection' Campaign where you can donate anything from £1 up to £165 and get yourself a whole load of perks into the bargain! Every penny counts, as they say, and the more I raise the more of the collection I can complete... the best bit is that the main 8 piece couture collection will be exclusively available to my Indiegogo backers!!

Take a look at the 8 couture designs... Nicely Nautical, Mermaid's Dream, 99, Fish & Chips, Bathing Beauty, Blackpool Rock, Kiss Me Quick, Beach Hut Paradise.

How will I spend your money: The bulk of the money will go into the production of each piece, from the base materials and embellishments to the time spent working on the pieces (I do need to pay myself for my time involved!). Some of the money will go towards the perks, such as the postcards, the sticks of rock and the aceo cards. Then there is a portion that will be spent on packaging up your perks and posting them out to you. I'll be having the collection professionally photographed so there is the fees associated with that: photographers, models, make-up artists, location fees etc. And finally there is the promotion costs for the final ready to wear collection. PHEW!! I'm thankful for each and every donation I receive towards my campaign, its only with your help that this concept collection will become a reality!

story:
Who I Am.

My name is Steve Sherk, and I am from Anchorage Alaska. I taught my self to draw from old Calvin and Hobbes and Marvel comics. That was close to six years ago, and I've been drawing ever since. WOAH. is something I have been working on for a while now, as an outlet for all my time spent drawing. The drawings are copied onto wood, and then carved out. I roll it with super permanent etching ink and press it onto a shirt. I invested my last 35 dollars in the world into printing tests of my first five woodblocks, but I now find myself completely broke. 

What I Need & What You Get.

Im asking for 2,500. This is the money I need to turn five tshirts into a business. First I need to purchase ink and shirts, enough for an inventory to cover orders as they come in. I will also need space to store this inventory while it dries. Next I would get heaters and fans, to help speed up the drying process, as well as invest into testing the quickest and least intensive way of printing. I also really would like to expand into sweatshirts, hats, and stickers, but wouldn't have the ability to until I got on top of my existing inventory. Of course, I will release new designs every two weeks or so, providing I don't loose both my hands or run out of ideas. Both equally unlikely.

The Impact

Without your help there is no way I will be able to make it on my own. I am completely out of any other options. All I've ever wanted in life is to be able to carve and never work a real day. Art is the only thing I know, and I will do it till the day I die. It would be swell if I could make some money doing it too. More importantly though, I want to be able to send my art all over the world.

Risks & Challenges

The only Risks and Challenges that might arise, would be if the tshirt provider, was irresponsible with their shipping to me, or ran out of stock, and while those are unlikely, I have already located a backup provider. The other problem I might encounter would be a unruly amount of misprints. However this would not inconvenience you, as much as it would just eat into the money i can put back into growing my business. If I'm careful and take my time, I can cut down on the number of misprints. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Mention it to your friends, have them check it out. You are free to make promises about us we cant keep. "It will fulfill your wildest dreams" "They promised everyone free macaroni and cheese" I don't want to put words in your mouth. Also follow us on Instagram if you'd like. WOAH.handcarvedtshirts. Make your friends do that too. You should also email me if you have any questions, or some cool art.  woah.handcarvedtshirts@gmail.com

story:
The Tour of America – the World’s Next Great Sports Event

Our team is seeking funding to create and launch the Tour of America, a multi-stage standalone elite women’s cycling race that we envision becoming the women’s counterpart to the Tour de France – the ultimate test in the sport.  The first year’s race, tentatively scheduled for late Spring of 2016, will travel from Boston to Washington D.C. in up to five stages (the maximum allowed for a first year event), Beginning in its third year, the race will rotate to different regions of the country every year.

In future years, it will come to the south (Charlotte to Miami?), then the Midwest (down the Mississippi from Minneapolis to New Orleans?).  We’ll go to the Southwest and Northwest depending on which cities want to host it most.  And it will grow each year, in both difficulty and length, eventually reaching 10 to 12 stages. 

Why it’s important

Cycling is a universal pastime and the only activity that is a sport, a leisure activity, a form of exercise and a means of transportation.  For this reason, cycling as a sport is something that most anyone can watch and relate to.  This is why the greatest event in the sport – the Tour de France – is also the largest annual spectator event in the world.  But only men compete in the Tour de France.

We believe the time has come for a comparable women’s event that stands on its own and proves to the world that a challenging multi-stage women’s cycling race can be just as compelling and exciting as a men’s event.  Last Spring’s Women’s Tour of Britain has already begun to make that case, drawing over 350,000 on-site spectators. 

Much more than a race

This race will inspire girls and women around the world, raising awareness of issues related to gender equality as it emphasizes women’s empowerment, not just for America, but for the world.  The event will be accessible via the internet as well as national and international broadcasters.  

Each day, millions of viewers will watch a victorious woman step up on the podium, and a lot of those viewers will be girls, many of them young women in lesser developed countries or oppressed societies who are prohibited from going to school, driving a car . . . or even riding a bike.

We want to change that!

We believe that aspiration begins with inspiration.  Sports can inspire like few other activities, and the universal sport of cycling can deliver the images and messages of empowerment in a way that no politician, company or other cultural institution can.  

The Tour of America, on its own, is not going to overthrow any dictatorships, but there are few things more motivating than sports, and this race will engage men and women, boys and girls at the grassroots level – the place where all social change begins.  The 2013 movie, WADJDA, provides a glimpse of the type of empowerment we are trying to unleash.

Official trailer from WADJDA:


The Tour of America will also serve as a great marketing platform for companies seeking to recruit future women leaders, particularly in the case of the tech industry.  We will also have a strong educational platform, with the goal of engaging girls in the STEM education fields to begin balancing the gender disparity in related technology and scientific industries. 

The event will be filled with activities along the route and at the starts and finishes of each stage.  We’ll have expos, festivals, concerts, caravans and viewing parties; it will be a celebration to kick off the summer, a new tradition in American sports and a source of memorable gatherings of families and friends as the race passes through towns large and small.  And you’ll be responsible for helping this vision become a reality!

Our Team

    

Kevin Donovan – Founder and President of the Tour of America.  After a long career in sports marketing both within a large corporation and at an agency, I started a company called Renaissance Sports.  Our tagline is Sport in Service to Humanity – we believe that sports are a powerful facilitator of positive social change, and that, in today’s world, marketing value is increasingly aligned with social value.  The Tour of America is an ideal expression of this principal.

    

Lynn Morgan– Lynn is our CEO.  She joined the Tour of America following a long career at Cox Enterprises.  Prior to her most recent role as Vice President of Marketing, Lynn served as President and Chief Executive Officer of the Women’s United Soccer Association from 2001-2004, where she achieved several performance benchmarks during her tenure.  She was also responsible for the launch of two professional sports teams within a 12 month period, and overall management of the team’s successful corporate operations.

    

Chris Aronhalt – Managing Partner, Medalist Sports.  Chris and his company provide professional project management for all functional areas of sporting, special and cause-related events overseeing all operational, technical and participatory functions of an event from pre-planning through post-event.  As one of the undisputed leaders in their field, Medalist currently manages the entire operation of many of the largest competitive cycling events in North America, including the Tour of California, the Pro Cycling Challenge, and the upcoming 2015 UCI World Championships in Richmond Va.

Why not a men's Tour of America?

Every major global sports event in the world has an “ultimate test” – the pinnacle, marquee event that draws the most elite athletes in the sport.  In the case of men’s cycling, that event already exists:  the Tour de France.  For this reason, a men’s Tour of America will never achieve the same prestige and status as the Tour de France.  But for women, the opportunity awaits for The Tour of America to become that counterpart – the ultimate test in the sport of cycling for the greatest women cyclists in the world.

What your contribution will do for us

Starting a major sports event is a challenging endeavor, but a successful launch gives an event a tremendous amount of credibility and value in later years.  Your funding support will go directly to the operational execution, marketing and broadcast of the Tour of America.  Additionally, the presence of that support will also help our race get sanctioned by USA Cycling and the UCI (The international governing body of cycling), which means it will be on the sports calendar for 2016.  That alone will be a tremendous boost, giving us the ability to bring in more funds through commercial partners, broadcasters and investors.

Our team is ready to go, we have the support of the best cycling managers in the world, the governing bodies of the sport, and some of the top female athletes in cycling.  Unlike other sports, we have some great advantages:  we don’t need to build a stadium and we don’t need to sell tickets.  We just need the funding to set up the route (logistics, traffic management, security), take care of our athletes, launch the race and tell the world.

The route of the first year’s race, from Boston to Washington D.C., will pass through the Northeast corridor – an area of 50 million people.  There is no charge to watch the race, so this means we will potentially have one of the largest on-site spectator events in history in our very first year, with at least a million people watching.  As you watch the race on TV, on your computer, on your phone, or in person, you’ll be able to take pride in the fact that you helped make it happen!

You will be our Founders!

What you get:

We have devised an assortment of very cool perks to thank you and honor your support.  Note that all perk levels listed below included the benefits of all lower level perks:

$10 Contribution: You’ll be among the “Friends of the Tour” and placed on our newsletter mailing list where you’ll receive updates on the development of the Tour of America, notifications about special events and discounts on Tour of America merchandise.

$25 Contribution:  The Tour of America Pin.  The first ever Tour of America commemorative pin will feature our Brand Identity (aka. our logo).  We’re very proud of our logo, and you may have noticed that it’s gender neutral. The Tour of America logo is about great athletes (who happen to be women), and it’s about moving forward, both literally and metaphorically.

$50 Contribution:  The Tour of America Pin Set.  This 3-pin set, will most likely include the two versions of our logo (horizontal and vertical) and a third “Year 1” pin that will reference the Boston to Washington D.C. route.

$100 Contribution – A “Banner Brick” – You may be familiar with the practice of selling engraved bricks with names on them to help fund parks and buildings.  This is a variation of that approach.  If you've ever watched the end of a large cycling race, you've probably seen a lot of signs and banners with sponsor brands on them, especially near the finish.  Well, we’re going to put your name on those banners instead.  It won’t be very big (because we’re hoping to get a lot of names), but it will be there, and when the race is finished, we’ll cut your name out of that banner and send it to you as part of a commemorative “Founding Fan” certificate (suitable for framing).  This is our way of thanking you for your support and showing your friends, family and acquaintances that you were an important part of getting this event off the ground.

$250 Contribution – Tour of America Patron – In addition to receiving all of the perks listed above, your name will also appear on our national broadcast, on our website and Facebook page and in our race program.   

$1000 Contribution - Tour of America Partner - You'll receive all Patron level perks and a table for 6 for the Tour of America Gala dinner taking place the week before the race.   You'll also receive all access passes for you and your guests to all exclusive hospitality events and areas along the race route.

$10,000 Contribution–Tour of America Podium Member(limit 100 contributors) – Your all access package will include an opportunity to ride in the VIP caravan for the Stage 1 of the race.  You’ll also experience the full impact of your contribution with an exclusive slot in the “Tour of America Fantasy Ride” - a chance to cycle in front of the caravan and athletes with your fellow members along the final miles of the route into Washington D.C.  You’ll have a chance to interact directly with the world’s greatest women cyclists, and you’ll be honored at the Tour of America Gala, tentatively scheduled to take place the week before the event. 

A call to action for our female leaders: You can put your name on this race

What do a successful corporate woman and an elite women's cyclist have in common? They both know how to "lean in".  We need our great leaders who believe in equality and empowerment to help put the wind at our backs and make this a transformational event for women in a way that transcends sport.   We want more than your funding support - we want your passion (because we share it), and the Tour of America can help fulfill your mission of engaging and empowering women of all ages.  

How will your contributions be used?

Your funding support will go directly to fulfilling the following tasks over the next six months:

·  Route Development.  Our operational partners will begin discussions with local governments to propose routes, identify costs and develop local organizing committees.

·  Digital Asset Development – We’ll develop our website, supporter database, social media and other digital assets.

·  Public Launch – We’ll develop and execute a comprehensive multi-channel communications campaign that will be picked up by major media outlets.

·  Sponsor / Investor Procurement – Our campaign is just a beginning.  Our vision is to make this one of the highest quality races in the sport – one which the athletes come back to year after year, and the fans are promised an unforgettable experience.  Your contribution, no matter how small, will be a measure of the demand for this event and its future popularity, and that will drive further investment.

What if we don’t make our goal?

The Tour of America is scalable, up or down, and our worst case scenario is to push our launch back to 2017.  There are advantages to this, among them the fact that it’s not an Olympic year, and we will also have more time to secure other forms of support.  But your funding support and the expression of interest that it represents will still be a critical part of our ability to do that in the year ahead.  One thing we do know:  the growth in popularity of women’s cycling is only going in one direction – up – and we’re going to catch the wave, whether it comes this year or next.

Risks & Challenges

Our biggest challenge right now is time.  The sanctioning process will begin within a matter of months, and we need to quickly show that we have a level of interest and a path to our overall funding goal of approximately $2 million.  This is why we have set June 1 as our deadline for the campaign.  Fortunately, we are working with very supportive people in high places among the cycling industry, which may give us some flexibility, but in the worst case, we will roll over our funding to next year and focus on building an unforgettable race in the Spring of 2017.

Securing additional sources of funding is also a challenge, but one that is greatly mitigated by the existence of demonstrated support and enthusiasm.  Angel investors prefer to get involved once there is some funding in place (that's where you come in).  Sponsors don’t like risk, and a new event is always perceived as risky.  But once an event takes place, that changes the game, and if it’s successful, a Tour of America sponsorship will be in much greater demand.

To ensure maximum visibility, we are including broadcast coverage in our budget.  This guarantees a high level of exposure for the sport and our commercial partners, but it also sets the stage for the long term growth of the event.  Ultimately, if the event achieves a certain critical mass of popularity in the years ahead – and we believe it will - the broadcasters will pay us for the rights to carry the event.

Other Ways You Can Help

“Women can’t handle a long cycling race”  Yes, there are still people who believe this, and some of them are in powerful positions within the sports industry.  There is a belief that women and girls don’t really care about cycling, and that a major women’s event will never really work (I have actually been told those things in person).

Well, we don’t believe that, but we need your help to prove them wrong.  Please help us get the word out through your networks.

If you are someone who cares about cycling, consider that this event will elevate the entire sport, so if you enjoy watching or taking part in cycling races, if you are a bicycle manufacturer, if you in a cycling club, if you are an athlete, if you are a team owner, if you are involved in any other cycling races or charity events, then you have a direct interest in our success because we have the chance to deliver much greater exposure for cycling – as a sport, as a form of transportation, as a leisure activity and as healthy exercise - to millions more people.

Please use your social networks and the Indiegogo share tools to pass it on.  

And if all goes well, we’ll see you in the Spring of 2016, at the starting line of the Tour of America.  Thank you for your support!
story_txt:
The Tour of America –
the World’s Next Great Sports Event
Our team is seeking funding to create and launch the
Tour of America, a multi-stage standalone elite women’s cycling race that we
envision becoming the women’s counterpart to the Tour de France – the ultimate
test in the sport.  The first year’s race, tentatively scheduled for
late Spring of 2016, will travel from Boston to Washington D.C. in up to five
stages (the maximum allowed for a first year event), Beginning in its third
year, the race will rotate to different regions of the country every year.
In future years, it will come to the south (Charlotte to Miami?), then the
Midwest (down the Mississippi from Minneapolis to New Orleans?).  We’ll go to the Southwest and Northwest
depending on which cities want to host it most. 
And it will grow each year, in both difficulty and length, eventually
reaching 10 to 12 stages. Why it’s importantCycling
is a universal pastime and the only activity that is a sport, a leisure
activity, a form of exercise and a means of transportation.  For this
reason, cycling as a sport is something that most anyone can watch and relate
to.  This is why the greatest event in the sport – the Tour de France – is
also the largest annual spectator event in the world.  But
only men compete in the Tour de France.
We believe the time has come for a comparable women’s
event that stands on its own and proves to the world that a challenging multi-stage women’s
cycling race can be just as compelling and exciting as a men’s event.  Last Spring’s Women’s Tour of Britain has
already begun to make that case, drawing over 350,000 on-site spectators.  
Much more than a race
This race will inspire girls and women around the
world, raising awareness of issues related to gender equality as it emphasizes
women’s empowerment, not just for America, but for the world.  The event will be accessible via the internet
as well as national and international broadcasters.  Each day, millions of viewers will watch a
victorious woman step up on the podium, and a lot of those viewers will be girls,
many of them young women in lesser developed countries or oppressed societies who
are prohibited from going to school, driving a car . . . or even riding a bike.
We want to change that!
We believe that aspiration begins with
inspiration.  Sports can inspire like few
other activities, and the universal sport of cycling can deliver the images and
messages of empowerment in a way that no politician, company or other cultural
institution can.  The Tour of America, on
its own, is not going to overthrow any dictatorships, but there are few things
more motivating than sports, and this race will engage men and women, boys and
girls at the grassroots level – the place where all social change begins.  The 2013 movie, WADJDA, provides a glimpse of the type of empowerment we are trying to unleash.Official trailer from WADJDA:The Tour of America will also serve as a great marketing
platform for companies seeking to recruit future women leaders, particularly in the
case of the tech industry.  We will also have a strong educational platform, with the goal of engaging girls in the STEM education fields to begin
balancing the gender disparity in related technology and scientific industries. The event will be filled with activities along the
route and at the starts and finishes of each stage.  We’ll have expos, festivals, concerts,
caravans and viewing parties; it will be a celebration to kick off the summer,
a new tradition in American sports and a source of memorable gatherings of
families and friends as the race passes through towns large and small.  And you’ll be responsible for helping this
vision become a reality!
Our Team
    Kevin Donovan – Founder and
President of the Tour of
America.  After a long career in sports
marketing both within a large corporation and at an agency, I started a company
called Renaissance Sports.  Our tagline
is Sport in Service to Humanity – we
believe that sports are a powerful facilitator of positive social change, and
that, in today’s world, marketing value is increasingly aligned with social
value.  The Tour of America is an ideal
expression of this principal.
    Lynn Morgan–
Lynn is our CEO.  She joined the Tour of America following a long career
at Cox Enterprises.  Prior to her most recent role as Vice President of
Marketing, Lynn served as President and Chief Executive Officer of the Women’s
United Soccer Association from 2001-2004, where she achieved several
performance benchmarks during her tenure.  She was also responsible for
the launch of two professional sports teams within a 12 month period, and
overall management of the team’s successful corporate operations.
    Chris
Aronhalt – Managing Partner, Medalist Sports. 
Chris
and his company provide professional project management for all functional
areas of sporting, special and cause-related events overseeing all operational,
technical and participatory functions of an event from pre-planning through
post-event.  As one of the undisputed
leaders in their field, Medalist currently manages the entire operation of many
of the largest competitive cycling events in North America, including the Tour
of California, the Pro Cycling Challenge, and the upcoming 2015 UCI World
Championships in Richmond Va. 
Why not a men's Tour of America?Every major global sports event in the world has an “ultimate
test” – the pinnacle, marquee event that draws the most elite athletes in the
sport.  In the case of men’s cycling,
that event already exists:  the Tour de
France.  For this reason, a men’s Tour of
America will never achieve the same prestige and status as the Tour de France.  But for women, the opportunity awaits for The
Tour of America to become that counterpart – the ultimate test in the sport of
cycling for the greatest women cyclists in the world.What your
contribution will do for us
Starting a major sports event is a challenging
endeavor, but a successful launch gives an event a tremendous amount of
credibility and value in later years. 
Your funding support will go directly to the operational execution,
marketing and broadcast of the Tour of America. 
Additionally, the presence of that support will also help our race get

to take pride in the fact that you helped make it happen!
