story:
The BACKSEDATOR utilizes 2000 year old knowledge mixed with modern day hand crafting and natural green materials. What you end up with is a unique one of a kind, natural, hand made, back pain and muscle relieving product.

The BACKSEDATOR sedates pressure points that activate pain receptors in various regions of the back. It accomplishes this by utilizing 110 specifically placed pressure point applicators  that are designed to trigger nerve ending pressure points which activate a para-sympathic nervous system reflex response.  The end result is reduced internal pressure within the muscle and on nerves that create pain in return promoting regeneration of nerves and muscles to occur naturally at a faster rate with less associated localized pain.

Simply lay upon the BACKSEDATOR for 7-10 minutes, you will feel the pain and muscle tension slowly disappear as the pressure point applicators sedate hypersensitive and pressure activated nerves. You will not believe how truly easy it is. "IT SIMPLY WORKS"


What We Need & What You Get


Natural Touch Therapy Products (NTTP) is a product  design, development, manufacturing and marketing company.  (NTTP) started in May '2012 making the patented" BACKSEDATOR" for sale to the general public.  Since then NTTP’s inventors realized a need for easy to use "SELF THERAPY" acupressure, meridian line and reflexology therapy products that have natural therapy capabilities. 

 NTTP is seeking 50,000 in pledges of which we will use for; product materials, production, labor, marketing and fulfilment costs.  In turn the following items below are available for pledge purchase support.


 Pledge $15.00

(1) Hand crafted "Accu-Hook" made from Birch wood with "Natural" color stain.

Estimated delivery: June 15th 2015

Only ships to: United State


Pledge $15.00

(1) Hand crafted "Accu-Hook" made from Birch wood with "Dark" color stain

Estimated delivery: June 15th 2015

Only ships to: United State

  • Pledge $130.00

    (1) Molded Plastic produced BACKSEDATOR in "White" color. Perfect for Gym or Outdoor use. Easy to clean and sanitize.

    Estimated delivery: July 15th 2015

    Only ships to: United States 

    • Pledge $ 155.00
     (1) Hand crafted "GREEN" BACKSEDATOR and a Accu-Hook made from Birch wood with "Natural" color stain.
    Estimated delivery: July 15th 2015
     Only ships to: United State

  •  Pledge $155.00
    •  (1) Hand crafted "GREEN" BACKSEDATOR made from Birch wood and a Accu-Hook with "Dark" color stain
    Estimated delivery: July 15th 2015 

  • Only ships to: United States

    •  

    The Impact

     “The American Academy of Pain Medicine’s recent market research report indicates that more than 1.5 billion people worldwide suffer from chronic pain and 65 million Americans suffer from chronic back pain daily”.  And "8 0f 10 adults 25 years and older suffer from chronic back pain".  Back Pain is the number one debiliitating condition worldwide and the number one reason people miss work yearly.  It costs employers and employees  tens of millions of dollar s every year! 

    Every one knows at least 3- 5 family members or close friends that suffer from regular back pain and every day in the news you hear of professional athletes that can't compete because of their backs have given out on them!  Tiger Woods is the most notable, recently that is suffering from fatgued back muscles that caused him to withdrwal from competition.

    Natural Touch Therapy Products (NTTP) founder has over 30 years of working in the physical medical field as a physio-therapist and exercise rehab specialist.  It is his background, experience and working with thousands of pain suffers that he applied to creating the patented "Backsedator" after he injuried his back in a wakeboarding accident. Three Doctors stated he would need surgery for the two heriated disc in his back causing debilitating daily pain.  Instead, he created the Backsedator, and his back pain disappeared and 17 years later, he still hasn't and doesn't plan on getting any back surgury.

     NTTP has been creating "SELF THERAPY" quality products for three years and is ready to go to the next level.  Each and every  pledge will help NTTP to accomplish it's goal of helping people over-come back pain, naturally and reclaim their quality of living life pain free!  We would like to thank all that pledge for their belief and support of NTTP.





    Risks & Challenges

     Presently, there no issues, risks or challenges have been foreseen for product fulfillment. If any should arise  we will notify pledge sponsors asap to any status changes and  how NTTP is addressing them.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    NTTP realizes that in order to accomplish our goals with what we see is our future, it will take encredable efforts by us and the many other family,  friends and acquinces that believe in what NTTP's vision is.  Any and all helping us get this campaign out to as many as humanly possible via social networking is absolutely appreciated!  Please copy and forward our links to all firends within your social networks;

     http://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/3ce6cbc5

    http://www.backsedator.com

    http://www.facebook.com/pages/backsedator-from-natural-touch-therapy-products/225769543413?ref=bookmarks

    http://www.youtube.com/NTTPLLC

Natural Touch Therapy Products (NTTP) founder has over 30 years of working in the physical medical field as a physio-therapist and exercise rehab specialist.  It is his background, experience and working with thousands of pain suffers that he applied to creating the patented "Backsedator" after he injuried his back in a wakeboarding accident. Three Doctors stated he would need surgery for the two heriated disc in his back causing debilitating daily pain.  Instead, he created the Backsedator, and his back pain disappeared and 17 years later, he still hasn't and doesn't plan on getting any back surgury.
 NTTP has been creating "SELF THERAPY" quality products for three years and is ready to go to the next level.  Each and every  pledge will help NTTP to accomplish it's goal of helping people over-come back pain, naturally and reclaim their quality of living life pain free!  We would like to thank all that pledge for their belief and support of NTTP.
       Risks & Challenges  Presently, there no issues, risks or challenges have been foreseen for product fulfillment.  If any should arise  we will notify pledge sponsors asap to any status changes and  how NTTP is addressing them.   Other Ways You Can Help NTTP realizes that in order to accomplish our goals with what we see is our future, it will take encredable efforts by us and the many other family,  friends and acquinces that believe in what NTTP's vision is.  Any and all helping us get this campaign out to as many as humanly possible via social networking is absolutely appreciated!  Please copy and forward our links to all firends within your social networks; http://www.indiegogo.com/project/preview/3ce6cbc5http://www.backsedator.comhttp://www.facebook.com/pages/backsedator-from-natural-touch-therapy-products/225769543413?ref=bookmarkshttp://www.youtube.com/NTTPLLC

story:
What is Uplift, and why does it exist?

My name is Alex Acevedo and I started the brand "Uplift Apparel". For those you that don't know, Uplift is a reggae-rock influenced clothing brand. I first discovered the reggae-rock scene about 6 years ago and immediately saw the love the artists had for each other and the fans. I had never seen any music scene like it. I dug deeper in the scene and discovered artists like Kings & Comrades, Just Chill, and Iya Terra and was blown away by their music. It amazed me how these artists were not known across the country. I wanted to help spread this positive movement but I wasn't born with any musical talent, so that is why I decided to start this brand. Uplift is my way of helping with the movement. Since then, we have done everything we can to help emerging reggae rock artists in the scene. Every single band started off local, no band was known across the country overnight. They all had to struggle to make it to the top. My plan was to make their journey a little easier by promoting and spreading their music. I have done so by playing music clips on our Instagram, sponsoring artists, and even producing festivals focused on emerging artists. Uplift has barely scratched the surface. There are a lot more projects I plan to do in the near future. 


What is the purpose of this Indiegogo Campaign?

We (the Uplift crew) did a crowdfunding project to a few years ago to get Uplift started and with that project we were able to get some equipment for starters. Since then, the brand has been growing rapidly and there is some challenge with the equipment we have now to meet those demands. This campaign is to help us get a high end printing press. With this press we will be able to print shirts at a faster rate and will also be able to print multi-color designs. We will also be able to use our press to print for bands at an affordable rate. The profit we make off our sales goes towards projects geared toward helping the reggae-rock scene. We understand that times are tough at the moment. We appreciate any kind of support. A dollar does go a long way!


REWARDS



MENS SHIRTS


WOMENS SHIRTS

story:
Gioielli Dop: the first Food Jewelry brand.

Gioielli Dop is a project endorsed by Giovani Gioiellieri d’Italia, the first independent association dedicated to the second generations of artisanal firms of the jewelry sector. We support and enhance the talent of young entrepreneurs aged under 40.

Among our network of more than 300 artisans devoted to the craft of beautiful jewelry pieces, we have started a scouting campaign to recruit the best producer of hand-made charms. We have found it in Arezzo, Tuscany, where the art of goldsmithing dates back to the Etruschi and is handed down from father to son. 

In our case, from father to daughter. Yes, we have cherry-picked a small and beautiful atelier where a father and his daughter make wonderful micro sculptures that we call charms. We fell in love with their story and talent and we started shaping our idea in occasion of EXPO2015 in Milan.

We celebrate the Mediterranean Diet, Italian lifestyle and cultural heritage. Here we are: Gioielli Dop, the first #foodjewelry collection featuring traditional food products from Italy.

What We Need & What You Get

  • Till today, we have designed, wax modeled, prototyped, hand-crafted and enameled tasty charms from 4 regions: Campania, Puglia, Calabria and Sicilia. But Italy features 20 region and we still miss 16 to let you enjoy the great taste of a mediterranean experience!
  • In addition, we would love to let you taste and wear our delicious earrings, necklaces and cufflinks as soon as possible!
  • If you like our way of doing things, give us the opportunity to launch the whole typical tasty food products from all over Italy. You will get exclusive perks in the meanwhile ;)

Discover our Tasty Perks

Wear Gioielli Dop before anyone else! Choose from:

  • Early bird - Wear it first offer on the following foodjewels:

 San Marzano bracelet from Campania - 39 euro -  Click here to purchase 

Pulcinella bracelet from Campania - 79 euro - Click here to purchase

Peperoncino bracelet from Campania - 99 euro - Click here to purchase


  • Early Bird + FREE shipping worldwide on the following:

"Sì nu Babà" bracelet from Campania - 139 euro - Click here to purchase 


Pizza Margherita bracelet from Campania - 199 euro - Click here to purchase


Support us and gnaaaaaaaaaam! You will ask for an encore :)

Our track-record

Before creating Gioielli Dop, we have successfully combined Italian manufacturing savoir-faire with digital, launching Lux Made In: the first e-marketplace that enhances local craftsmanship. Today we export worldwide the excellences of 70 selected Italian jewelry makers. 

You can read and watch our story on Google Growth Engine.

No Risks, a Great Challenge

In case we don’t get the target, no panic! We ship your foodjewels before the end of the campaign and we will do our best with your kind support.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are fond of Italy and you love Italian lifestyle, you can also help us these ways:

  • Share our story with your peers, we will be grateful :)
  • Follow us on Facebook, Instagram, Pinterest, Twitter, YouTube
  • Tell us your feelings about the project, we do appreciate your taste!

Cheers!  

Giorgio, Filippo & Arianna

story:
"With ordinary talent and extraordinary perseverance, all things are attainable." - Thomas Foxwell Buxton

Caleb is one of my favorite bible heroes. He accomplished the greatest feat of his live at the advanced age of 85 - an age when most have long since retired or given up.  But, like Caleb, I believe age is no barrier to fulfilling goals as evidenced by some like Diana Nyad.  At age 64, and  five failed attempts over a 35 year span, fulfilled her lifelong dream of swimming from Cuba to Key West!  Or Tom Watson, months shy of his 60th birthday, finishing second in the British open beating all competitors except one!  Some almost 40 years younger !!

For the past thirty years I have had a dream to be a professional tour golfer. At every opportunity I have practiced and played to improve my game. I  caddied on the North Florida tour and for Arnold Palmer's Bay-Hill tournament for a few years when we lived in the Orlando area. However, my family has always been a priority so my dream was put "on hold" while much of my time was spent providing for and raising them as a single dad!  However, time, family obligations and circumstances have not diminished my desire. With both my son and daughter recently completing college I am now moving  forward "full steam" with this dream.  To "cross over and possess the land"!!

I have a good game but do not have a great “pedigree” like many other players. I am more like the “Rocky” Balboa of golf but will not give up until I see this God-given dream come to fruition! This has been the burning passion of my heart for the past thirty years!  I keep myself in excellent physical condition and practice even during the winter months. I truly believe that given the chance to practice full-time (which I am now doing), enter “mini-tour” events and with professional instruction (when needed), this dream will become a reality.  I am beginning this journey and have entered mini-tour events in Central Florida starting in July. As I succeed there I will move on to the next level(s) of tournament competition.

What is holding me back now is not time constraints or family responsibilities but finances. I estimate it will take about $25-40,000 per year to cover food, living & travel expenses, entry fees for tournaments, practice rounds, range fees, plus lessons with a professional instructor when necessary.  

This may seem like a daunting task but I truly believe "with God all things are possible"! If I wasn't firmly convinced I could succeed I wouldn't risk sharing it with you. By helping me achieve this dream it is my sincerest desire that it will be an inspiration to others to pursue their dreams; regardless of the obstacles or how long their dreams have been deferred! 

THANK YOU for giving my request your time and consideration. Every donation is greatly appreciated, and no donation is too small !!  Please share my campaign with your friends & family via social media.

 “Our greatest weakness lies in giving up. The most certain way to succeed is always to try just one more time."  - Thomas A. Edison

story:
Who am I?

  • My name is Stephanie and I am an entrepreneur, a mother, a wife and a designer. I am passionate about making high quality items for babies to enjoy and parents to love. I have been sewing my whole life, but I have been designing costuming, garments and other items for the past 13 years.
  • My campaign is about acquiring the funds to purchase an embroidery machine that will expand my current sewing business, as well as a couple of other machines (additional serger and sewing machine) to be able to take my business to the next level.
  • This campaign is important to me for a few reasons. I believe that people should be able to achieve success on their own terms. I support local handmade items and believe in the power of community. I want to be able to stay home with my son (and hopefully future children) and not have him raised by strangers. The nature of our world makes this very difficult, with expenses and costs at every turn. I don't believe I should have this opportunity for nothing and commit hard work and determination to build a business that helps to support my family and our goals.

Funding requirements and What's in it for you!

  • I am looking for $5000 in crowd funding to purchase a high quality embroidery machine, threads & materials and other supplies, an additional serger and an additional sewing machine that offers more stitching options.
  • People love great stuff! Boe Baby makes great stuff for you! In exchange for your contribution, you will receive the amount you invest in one of three forms:
  • The equivalent in embroidery services, boutique inventory, or my time to assist you with your own projects and marketing needs.
  • If I am not able to reach my entire goal, I will use the funds raised to purchase whichever machines I am able. Any new machine is a start and I am grateful for any level of investment!

The Impact

  • Small business and entrepreneurial spirit is the backbone of our economy, especially in the face of uncertain times. Your support will assist me in being able to help support my family on my terms and contribute to a diverse economy that supports women in business.
  • I have a proven track record of being a hard working entrepreneur and being committed to my goals and dreams. I believe in supporting those around me and I believe I have great products to offer people.
  • Your investment will directly impact my family.

Risks & Challenges

In my heart, I am afraid of failure. This is what drives me. I am scared of not succeeding, so I push and push to be able to overcome. I am motivated to make Boe Baby a success.

Part of me feels like "Who am I to ask people to give me money to buy new equipment?" But I guess sometimes you just have to take the chance! There's that old cliche "nothing ventured, nothing gained" for a reason!

Other Ways You Can Help

As these are uncertain times, I recognize that financial assistance isn't always feasible! Fear not! There are other ways you can help! If you believe in what Boe Baby has to offer, share and promote this campaign! The value of a good word is immeasurable!

story:
All Perks will be shipped before christmas 2015!

Important Information: This is a high quality product and not to compare with similar chinese products. Our product is made in Europe. The connectors to the Apple Watch are CNC machined in germany.

If our goal ($ 2000) can not be achieved, the perks will be delivered anyway.
Band is available in retail after campaign for $119.99.

Bluestein Milanaise – Getting your style on! Get the stainless steel band your Apple Watch, Apple Watch Sport and Apple Watch Edition deserves!

Our Goal? Join us on our journey to get the production for more colored Milanaise Loops going.

With your help we will be able to set up a production line for other colors. 

Why? We want to bring color to the game – with all new stylish black, gold and yes – rose gold milanaise wrist bands. 

Where? Since 2005, a small Goldsmith manufacturer in Zagreb/Croatia has specialized on Milanaise watch bands for watch factories in Swiss, Germany and all of Europe.

Whats the difference to other Milanaise Bands?

  • Bluestein Milanaise Bands are High Quality bands that fit your Apple Watch 100%.
  • The magnetic closure does not open by itself while wearing. See the Shake Test Video here.
  • We use the same material Apple uses for their Milanaise Wrist Bands.
  • OUR WRISTBANDS ARE MADE IN EUROPE. YOU WILL SEE THE DIFFERENCE TO CHINESE PRODUCTS WHEN YOU HOLD IT IN YOUR HAND.

Measurements:

  • 38 mm Band: Lenght: 23.5 cm/9.25 Inch; Width: 2 cm/0.79 Inch, for wrists sized 130-180 mm.
  • 42 mm Band: Lenght: 25 cm/9.84; Width: 2 cm/0.79 Inch, for wrists sized 150–200 mm.


The Bluestein Milanaise – 6 reasons why we have the better loop
  • Classic Style - Expertly crafted silky woven 316L stainless steel mesh.
  • Magnetic Adjustable Strap - The strap design fits on every wrist size. 
  • Light as a Feather - In terms of lightness, it beats all other straps on the market.
  • Durable & Scratch Proof - No deformation or any discoloration through everyday wear.
  • Comfortable Fit - The flow of air permits a more comfy fit to your wrist.
  • Apple Watch Compatible - Perfectly fits your 38mm/42mm Apple Watch. (also Apple Watch Sport)

WE BELIEVE HIGH QUALITY PRODUCTS SHOULDN‘T BREAK THE BANK.

Get this: The Early Bird Special for our wrist band will be $59 – Apple sells theirs for $149 – Just saying. How we can do that? We are the producer and we don’t have any corporate overheads.

What we bring to the table:
  • High Quality.  316L Stainless steel (same as Apple).
  • 4 colors for your 38mm or 42mm watch
  • A sporty elegant, comfortable, classy and unisex wrist band.
  • 2 fits, 4 colors. Unbeatable price.


The 316L steel Bluestein Milanaise wrist bands that are portrayed in the above pictures are part of our actual production units. With your contribution we hope to enter our mass production phase for three new colors and bring the Bluestein band to Apple watch users all over the world for the unbeatable price of €59 (Early Bird). With our current sufficient means we will be able to produce for about 2000 Early Bird Specials and with your help we aim a raise in our production figures through the acquisition of new machines for other colors. 
With our knowledge in crowdfunding campaigns we tried our best to minimize any possible challenges that could arise during the process of setting up this new project and we feel highly prepared to start off this new Indiegogo campaign.

All Perks will be shipped before christmas 2015!

Important Information: This is a high quality product and not to compare with similar chinese products. Our product is made in Europe. The connectors to the Apple Watch are CNC machined in germany.

If our goal ($ 2000) can not be achieved, the perks will be delivered anyway.
Band is available in retail after campaign for $119.99.

story:
Hi there. 

We are Yaus Games. We are a manufacturing startup that specializes in gaming peripherals and accessories for both analog and digital games.

Yaus Games was built on the vision of its founder, Syed Khaled, who is an avid gamer all his life. Being a 20 plus year Magic the Gathering player and running a local gaming store SPARTAN GAMES ARENA, kind of solidifies him as a gaming nut.

A tournament regular all over Asia, Syed hated carrying his cards in the deckboxes that is in the market today, simply because they are too bulky, cumbersome to carry and don't  store properly in the bags. This led to one hand being completely useless while you are hanging on to your deckbox. Not to mention that current deckboxes bulge once you store them in your bags which leads to very uncomfortable situations especially when all you want to think about is the game.

The goal is for a deckbox that is easy to carry around, store comfortably in your bag and still fit your entire deck and sideboard. The deckbox must also be very durable and can safely store the cards.

Introducing YausBOX : The Deckbox Redefined. 

The YausBOX is folio deckbox that essentially splits the deck into two so that it checks all of the storage issues above and making it comfortable and easy to carry around.

Since most of the bags in the market are designed to accommodate books and documents, it makes all the sense why current deckboxes simply cannot fit in bags. Its like forcing a square peg into a round hole, it would eventually fit, but it would feel out of place. Hence the YausBOX is designed to be able to fit in those spaces and not make the bag seems to be bursting at the seams. 


Also the YausBOX  can actually fit in your pocket (medium to large sized ones). Especially good if you are into cargo pants.


We also wanted the YausBOX to be strong and sturdy, thats why we have chosen to use Polypropylene (PP)  plastic which is super durable and strong. In fact we engineered the YausBOX to withstand direct throws to the wall and off course drops on the floor. 

With its Dual Clasp System, it ensures that your YausBOX will only open when you want it to. We have designed these clasps to be strong but not difficult to open whenever you want to access your cards.

Since the design of the YausBOX is folio, stacking them for storage is definitely easy. In fact you can stack up two YausBOX quite easily in a regular bag. Stacking multiple YausBOX on the shelves makes for a clean and simple look that is pleasing to the eyes.

Now you no longer have to make any concessions towards your comfort whenever you carry your cards. Since YausBox is essentially a “book”, it feels natural to carry around in your hands. With the texture of PP, it feels grippy and doesn’t feel that it is going to slip out your hands easily. Even if it does, you know your cards are safe and secure in the YausBOX.

Created with competitive and casual TCG players in mind, YausBOX will fit 80 double sleeved cards or 100 single sleeved cards (standard size). We designed the YausBOX so that putting in and taking cards out would be easy. The decks are fully exposed on one side so that you can use you fingers to lift the cards in one go very easily.

A card divider will be provided in each YausBOX to separate the mainboard and sideboard. YausBOX will also fit smaller sized cards as well, but there will a little jiggle.

The Inner Ridge System prevents cards from transferring between chambers so that you can be confident that your precious cards are safe in their designated chambers at all times. 

There is a space in between the chambers to accommodate dices, a small pen or marble or steel tokens. You'll be ready for your next epic battle with the YausBOX in your arsenal.

As an added bonus feature, PP is  actually dry erase friendly as well. This means that you can use dry erase or whiteboard markers to write on the YausBox to keep track of important information. *Do bear in mind that,it will cause the deckbox to stain a little, but nothing rubbing alcohol cannot clean*

                                          


We are a husband and wife team with a simple goal, to indulge the husband in his quest to bring innovation to the gaming world (heh :D). After years of attending tournaments locally and abroad, I realize that we needed an innovation in the deckbox department. Not just during tournaments, but after as well. Lugging around deckboxes in bags with its sharp edges and bulky size can get pretty uncomfortable, pretty fast.

I had an epiphany to create a deckbox that is flush after failing miserably to get to day 2 in a Magic the Gathering Grand Prix (T.T). Having to carry two deckboxes in my bag made it very uncomfortable and cumbersome. It was then I had an eureka moment. When the idea came, I couldn't get it out of my head and immediately got cracking on making this a reality.   

At first, I have to admit, I grossly underestimated how to go about it. This is because I thought “How hard can it be?” Boy I was wrong…

When we approached a local designer to help me design the YausBOX, it was then we realized we had to address many complications. We went through 3 initial designs process in which we had issues with the height clearance, then we had issues with the locking mechanism and a few other bumps along the way.

And things got worse after we 3D printed the box, we found other issues concerning user experience. The 3rd revision of the box was not comfortable to use so it was back to the drawing board to come up with a design that would meet our expectations.

                       

In the meantime, we met up with several injection molding manufacturers to assist us in injecting the YausBOX. It was then we had, yet again, underestimated the process. What type of plastic to use? Which steel to use to make the mold from? , injection lead time issues and many more other opportunities to learn came up (I’m being very optimistic here). 

When we finally submitted the 5th revision of the box, the “injectors” told us that the design is flawed, it totally floored us. At this point we were 5 months in, almost all of our savings are in the project and we couldn’t move forward with the  production of the product.

           

Luckily the Managing Director of the company, a very nice and knowledgeable guy with 30 years of experience in the industry, told us that the problem can be fixed but we still had to send the design in for a revamp.

So we worked closely with an industrial designer that he recommended. It was at this juncture we learned a lot more about plastics and the process behind it. After about a month later, the redesign was done. It was slightly thicker and taller than before. This is to ensure that there is no flex in the plastic. The designer created a dual clasp system that would ensure the deckbox doesn’t open accidentally and secure the cards in the box. 

When we proceeded to 3D print after some minor changes, the print came out perfect. Immediately we commissioned the mold to be made. Then it was the start of the painful wait.

             


After we passed the 6 weeks projected time needed to tool the mold, we were already sweating our pants. We wanted to start the campaign by Christmas or at the very least at the start of the new year but there wasn’t a working sample of the product and we wanted to be sure of everything. Then when it got delayed a further 2 weeks, we went completely blank. 

Then the call happened. The mold was ready and test prints was made. 

However, unfortunately, we were disappointed with the result.

The product didn’t come out to our expectation and we didn’t want to deliver a subpar product to our customers, so it was back to the drawing board, and we realized that we missed certain crucial elements again related to user experience.

Finally after an extra 2 weeks, a total of 8 months since the inception of the idea, we have a final prototype. We commissioned an adjustment to the mold and when the injector showed us the test print, we knew we had a winner. 


This project literally took over our lives. We have poured all our savings, time, heart and soul into the project . I simply could not have done it without the help of my partners at Spartan Games Arena holding the fort for me while I pursue this dream. Now that we have done all the necessary work on the design and tooling, we are nearly tapped out in terms of funds. 

We want to build Yaus Games as a brand that will continue to produce more innovative products down the line (We actually have a pretty kickass sleeve idea that we want to produce, but that's another campaign for another time) but in order to make that into a reality, we need to establish ourselves as a trusted company that can deliver on quality products and most importantly our promises. 

Help us guys and get this project of the ground! Do contribute and share the campaign with your friends as well.

Thank you for time. Thank you for your contribution.

                                                        

Syed Khaled 
CEO
Permanent Slave at Spartan Games Arena

A lawyer by training turned game store owner. He enjoys playing every type of games there is - cardgames, boardgames, miniatures, console and PC games as well. He loves spending time with his family and friends as well as attending to his customers at the shop. He has a two year old son that he completely adores and a wife that keeps him grounded whom he loves dearly. " A man needs hobbies " he always say, his is apparently poking fun at his wife. For shits and giggles.


       

Fifi Syafiza
Director
Sales Girl Extraordinaire

A decade of her young adult life was spent building a few businesses. Some she did very well, some trashed to the ground. And when her first son was born, she was more than happy to take a break from the hustle bustle of the business world to raise her child. Intrigued at the gaming world that her husband introduced to her, she felt at home when coming onboard for Yaus Games because it plays to her strength of selling. She loves to paint and garden as well. 


      

Designetic Studio
Designer

We offer our clients a number of integrated services at Designetic Studio. We combine the expertise of multiple Design disciplinary, from Graphics, Products, Exhibitions to Architecture & Interior Design all under one roof. 

The advantage of a multi-disciplinary team keeps the information flowing through a single source, eliminating communication delays between key members.

We also collaborate with other professionals with technical and industry expertise to ensure that our clients receive excellent professional services in specialized areas.

Contact: designetic.studio@gmail.com


Axpic Design 

Packaging and Infographics Designer

Axpic's vision is to aspire great designs in local business community. We specialize in serving Small and Medium Enterprises (SME), corporate and online businesses to make their business sustainably well known. 

This is by creating professional brand identity involving  graphic design, photography, videography, and printing. In all the services, we consult our clients with genuine interest according to their business’s needs and requirements in term of branding and marketing strategy. 

We design memorable logo, packaging, and other print and online designs (including poster, flyers, banner, bunting, and other marketing materials). Plus, we provide products & food photography, corporate portraiture, highlight videography as well as printing services to accomodate client’s marketing strategy.  

Contact: axpic.my@gmail.com

My3DMi

Industrial 3D Printing and Rapid Prototyping

My3DMi is a 3D Design & Printing agency, specialized in making products for people and companies, from prototypes to models. We provide 3D Printing, 3D Scanning and 3D Modeling services.

Website: www.my3dmi.com

Contact: ch.lau@my3dmi.com


Fujin Liow

Videographer

Fujin Liow is a Malaysia based photographer, cinematographer, and visual artist.

 Fujin Liow has many years of experience in shooting short films and photos of destination weddings around South-east Asia, as well as shooting commercially for renowned brands. 

Fujin Liow not only works on photography and short film projects independently, but also with different various local production houses on contracted basis. 

Website: www.fujinliow.my

Contact: fujinliow@gmail.com


WHY SPLIT THE DECK?

Its the only way to achieve a flush design so that it could fit in your bag easily. We went with this concept so that carrying it around feels natural as well. This is the paradigm shift that we felt will resolve this need during and after play especially during tournaments. It took us about 1-2 seconds to load each chamber, and the YausBOX is designed to push the cards in place when it is about to close. 

WHY DOES A FULL DECK DOUBLE SLEEVED CARDS SEEMS TO NOT FIT PROPERLY?

This only happens if you recently changed sleeves and there is still air pockets in the sleeves. We actually designed it to clear 43 double sleeved cards per chamber (the 3 cards is allowance for clearance) however the air pockets puffed the cards even more. In fact for our measurements, we took a fully foiled double sleeved deck to ensure a perfect fit. Rest assured that there is enough clearance to fit the entire 80 double sleeved cards as advertised, simply compress your deck to let the air out and it will fit beautifully. 

SO IT CAN WITHSTAND FALLS, HOW HIGH?

Well honestly we didn't throw it from the 8th floor to test it out but we did however emulate accidental falls literally a few hundred times and threw the YausBOX against the wall as well. The YausBOX took it like a champ. Oh this is done in a fully foiled double sleeved deck as well. Our heart skipped a beat a few times every time we did it, but it was for the greater good.

I NOTICED SOME WHITENING AT THE SEAMS, SHOULD I BE WORRIED?

No you shouldn't. This is the characteristic of Polypropylene plastic when mixed with colour pigments and the whitening is a normal process. We have have an assurance by our injectors that the seams are rated at 100,000 openings before they start to fail. This is for both the dual clasp system seam as well as the seam that holds the bottom and top parts together.

I NOTICED SOME WHITENING AFTER A FALL, SHOULD I BE WORRIED NOW?

No, no you shouldn't. Again it is the characteristic of the plastic material used in conjunction with the colour pigments. The YausBOX, though it is very sturdy, will flex under sudden pressure and as such will cause the plastic to whiten. Again, rest assured that your cards inside are safe, which is the most important thing.

GREAT PRODUCT! HOW WILL I GET IT AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?

Thanks for the support! We will be completing our orders for our backers on IndieGOGO first. Once that is done, we will approach your local game store to carry the YausBOX. We fully anticipate the YausBOX to be on the shelves of your LGS by June or July this year. 

Do follow us on our Facebook page here , or our Twitter here or our Instagram here to get latest news from us.

You may still order the YausBOX from IndieGOGO because we have chosen to opt-in their In-Demand initiative.

You may purchase the YausBOX from our website as well (by June/July 2016)

www.yausgames.com

Fujin Liow is a Malaysia based photographer, cinematographer, and visual artist.
 Fujin Liow has many years of experience in shooting short films and photos of destination weddings around South-east Asia, as well as shooting commercially for renowned brands. 
Fujin Liow not only works on photography and short film projects independently, but also with different various local production houses on contracted basis. 
Website: www.fujinliow.my
Contact: fujinliow@gmail.com

WHY SPLIT THE DECK?
Its the only way to achieve a flush design so that it could fit in your bag easily. We went with this concept so that carrying it around feels natural as well. This is the paradigm shift that we felt will resolve this need during and after play especially during tournaments. It took us about 1-2 seconds to load each chamber, and the YausBOX is designed to push the cards in place when it is about to close. 
WHY DOES A FULL DECK DOUBLE SLEEVED CARDS SEEMS TO NOT FIT PROPERLY?
This only happens if you recently changed sleeves and there is still air pockets in the sleeves. We actually designed it to clear 43 double sleeved cards per chamber (the 3 cards is allowance for clearance) however the air pockets puffed the cards even more. In fact for our measurements, we took a fully foiled double sleeved deck to ensure a perfect fit. Rest assured that there is enough clearance to fit the entire 80 double sleeved cards as advertised, simply compress your deck to let the air out and it will fit beautifully. 
SO IT CAN WITHSTAND FALLS, HOW HIGH?
Well honestly we didn't throw it from the 8th floor to test it out but we did however emulate accidental falls literally a few hundred times and threw the YausBOX against the wall as well. The YausBOX took it like a champ. Oh this is done in a fully foiled double sleeved deck as well. Our heart skipped a beat a few times every time we did it, but it was for the greater good.
I NOTICED SOME WHITENING AT THE SEAMS, SHOULD I BE WORRIED?
No you shouldn't. This is the characteristic of Polypropylene plastic when mixed with colour pigments and the whitening is a normal process. We have have an assurance by our injectors that the seams are rated at 100,000 openings before they start to fail. This is for both the dual clasp system seam as well as the seam that holds the bottom and top parts together.
I NOTICED SOME WHITENING AFTER A FALL, SHOULD I BE WORRIED NOW?
No, no you shouldn't. Again it is the characteristic of the plastic material used in conjunction with the colour pigments. The YausBOX, though it is very sturdy, will flex under sudden pressure and as such will cause the plastic to whiten. Again, rest assured that your cards inside are safe, which is the most important thing.
GREAT PRODUCT! HOW WILL I GET IT AFTER THE CAMPAIGN ENDS?
Thanks for the support! We will be completing our orders for our backers on IndieGOGO first. Once that is done, we will approach your local game store to carry the YausBOX. We fully anticipate the YausBOX to be on the shelves of your LGS by June or July this year. 
Do follow us on our Facebook page here , or our Twitter here or our Instagram here to get latest news from us.
You may still order the YausBOX from IndieGOGO because we have chosen to opt-in their In-Demand initiative.
You may purchase the YausBOX from our website as well (by June/July 2016)
www.yausgames.com

story:
I have always had the dream of designing clothing. When I was a teen, in the 90s, fashion was always on my mind. For me, it was more about creating fashion. I loved vintage clothing. Any era delighted my soul. Better yet, I loved making my own clothes. The downside to being a teen without resources to fabric? Thrifting. Through thrifting I was able to purchase what I considered "clothes with potential" that could be made new. This translated into adulthood. I have created many costumes from thrift finds. I have created apparel through thrift finds. 
 
Though my path did not take me to fashion school. I am self taught. I utilize what has now been coined as upcycling or as I like to call Frankensteining. Turning a pair of pants into a bolero jacket. It's through my ability to find amazing pieces to fix up and sell or make entirely new. Retro Sparkles is my dream come to life. With recent occurrences with my job and the car wreck I had a month ago, the dream is starting to fade.  So, fundraising is my last effort to keep my dream alive to provide affordable apparel for Men & Women of all sizes. 

  At this moment, I need to raise $3,500.00 to help keep this alive. It goes to fixing my sewing machine. Buying stock and supplies. Fees that need to be paid to the State of Oklahoma. Marketing and displays for trade shows. 

This will also help me to launch the kid's verison, Magic Sparkles. I have the domain name and am working on a website & logo. 

 I will have various incentive perks for donations. Totes, posters, and more.

 Even if I do not reach my goal, I will put the money into keeping Retro Sparkles going. 

Donating will allow me to make this more than it is. You will be supporting a small start up business. My goals include having product available in a local store and eventually opening a store of my own.

Even sharing helps. So, please do what you can to help me keep my dream alive.

story:
Short Summary

Inspired by the everyday struggles of two friends, Insane Inseam was born out of the frustration for the lack of availability and affordability of clothing for tall people. Amy and Melissa, the two co-founders, came up with a solution: an online marketplace for buying and selling tall finds. This website brings the online tall community one step closer to easy to find and affordable tall clothing!

Amy and Melissa have done what they can so far, but they need your help! As entrepreneurs with large dreams they hope you will contribute.

What We Need & What You Get

Insane Inseam is asking you to help them reach their goal of $5000. The money raised will go towards:

  • Purchasing inventory: This would mean more selection! More sizes, lengths, and options for you--both new and used inventory!
  • Advertising: The more people the reach, the better the site is for all tall people!
  • Dress Form: With a dress form, we know we can take better pictures to help you get a better idea of what the clothes look like.
In return, you will earn some sweet perks---discounts to our store, tshirts, blog features, and more!
If we don't reach our goal, we will use the funds raised to purchase additional inventory so you can go shopping and have an even greater selection.

The Impact

With thousands of people all over the United States falling into the tall category, people with extra long inseams, and people with extra long limbs, there is a large percentage of us who struggle to find clothing that fits and that won't make us go broke.

By supporting Insane Inseam, you are making it easier for tall people to find well fitting, affordable clothing.

Other Ways You Can Help

We understand if you can't contribute financially, but you can contribute in other ways! Make sure to share the campaign with your friends, follow us on Twitter, like us on Facebook, and follow us on Pinterest. And tell every tall person you run across about us!

A huge thank you to Michigan Creative for producing our video and for Kellie's Consignments for letting us use their space for filming!

story:
Files by Less

We have created an affordable salon grade gel polish line that is absolutely amazing for salon or home use!!!

As professional nail techs and beauty consultants, we are passionate about the service we provide to our clients.  We have loved the introduction of gel nail products over the last few years, but we have often been disappointed by the quality, cost or availability of product.  After trying many different systems, we decided to take the bull by the horns and create a high quality, but affordable product of our own.

We are passionate about networking with other beauty specialists and helping others succeed in their fashion/beauty based businesses.  We also want to offer a quality system our clients can use at home in between their professional appointments.  Our goal is four-fold... to offer a better quality product at a more affordable price... to use only healthy, natural ingredients... to provide training on application techniques for amazing results... and  to teach approaches on building a more successful nails business.

Over the last few months, we have proven the superiority of our product.  Now we need your help to complete our branding and manufacture our first big batch.  Perks for supporting us include Product, Files gear and even Founder status with the company!

Be the first to try out Files Gel by Less and get Founder pricing for life for supporting Files in the start-up phase of our business!  As soon as we can mix up this batch, we will send out product so you can experience the Files difference.

We are sticklers for quality control.  Each batch of Files gel polish is tested throughout the manufacturing process for several important factors such as drying time, smoothness of flow, gloss, hardness, color, abrasion resistance, etc.  That way, we can ensure the perfect gel product for you.  

We also take extreme measures to ensure the purity of all raw materials used in our formulas and each stage of production.  All Files materials are solvent free.  We incorporate natural elements and nutrients to keep nails strong and healthy.

You will find that Files gels are easy to apply with no shrinkage, wrinkles or bubbles.

  • Quick cure dry with UV or LED lights
  • No shrinkage, No wrinkles, No bubbles
  • Durable, high shine for 3 to 4 weeks
  • Vibrant colors
  • Easy to soak off formula
  • Free of BPA, DBP, solvents, toluene or formaldehyde
  • Very flexible and durable for a strong natural nail
  • Great for salon or home use

Don't forget to LIKE us on Facebook and SHARE with your friends!  That kind of support means the world to us too!!!

story:
Sepehr Maghsoudi is a Dutch fashion designer with a Persian background. His vibrant personality and enthusiasm for craftsmanship and experimentation are visible in his collections.

In 2008 Sepehr started his own brand in Paris. All of the 14 collections he made over these last 7 years have gained international recognition. To be attending the Paris Couture week is a huge opportunity to take his innovative 15th collection out of the Netherlands.

Support Sepehr to present his next collection in Paris! 

“From 2014 on there have been calls from different countries to come over and present my collection abroad. It is my wildest dream to do so, but I need your support to help me make this dream come true.” 

“Fashion-art is my fate and destiny and my ambition has always been to conquer the world with my designs. After being invited to participate in New York, Vancouver and LA fashion weeks, I have had my sights set on global expansion, and Paris speaks to me as a couturier.” 

“Currently I am designing my 15th collection. Being eager to spread my wings I have decided to present this collection during the Paris Couture Week, January 2017.”

Join Sepehr and be part of this experience! 

To achieve this courageous goal Sepehr Maghsoudi is hosting a campaign to raise the money for his participation in the Paris couture week. 

 

Through this campaign we want to raise €26.000 

The money will go towards the ‘Paris Project’ in order to set up the show in Paris. This full set-up, consisting of models, location, catering, light, seating, travelling and accommodation for 35 + people, is expected to cost €26.000 

Contributors to the current campaign will receive various gifts depending upon their donation, from an original designer T-shirts and seat at the Paris show to an original handmade design for men or women by Sepehr Maghsoudi . 

With this show we also want to give a stage for upcoming artists to make this an experience through film and music.

Companies that want to support this project with their products or services are more than welcome. Please contact: sepehrmaghsoudi@gmail.com for information about our favours and services in return. 

This crowdfunding campaign provides a way for everyone to get involved through donations, large and small, to contribute to the next phase in the international expansion of Sepehr Maghsoudi as a couturier. 

We welcome everyone who wants to participate in this project.

 

Short biography of Sepehr Maghsoudi 

Sepehr Maghsoudi, Dutch fashion designer with a Persian background, is known for his exclusive, innovative and constructive designs. He is a two-times winner of the Edgar Vos Couture price, was awarded Fashion Designer of the Year 2012 and his couture designs were on show in the Westfries Museum in Hoorn, the Netherlands. 

Sepehr designed for famous people like Armin van Buuren and made a scarf for Queen Maxima of the Netherlands. He styled big artists like Eva Simons, Ferry Corsten, Kate Ryan and Maan, winner of The Voice of Holland 2016, who used his designs in their video clips and on their CD covers. 

Sepehr Maghsoudi also designed for Just Dance, nr 1 Ubisoft game for Nintendo Wii, for an episode of MTV’s “My Super Sweet Sixteen” and participated in “Project Catwalk” and “The Face”. 

Sepehr created costumes for the Dutch movies “Heksen bestaan niet” and “Fashion Chicks”. 

His work has been published worldwide in Vogue Italy, Elle, Esquire, Razor Red, Zink Magazine and many more.

The eyes of the world are on Sepehr Maghsoudi

Shortly after presenting his 11th collection “Talking with Silence” in July 2014, Sepehr was nominated for the Mercedes-Benz Fashion Week New York. The comments of the jury were full of praise: 

''Sepehr Maghsoudi is an impressive designer and this Brand fits perfectly with our theme of Artistically inspired fashion designers from around the world. We checked his work on his website as you recommended http://sepehrmaghsoudi.com/ and are very impressed by his creative, innovative craftsmanship. We also investigated his work on his latest fashion shows, reviews in the press and on social media and are pleased. We are therefore delighted to be able to allow this brand to Mercedes Benz New York''. 

And what’s more: some weeks later there was breaking news from the International Designer Coordinator Vancouver Fashion Week: 

'' I am writing to you because our team, after having carefully studied your fabulous collections and great talent, decided to select you as a designer candidate for our next fall/winter season, which will be organized from March 16th to the 22nd 2015. 

We really want to compliment you for your talent and creativity, that you express through the beautiful art of fashion design. Especially, I really like the way you are able to combine simplicity, elegance and research of fabric.'' 

Whereas recently, the management of Style Fashion Week invited him to come to Los Angeles: 

“Love your style and design aesthetic. It has originality which sets you apart.” 

… just imagine what Sepehr may achieve with your support!

story:
OUR PURPOSE

At ClipVR we are passionate about virtual reality (VR) and the future of virtual entertainment.  We believe VR is the most immersive way to capture, share and enjoy media.

Everyday, new VR content is published by companies such as the New York Times, Samsung, Jaunt and consumers on YouTube and Facebook for education, entertainment and promotions.

However, there is a disconnect between captured content and viewing. For example with 360-degree cameras, users can film amazing video and photo content but there is a lack of ability to easily experience and share this immersive content as it was intended to be viewed!

We are driven to create sleek, portable, accessible glasses that enable VR content to be viewed easily on your mobile device, any time, anywhere!


OUR PRODUCT

The ClipVR was born with a dream to find a pocket-able VR solution that would allow users to easily share 360-degree camera content as easily as checking your phone.

Our solution is a pair of clip-on VR glasses that allows users to experience VR, non-intrusively, in any environment.

The simple design of ClipVR makes it portable, and compatible with ANY VR capable mobile device.

We have invested many hours designing and prototyping; we developed a fixed magnetic frame with a separate fixed clip for the ultimate solution - a sturdy, industrial, cool, stylish design.


ClipVR features a magnetic two piece design that clips onto your smartphone screen. These simple pieces allow for ease of assembly/ disassembly and pocket storage!

The Clip

  • Attaches on to any smartphone screen
  • Dual magnets allow for easy, fast use and storage
  • Completely customizable 
  • Rubberized clip mechanism protects screen from scratches 

The Frame 

  • High quality bi-focal  lenses 
  • Engraved nose bridge for comfort
  • Single piece design for strength and stability


RISKS & CHALLENGES

At ClipVR, we have been designing and prototyping the product ourselves, however we need to rely on other companies for volume manufacturing and shipping.

We're confident our product can be produced quickly and easily as we're talking to several established companies with years of experience turning prototypes into high volume manufactured products. We need to be in constant communications with our partners in manufacturing, fulfillment and shipping, no matter the language or location.

While we possess the skills needed for a great development process, we have noted from other campaigns on Indiegogo that things do not always go according to plan. Minor challenges such as shipping, customs or delays in production can cause unintended delays in our process.

We will do our best to oversee every aspect of production in order to create the highest quality products and ship by our scheduled date.

The team at ClipVR will keep you updated every step of the way through our journey!


YOUR SUPPORT

We need to raise $20,000 to continue refining our design, organize a mass manufacturing effort, and expand material and customization options for our customers.

When you donate $19 or more, we will send you a ClipVR with early bird shipping. This means you get your ClipVR before we officially enter the market!

In the higher tiers we include ClipVR t-shirts as well as the ultra-cool ClipVR Platinum, the aluminum framed version of our device.

At the top tier levels we offer early adopter access. If you want to get your hands on ClipVR as soon as possible, this tier is for you!  We will send you a ClipVR well in advance of the product's early bird shipping date. As an early adopter, you will be a beta tester who will provide valued feedback directly to the team. We want to hear from you and your help will shape the future of this project! 

At all backer tiers we will display your name in a special dedication section on our website to thank you for your awesome support!

If you cannot be a backer, no problem! We would love to get your help to spread the word about ClipVR through word-of-mouth or by sharing our story on all the social media sites.
With your help, we can bring the world of casual VR to everyone!


TIMELINE




TEAM



FAQ



Q: What is VR?

A: VR stands for Virtual Reality. Unlike real reality (the actual world in which we live), virtual reality means simulating bits of our world (or completely imaginary worlds) using a smartphone. Apart from games and entertainment, VR is used for training airline pilots and surgeons and helping scientists to figure out complex problems such as the structure of protein molecules.


Q: What do I get when I purchase ClipVR?

A: You will get one ClipVR (black plastic or aluminum) depending on your backer Tier, with a carrying case


Q: How do I use ClipVR?

A: First install one of the recommended VR Apps such as Google Cardboard, Jaunt, Youtube, VRSE, NYT, Orbulus, Discovery VR, etc. Turn the phone horizontally, start the App and attach the ClipVR in the center of your smartphone screen. Select content in the App and enjoy!


Q: Will this work on my phone?

A: ClipVR works with any current smartphone.


Q: Does the screen size of my phone matter?

A: No, we have designed our product to accommodate all screen sizes.


Q: Why is ClipVR better than Google Cardboard?

A: ClipVR is small, portable and detachable. It can be taken out of a pocket and ready for use on a smartphone in a few seconds. With ClipVR, the phone screen remains accessible allowing fast, easy control of the phone and content. No loss of peripheral vision. Nothing to strap to your head. Look cool using ClipVR!

At ClipVR, we have been designing and prototyping the product ourselves, however we need to 
rely on other companies for volume manufacturing and shipping. 
We're 
confident our product can be produced quickly and easily as we're talking to 
several established companies with years of experience turning prototypes into high volume manufactured products. We need to be in constant communications with our partners in manufacturing, fulfillment and shipping, no matter the language or location.
While we possess the skills needed for a great development process, we have noted from other campaigns on Indiegogo that things do not always go according to plan. Minor challenges such as shipping, customs or delays in production can cause unintended delays in our process. 
We will do our best to oversee every aspect of production in order to create the highest quality products and ship by our scheduled date. 
The team at ClipVR will keep you updated every step of the way through our journey!



YOUR SUPPORT

We need to raise $20,000 to continue refining our design, organize a mass manufacturing effort, and expand material and customization options for our customers. 
When you donate $19 or more, we will send you a ClipVR with early bird shipping. This means you get your ClipVR before we officially enter the market! 
In the higher tiers we include ClipVR t-shirts as well as the ultra-cool ClipVR Platinum, the aluminum framed version of our device.
At the top tier levels we offer early adopter access. If you want to get your hands on ClipVR as soon as possible, this tier is for you!  We will send you a ClipVR well in advance of the product's early bird shipping date. As an early adopter, you will be a beta tester who will provide valued feedback directly to the team. We want to hear from you and your help will shape the future of this project! At all backer tiers we will display your name in a special dedication section on our website to thank you for your awesome support!
If you cannot be a backer, no problem! We would love to get your help to spread the word about ClipVR through word-of-mouth or by sharing our story on all the social media sites. 

With your help, we can bring the world of casual VR to everyone!TIMELINE 













TEAM




FAQ


Q: What is VR?
A: VR stands for Virtual Reality. Unlike real reality (the actual world in which we live), virtual reality means simulating bits of our world (or completely imaginary worlds) using a smartphone. Apart from games and entertainment, VR is used for training airline pilots and surgeons and helping scientists to figure out complex problems such as the structure of protein molecules.
Q: What do I get when I purchase ClipVR?
A: You will get one ClipVR (black plastic or aluminum) depending on your backer Tier, with a carrying case 
Q: How do I use ClipVR?
A: First install one of the recommended VR Apps such as Google Cardboard, Jaunt, Youtube, VRSE, NYT, Orbulus, Discovery VR, etc. Turn the phone horizontally, start the App and attach the ClipVR in the center of your smartphone screen. Select content in the App and enjoy!
Q: Will this work on my phone?
A: ClipVR works with any current smartphone. 
Q: Does the screen size of my phone matter?
A: No, we have designed our product to accommodate all screen sizes.
Q: Why is ClipVR better than Google Cardboard?
A: ClipVR is small, portable and detachable. It can be taken out of a pocket and ready for use on a smartphone in a few seconds. With ClipVR, the phone screen remains accessible allowing fast, easy control of the phone and content. No loss of peripheral vision. Nothing to strap to your head. Look cool using ClipVR!

story:
If you look around the watch market today, you will find that the combination of luxury, affordability, and minimalism is exceedingly difficult or even impossible to find. Whatever the reason for this, we know that people are clamoring for just such a watch.

At McGregor Watches, we are offering fully certified and approved watches that are luxurious, affordable, and minimalist. We bring to the table more than 30 years of watchmaking experience, enabling us to develop our products to a high standard and charge a fraction of what our competitors are charging.

The beauty of the McGregor is that it is smart enough to turn heads at the office, but also perfect to sport on the beach in a casual t-shirt. You truly do get your money’s worth with this watch for all occasions. Our vision is to put the perfect watch on your wrist, and a beaming smile on your face.

Not only do we aim to bring happiness to our buyers, but we are also committed to making a difference through our work. For every watch purchased, we at McGregor will donate a portion to UNICEF’s child support and education program. Each sale can make a difference to a young person’s life and help pave the way for future innovators in the next generation. An investment in a McGregor watch is an investment in us, in yourself, and in those who need it most.

Our watches use the finest Japanese Miyota quartz JS25 movement, with a superb two year battery life. The sapphire crystal class and 316L stainless steel complement each other for a smooth, shiny finish to the stunning time piece. The hands are diamond cut, with a beautiful dial coming in a range of color choices. This minimalist design is both stunning and original, and is definitely enough to catch an eye.

​

  • Japanese Miyota Quartz JS25 Movement
  • Sapphire Crystal Face (Scratch-Resistant)
  • 316L Stainless Steel Case (Ultra-Durable)
  • Diamond Cut Hands
  • Solid Stainless Steel Band
  • Waterproof up to 5ATM
  • 12-Month Warranty
  • 45mm Case

 

We know exactly what our customers want from their watch, a fashionable wrist accessory, good quality and long-lasting material, accurate timekeeping, and an affordable price. With the McGregor, we spend hours and hours of tireless effort into design and manufacturing until we finally combined all four in perfect harmony. Guaranteed to last, turn heads, keep time, and not hurt your wallet, we design our watch faces to make yours smile. :)

Right now, we have come to you, Indiegogo, for help raising the funds that we need to manufacture, market, and distribute the first run of McGregor watches worldwide. To show our appreciation for your support, we are offering early access to our watches (and additional discounts) exclusively through this campaign.

Beyond making a monetary contribution, you can show your support for what we are doing by sharing a link to our campaign on any social media platforms that you use. Instagram, Facebook, and Twitter are all excellent avenues for spreading the word about McGregor Watches. We appreciate all your support, and we thank you for your time!

SO, if you’re in the market for a time piece, look no further. Not only will you get a top quality product for a fraction of the price, but you will also be helping us do our bit in the wider community. We want to expand our brand, and commit to helping more and more charities as we grow, but we need your help to do that.

Time is expensive, but your watch doesn’t have to be. Buy a McGregor today…

story:
AFFORDABLE LUXURY WATCHES

 

 

Timeless sporty watch design.

 

WE ARE FRENCH DESIGNERS PASSIONATE BY WATCHES

We Chose only the best materials to offer you a true luxury watch without the pricetag!

Proudly Made in China like 99% of the watches you can buy on earth!

 

What We Need & What You Get

We just need 10'000$ to launch the first production and start the e-shop

For us the more important is to offer the best quality for the best price

Normally a watch collection like this will be sold at list 25O$ in the regular jewelry shops for the Quartz and 600$ for the Automatic version.

We will use Japanese Miyota movement for the quartz collection and Seiko NH35 for the Automatic version.

 

 

Stainless Steel 

Saphire Glass

 

Back the campaign and you will get 30% off 

 

 

 

The Impact

99% of the watches you can buy are made in China.

The other brands do not assume that. At #NoShame Watches We do!

And we don't feel Ashame because now Chinese watches suppliers are the best, and we all have been working for Swiss watch brands so we know what we are talking about.

That's why we named the brand #NoShameWatches.

 

Risks & Challenges

There is no risks in this project we have sourced the watches from one of the best chinese factory.

The samples are working perfectly and as you can see on the video and the quality is speechless for the price we offer.

story:
Short Summary

 

Hey Guys!

First of I would like extend my thank you to everyone and anyone that is reading this. My name is Brittany Williams born and raised and Dallas, Texas but  I currently reside in Miami,Florida. I am a 26 year old women who is trying to find her way in life! I always been a smart young lady, that has never has been closed minded or afraid to try new things.  After moving to New York in 2013 I was inspired by all of the fashion culture, from small independent brands to the huge ones! The people’s  nonchalant attitudes is what i loved the most, they didn’t care to wear what the wanted or start up a business of not knowing if it will succeed or starting a music career , or even the guys that danced on the train.

Which brings me to my brand NoVa Swim! Being originally from Dallas I am used to nice hot weather so when i moved to New York , I traveled a lot to Miami because I am so in love with water and I like being free. I enjoyed walking around in nice bikinis without any one judging you. The day after visiting Miami, I decided to start my own swim wear line but I wanted to make sure that the quality was perfect, Which was important because there are so many beautiful women that feel insur red about their bodies. I knew for a fact if I had great quality then they would feel more comfortable  wearing my product. I don’t wanna whole sale because that’s the easy way out, I wanted to design my own things, of course in swim wear you are going to have your basic styles but I want to give people something different, something where people will turn around to ask where that from! Most importantly I wanted something to call mines even if I make $200 off my whole brand, it is something that will be mines, something that I can pass down to my kids, something that will be able to grow forever. If there’s water on this earth, swim wear will always be in demand. 

 

What We Need & What You Get

 

After I decided to move forward with my brand I knew that I will need to get someone that was an expert in patterns and samples which if you know anything about being a designer you know that is EXPENSIVE! A lot of people don’t understand that samples cost about $100-$250 per sample. If that sample need adjustments then that’s another $100-250 until it’s the perfect fit. Same thing with patterns, patterns are your blue print to any new design. If your sample is wrong, it’s a 90%   chance that the patterns need work as well. After getting the patterns and samples perfect, you move on to grading which is sizing which cost about $100-$200. After that is completed we can’t forget packing which is really important because presentation is everything. Tags, hang tags, packing will run me from $500-$1000. Finally we have the marketing and promotion which includes photo shoots, makeup,venues, and hair and I will be looking at $1000. 

As for the funding I am looking about $5000-$6000.

I have 5 new design that I want to launch, below I will attach a photo of the invoices.

I can’t  say what I will do if I don’t reach my goal because I believe in my self and my brand that it hasn’t even crossed my mind at all because I know that if I am able to reach my goal that I can release a great brand that will continue to get better.

The Impact

The target market for NOVA SWIM is women between the ages of 18-35. NOVA SWIM fabric is flexible and flattering to a range of sizes from petite to plus size. The colors and designs chosen are to offer women a wide range of options. The fabric is high quality and will withstand sand, chlorine and ocean water maintaining it’s color and high quality feel. 

Also It’s really important for me to give back to the community some way. With that being said once I reach my selling goal the first month I plan on helping organizations in Miami.

Other Ways You Can Help

Dont worry if you can’t help, by spreading the word will make a big difference.

story:
About Jo-Anne Vernay

My name is Dyandra Raye, founder of Jo-Anne Vernay luxury vegan shoes made from pineapples. I started this company after my transition into veganism and sustainable fashion almost 3 years ago. After noticing a void in the market for luxury vegan shoes made from eco-friendly materials and not polyurethane, I used my 10 year retail/fashion career and childhood passion for sketching shoes to found Jo-Anne Vernay. Name after my mother Jo-Anne who was my inspiration for a fashion career and my late Aunt Vernay who supported my childhood designs, this brand holds a special place in my heart. Jo-Anne Vernay is on a mission to show consumers how they can merge sustainability with style through luxury vegan shoes and accessories. 

I proudly launched our first design, the Mel heel, in March 2020 during a live stream. Impacted by COVID-19 at the onset of the pre-sale, customers soon became unable to invest in luxury goods which impacted money on hand for production. With sales slowing I decided to create an Indiegogo campaign to help us reach the dollar amount needed to complete production in Italy. This campaign will take Jo-Anne Vernay’s winning design from prototype to production during uncertain times, for conscious consumers to enjoy in the late summer months. 

Our Sustainable Footprint

Jo-Anne Vernay is more than a shoe line, it's a brand that honors the vegan lifestyle. The main material Pinatex is biodegradable and PETA approved, providing conscious consumers with a product that is better for the planet. Jo-Anne Vernay’s custom packaging is also sustainable, made from recycled materials to uphold our vegan morals. The mission is to provide fashion-focused customers the ability to invest in shoes that they can feel good wearing too. 

Challenges & Rewards

Since the inception of Jo-Anne Vernay in 2018, I've overcome the main challenge which is funding for start-ups. Through crowdfunding, angel investors and bootstrapping I've invested $15,000 into sampling, prototyping, marketing and e-retailing. The fruits of labor have been worth the hustle, with customers placing pre-orders during the pandemic, celebrity inquiries, fortune 500 collaborations and most importantly organic press. In order to keep the cash flow positive during the pandemic, I've cut back on certain marketing projects and brought duties in-house that I and my contracted staff now handle. 

The Exchange

Jo-Anne Vernay currently needs to raise $10,000 to cover a portion of our production payment in Italy. In exchange for your much-appreciated donation, Jo-Anne Vernay is offering 3 delicious perks including gift cards to use towards your purchase and a future designed named after you. If the unforeseen event that the goal isn’t met, I will allocate all the funds towards production. 

Other Ways To Help

If you can't contribute or buy a perk, there are so many ways you can help spread the word about Jo-Anne Vernay. Follow us on Instagram @joannevernay, like us on Facebook @joannevernayofficial and tag a fashionable friend. You can also share this campaign with Indiegogo's share tools to keep the message moving. The more we talk about sustainable style the more conscious consumerism can become the norm. I thank you all for your support along this journey!

story:
Why Straws?

Single use plastics are a serious environmental problem.

Between 2000-2010 we created more single use plastics than the entire 20th century

The cost is too high for many types of plastics to be recycled. They end up being incinerated with other trash, in landfills, or worst of all in the ocean

Not enough is being done to Reduce, Reuse, Recycle, and Rethink.

Our future depends on it!

PATCO plans to change this. 

The average American uses 584 straws a year! 

Straws lightweight nature makes it almost impossible to recycle them

A small gust of wind can send them airborne into the Ocean

In the ocean, plastics are physically harmful and toxic to wildlife

Toxins accumulate and compound as they move to larger predators, and eventually are passed on to us

Over 250 million tons of plastic enters the Ocean every year

PATCO's plan to help fight single use plastics is multifaceted. 

The straw reduces your environmental footprint !

You'll never have to worry about leaving it at home!

Your beautiful bracelet makes it easy to spark a conversation about the importance of reusable products!

 

How Does It Work?

1. Simply unlock the metal lock.

2. Pull out the embedded straw

3. Enjoy your drink!

How do I clean it?

The PATCO straw is housed in the protective outer case that you wear in order to keep things sanitary. 

A cleaning spigot comes with the bracelet, which makes cleaning the inside a breeze!

 

Will one straw help?

There are millions of straws used in the US each day alone, but every PATCO bracelet can eliminate thousands of them. Oceans are not the only thing we should worry about, however. Deforestation is also a threatening factor to our planet. That is why for every bracelet purchased we will donate enough to plant a tree towards tree planting organizations!
