story:
Short Summary

Marley and Hugh are bringing you a collection of t-shirts and hoodies from the Marley's Wave Brand. The first ones will have the Marley's Wave logo or the Marley's Wave Peace design. We are also offering a laser etched skateboard deck.  ***Update*** view the update tab for garment sizes

 

What We Need & What You Get

We need two things: to find out if people like our first collection; and also to raise money to develop the fledgling business. To achieve this second goal we want to build an ecommerce  website that will share our brand with everyone in the world who has the internet, and if possible, find a way to help promote other small surf brands from around the world.

    

If you back us you will get your hands on some lovely organic cotton t-shirts, super soft hoodies, or our ultra cool bamboo and fibreglass skateboard decks. And, if we are funded we can go on and bring you more great designs.

    

The Impact

We want to be a balancing influence in a frantic world of attitude and hype. The English are pretty rubbish at expressing emotion, but this does not mean that we are not an emotional bunch. Marley's Wave is breaking the stereotype and putting it out there. We want to share our feelings on this and maybe, find ways for you to express similar sentiments.

We have spent the last 6 months finding suppliers of t-shirts and hoodies that meet our ethical, quality and style standards. We get all our t-shirts from one supplier and hoodies from another. Both of these suppliers have the highest ethical standards. We must be honest and say that we do not have the same supplier visibility in the skate deck company, but we are asking the necessary questions and working to find the best for you, using environmentally friendly bamboo as a starting block.

We have found some excellent local people to help us, the screen printing is being done in Gateshead and the laser etching in Blaydon.

We have had help from many lovely people on this project and we thank them all. 

Risks & Challenges

We have done what we can to minimize the risks and overcome the challenges before we launched. We know our suppliers and are confident we will do whatever it takes to make this happen.

As with all things, there may be exceptional circumstances that mean we are unable to get a particular colour or size for you by Christmas.  If this is the case we will let you know as soon as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

Firstly, and most importantly, be kind. Where we can bringing random acts of kindness into the world makes it a better place for us all.

Anything you can do to get the word out about the two crazy guys from Tynemouth in England who are starting Marley's Wave is really helpful and appreciated. Please follow us on twitter, Facebook and Instagram, and use the share buttons on Indiegogo too.
story_txt:
Short Summary
Marley and Hugh are bringing you a collection of t-shirts and hoodies from the Marley's Wave Brand. The first ones will have the Marley's Wave logo or the Marley's Wave Peace design. We are also offering a laser etched skateboard deck.  ***Update*** view the update tab for garment sizes
 
What We Need & What You Get

We need two things: to find out if people like our first collection; and also to raise money to develop the fledgling business. To achieve this second goal we want to build an ecommerce  website that will share our brand with everyone in the world who has the internet, and if possible, find a way to help promote other small surf brands from around the world.
    
If you back us you will get your hands on some lovely organic cotton t-shirts, super soft hoodies, or our ultra cool bamboo and fibreglass skateboard decks. And, if we are funded we can go on and bring you more great designs.
    
The Impact

We want to be a balancing influence in a frantic world of attitude and hype. The English are pretty rubbish at expressing emotion, but this does not mean that we are not an emotional bunch. Marley's Wave is breaking the stereotype and putting it out there. We want to share our feelings on this and maybe, find ways for you to express similar sentiments.
We have spent the last 6 months finding suppliers of t-shirts and hoodies that meet our ethical, quality and style standards. We get all our t-shirts from one supplier and hoodies from another. Both of these suppliers have the highest ethical standards. We must be honest and say that we do not have the same supplier visibility in the skate deck company, but we are asking the necessary questions and working to find the best for you, using environmentally friendly bamboo as a starting block.
We have found some excellent local people to help us, the screen printing is being done in Gateshead and the laser etching in Blaydon.
We have had help from many lovely people on this project and we thank them all. 

Risks & Challenges

We have done what we can to minimize the risks and overcome the challenges before we launched. We know our suppliers and are confident we will do whatever it takes to make this happen.
As with all things, there may be exceptional circumstances that mean we are unable to get a particular colour or size for you by Christmas.  If this is the case we will let you know as soon as we can.

Other Ways You Can Help

Firstly, and most importantly, be kind. Where we can bringing random acts of kindness into the world makes it a better place for us all.
Anything you can do to get the word out about the two crazy guys from Tynemouth in England who are starting Marley's Wave is really helpful and appreciated. Please follow us on twitter, Facebook and Instagram, and use the share buttons on Indiegogo too.

story:
Short Summary

As an avid reader, I'm always looking for something good to read. But if you're passionate about reading Black literature by American, Caribbean, and African authors like I am, then you know that great reads are not always easy to find. This is partially because of the lack of diversity in what's being published today. This is what prompted me to develop the Call Number subscription service which brings the latest Black literature to your door so that you won't have to go searching for great books--they'll come to you.

I am a professional librarian with vast experience selecting books for a library with a broad collection of materials about the Africana experience. As a result, I have a deep knowledge of Black literature and authors that I'm hoping to share with others who enjoy reading Black literature. Fun Fact: Many of our books are cataloged under PN 841, which is the call number for library books about Black literature.

With Call Number, I hope to promote diverse books, support Black literature, celebrate Black authors, and show an appreciation for libraries. I want to help subscribers build their own personal libraries and fill their bookshelves with great books.

What We Need & What You Get

To get Call Number off the ground, I'm hoping to raise $1750 which will help me cover the costs of a website and platform to manage the service, as well as allow me to print boxes and materials, and purchase books and curated items.

In order to do so, I've curated an exclusive box that will only be available to Indiegogo contributors. I'm excited to share with you a taste of what's to come with a monthly Call Number book subscription. Whether or not I reach the funding goal, anything given will still be used to launch Call Number. Every bit that you're able to contribute helps and I'm truly appreciative of your contribution to what I know is a one of kind book box!

The Founder's Limited Edition Box will include:

  • Clover by Dori Sanders
  • "You're a Peach" notecard by artist Lisa Congdon
  • Reproduction map print of Charleston Harbor, SC by Retro Printmaker
  • Four leaf clover antique silver tone charm
  • Maya Angelou Quotable Quotes mini quote card by Whimsicals Paperie
  • Library-themed bookplate sticker by Little Beane Boutique
  • Custom catalog card and spine label for organizing your personal library
  • Call Number branded sticker and bookmark

Risks & Challenges

My biggest challenge will be spreading the word about the Call Number book box and making it easy for avid readers of Black literature to find us and subscribe. I hope that people will not only see the value in promoting diverse books and well-written literature that happens to come from talented Black authors, but also feel compelled to invest in this unique subscription service.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help get the word out to anyone interested in literature! Like our Facebook page, follow us on Twitter and Instagram, share the Indiegogo campaign with family and friends, and sign up for our email list!

story:
At Dreamer & Co we operate under the belief that consuming goods in a globalized economy should be more than about ourselves. As consumers we can play a role in improving the lives of others through conscious consumption. Therefore, we have formulated a business that seeks to provide consumers with products produced responsibly, ethically and transparently.

 

How We Work

We partner with a group of women artisans who have been trained to create handmade paper bead jewelry. We collaborate with a local non-profit organization that originally trained these women in skill and in business. The artisans have been successful selling their jewelry in country to expats and locals. Our hope is to help expand their work by offering jewelry made with their paper beads to a wider market.

We purchase the beads from the artisans at an ethical price in order to ensure they are earning a fair wage. We create designs that we are confident will sell to our target market. The jewelry is then assembled in the U.S. with the hope that we will be able to eventually hire re-settled refugees and train them to assemble the jewelry (we are dreamers—and we strive to make our dreams reality!). 

 

 

We estimate our start up costs to be $10,000.  Your donation will help us fully launch Dreamer & Co and will help cover the cost of supplying our initial inventory of beads purchased from the women artisans, legal fees, travel costs, initial start up advertising, and other overhead expenses.  All of the money donated will be directly invested in our mission: partnering with women in the Horn of Africa through business, helping them realize their potential and feel empowered, dignified, and in turn, flourish in their daily lives.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but you can still be a big help by:

  • Sharing the link to this campaign on Facebook, Twitter, Email and Instagram
  • Inviting people to follow us on Facebook and Instagram

 

Both Baylee and Jessica had the opportunity to visit and work with a local non-profit in the Horn of Africa; Jessica visited in 2014 and Baylee visited in 2015. One of the NGO’s activities is a women’s project house, where they teach low-income women different skills, such as paper bead making, sewing, and baking. In addition, they teach them how to do manage their finances and run a small business. After Baylee’s visit in 2015 she saw how this house was a light in the darkness of poverty. There were smiles and laughter and faces of beautiful women who were proud of their work and had hope in their eyes.

After visiting, both Baylee and Jessica wanted to do more. While Baylee was beginning to dream of a way to sell the women’s necklaces in the U.S., Jessica and her husband were preparing to move to the Horn of Africa to work full-time. Baylee shared her dream of creating a bigger market for their jewelry as a way to provide the women with more income and opportunities for others to have to learn valuable skills and receive a living wage. Jessica was excited for this idea as it is something she looked forward to doing as well. Since then, they have been working to make this business a reality.

 

Sneak-peak of Dreamer & Co's Designs

story:
**Rotate your phone if viewing on mobile device**

As we prepare to Launch the release of the Third Installment from the ‘Design Create Inspire’ luxury line, our goal is to continue reconstructing and reimagining the boundaries of
modern elegance.

 

 






Collection III introduces the highly anticipated Zoma Weekender travel bag. Unlike any other luxury leather product, the Zoma Weekender embodies a distinguished authenticity rooted from its 100% Ethiopian leather material.

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

DCI’s path to Collection III has come with its victories & setbacks. Nonetheless, we stay true to our north star, we are successfully building a brand that resonates with our audience & funders.

 

 

Make a statement on the go! Whether its for everyday or a weekend getaway, the Zoma is the perfect bag for any occasion 

 

 

Now, whats so good about Ethiopian leather? The quality! Ethiopia is Africa's #1 leather producer. Ethiopia has been providing quality and perfection to the leather goods industry for many years. 

 

 

Meet the founder

 

 

The Impact  

We partnered with Wel Non-Profit to give back 5% of every sale.

 

 

 

With every purchase, 5% ($132 Ethiopian Birr) will be sent to Wel Non-Profit

 

 

Timeline

 

Follow us on Instagram!

 
 

 

Since 2015, D.C.I has proven to be more than just a Luxury Brand. And although our direct mission is scaled globally, the social impact we have on our community is just as important;
To Inspire the next wave of Innovative thinkers and change makers to push the
Boundaries of “Traditional”

 

 

 

 

Risks & Challenges

This will be our second crowdfunding campaign. We launched our first collection in 2017, which raised over $10,000. From production to fulfillment, our supply chain is set and ready to go.

Once our campaign is funded, the factory will begin crafting the leather from scratch.

story:
At Adornment Archive we create jewellery inspired by architecture. We teamed up with London based photographer Ellie Bungay to ‘Immortalise Welbeck Street Car Park’. As passionate architecture lovers it important to us that this beautifully clad brutalist building isn’t forgotten the moment it is torn down.

 Taking the shape of a Welbeck diamond we have experimented with scale and functionality of the shape, creating a range of necklaces and earrings from this single shape. The jewellery will be cast in sterling silver and hand polished. 

Our aim is to raise enough money to cover the tooling costs for our Welbeck diamond jewellery pieces so that we can make them a reality and to print Ellie's beautiful photographs. To create all of our moulds and print the photographs we need to raise a mere £1,500.00. 

All of the funds raised during the campaign will be spent within ethical, sustainable businesses. We have spent time carefully selecting a team of artisan jewellery makers who will carefully craft all of our jewellery pieces, and polish the pieces by hand. 

Investing in a piece from the collection will not only help preserve the memory of Welbeck Street Car Park and help it to live on. It will help us all move a step closer to creating sustainable businesses doing what we love which is designing jewellery and taking photographs!

All orders placed will be processes as one large order at the end of the 40 day campaign. We will send your items to you in time for Christmas.

story:
What are automatic watches?

Automatic watches are self-winding, which means that they are powered by kinetic energy from the wearer’s natural movement. Automatic movement enables the watches to function without a battery.

Why choose Flanko automatic watches?

Flanko automatic watches can last a lifetime with proper care. There are no batteries, so there’s no need to worry about battery acid leaking and corroding the watch. Flanko includes a skeleton back, which acts as a window to clearly see the intricate components. All of our watches are hand-assembled, with a high standard of craftsmanship.

At a time where mobile technology surrounds us, and everything is homogeneous, we bring the world a watch that goes back to the fundamentals by mastering the primary characteristics:

"Timeless design, reliable movement, and hand-assembled for a nice, finishing touch."

We have spent years developing the design and worked side-by-side with other watch enthusiasts, upholsterers, and local designers. With their combined expertise, we crafted a watch that captivates the hearts of many.

Here at Flanko, we put our minds together to create the timepieces that will withstand the test of time, and be cherished throughout the years.

Our design is simple. Timeless. Based out of Seattle, our local watch designers created this original timepiece. It’s challenging to reach true minimalism. We have expanded our efforts to obtain a timepiece that symbolizes the fundamentals of watchmaking.

Our watches’ purpose is to complement your style and complete your look. Without outshining your wardrobe, Flanko opens up your creative mind to express yourself freely.

Over the past year, we worked closely with our design team, master watchmakers, and watch enthusiasts to meticulously craft two authentic, hand-assembled watches.

Flanko is driven to reach perfection. We bring together the cohesion of automatic movement with the watch composition. 

After exploring multiple prototypes, we have finalized our design. Flanko is proud to present the accumulation of hard work and craftsmanship that was put into our timepiece.

 

Our collection is inspired by the irreplaceable beauty of our city, Seattle. If you listen closely, you can hear the busy street vendors presenting their crafts, or even catch the faint bellow of the foghorn from a ferry, drowning out the swash of the waves as they hug the bow. We wanted to harness that feeling in our watches, almost as if the wearer can hear the clinking of the tools being used when the watch was being made.

After years of searching, we have found the finest materials to construct our watches without the premium cost.

In our Prime Series, Flanko takes pride in using 316L stainless steel for the watch case. The watch glass is made from Sapphire glass, which one of the world’s strongest, most scratch-resistant glass used in the industry. The heart of the watch is powered by your movement; no need for battery replacement. Our Prime Series watch is held together with a 316L stainless butterfly clasp. Its genuine leather band leaves you with a smooth, finishing touch.

The Prime Series Navy Blue colorway.

The Prime Series White and Gold colorway.

 

Our Essential Series is also constructed in reliable 316L stainless steel. The watch face is protected in a double-domed mineral crystal glass. The Essential Series use Seiko NH35 automatic movement, to ensure dependability. It comes in an exclusive all-black colorway, for a more neutral look.

The Essential Series All Black colorway.​

The Essential Series Brown and White colorway.

The Essential Series Black and White colorway.

Our quality is guaranteed, we will include a 2-year warranty on manufacturing defects. 

Due to popular demand from our backers, we have decided to launch our first stretch goal! 

After weeks of planning, we bring you our newest and latest design. The All Black Prime Series. We wanted to add a slick colorway into our Guilloché dial.

 

 

 

 

 
 

 

 

In every package, there's a watch, a watch pillow, a cleaning cloth, and a warranty card enclosed in each of our signature red boxes.

We handle all of our packages with care.  Unfortunately, we cannot control how long it takes our watches to go through customs. However, we will ensure that your package will be delivered as soon as possible.

story:
Beauty at its Simplest

Minimalistic, yet complex, all of our bags are structured by a latex contour frame that helps reinforcing the shape of the bags. Our signature uni-body handle not only helps with resistance, but also highlights over the neutral base color with high-contrasting hues, resulting to a sleek, modern, and elegant design.

 

Have Two Faces—Just Don't Be Two-Faced

Our bags will never turn their back on you. Designed to be viewed from every angle, you can wear your bag and leave it on any side you want.

 

Functionality is Sexy

Borne from a necessity, our bags are consciously designed to have room for your daily essential items such as your phone, keys, wallet, coins, cables, and devices.

 

Say Hello To Cammie

 

Say Hello To Sunnie

 

Say Hello to Ellie

 

All of our plaques are bathed in real gold, giving it a colorful chromatic finish that will never fade.

 

Experience your bag fully inside out. Designed to have different textures to the touch, we use different fabrics for the exterior, interior, and pockets of the bag.

 

Liquid trickles off the waterproof exterior fabric and inoxidizable ironworks, it’s as easy as wiping and go.

 

All of our bags are made with Animal Cruelty Free: Vegan and PVC fabrics. Our textiles are made with high long lasting quality materials that can be recycled.

 

For Real People by Real People

All of our products are hand-crafted with love, care, and passion by our artisan Edwin and his wife Diana, they have worked in their art for over 30 years.

 

Not The Same Bags

Since our products aren´t massively produced by machines, we produce each bag with extreme care and detail the moment the order is placed, making every single bag we make unique and made just for you.

 

 

INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE EDITION

Only for our Indiegogo, we will offer 3 exclusive colors that will only be available during the campaign:

Canary Yellow I Acid Green I Thunder Blue

 

Shipping will be processed through DHL Express shipping (Delivery in 2-4 working days). SHIPPING IS FREE FOR ANY REWARD CHOICE.

Depending on your country...

You may be required to pay additional import fees, taxes, brokerage fees, handling fees and/or other duties specific to the destination Country in order to receive your order.

 

  • We don’t make fashion, nor follow traditional practices from the industry. We use local, animal cruelty free materials to make timeless, functional, and above all, conscious pieces to reduce the waste produced by seasonal collections.
  • Our products aren’t just handmade, but also, we don’t carry stock. All of our bags are made the moment the order is placed, making every single one of them uniquely made for you.
  • We want to offer high-quality designer bags that are exclusive and luxurious without the hefty price tag.
  • Helping us is helping new designers. Our goal is to make a design house that can aid and facilitate the launch of emerging designers that don’t count with all the knowledge, tools, and team to launch their brand and products.
  • We don’t make things out of whim. Every product we design is carefully developed with cautious detail, love, and care. Each bag is inspired by real people with real needs and problems which we take into account in the design process, thus bestowing their name in their honor.
  • This is teamwork, that counts our artisans and production team as well. It is very important for us to value the work of others and credit them fairly for their efforts and contribution.
  • We are young entrepreneurs that want to break the stigma of certain fields like design that are undervalued in Latin America by boosting opportunities in the local market.
  • All the funds we are able to make thanks to our backers will not only count for the production and shipping of products, but also for the development of the second collection that we plan to launch this year once we reach our goal​.
story_txt:
Beauty at its SimplestMinimalistic, yet complex, all of our bags are structured by a latex contour frame that helps reinforcing the shape of the bags. Our signature uni-body handle not only helps with resistance, but also highlights over the neutral base color with high-contrasting hues, resulting to a sleek, modern, and elegant design. Have Two Faces—Just Don't Be Two-FacedOur bags will never turn their back on you. Designed to be viewed from every angle, you can wear your bag and leave it on any side you want. Functionality is SexyBorne from a necessity, our bags are consciously designed to have room for your daily essential items such as your phone, keys, wallet, coins, cables, and devices. Say Hello To Cammie

 
Say Hello To Sunnie

 
Say Hello to Ellie

 

All of our plaques are bathed in real gold, giving it a colorful chromatic finish that will never fade. Experience your bag fully inside out. Designed to have different textures to the touch, we use different fabrics for the exterior, interior, and pockets of the bag. Liquid trickles off the waterproof exterior fabric and inoxidizable ironworks, it’s as easy as wiping and go. All of our bags are made with Animal Cruelty Free: Vegan and PVC fabrics. Our textiles are made with high long lasting quality materials that can be recycled. For Real People by Real PeopleAll of our products are hand-crafted with love, care, and passion by our artisan Edwin and his wife Diana, they have worked in their art for over 30 years. Not The Same BagsSince our products aren´t massively produced by machines, we produce each bag with extreme care and detail the moment the order is placed, making every single bag we make unique and made just for you.  INDIEGOGO EXCLUSIVE EDITIONOnly for our Indiegogo, we will offer 3 exclusive colors that will only be available during the campaign:Canary Yellow I Acid Green I Thunder Blue Shipping will be processed through DHL Express shipping (Delivery in 2-4 working days). SHIPPING IS FREE FOR ANY REWARD CHOICE.Depending on your country...You may be required to pay additional import fees, taxes, brokerage fees, handling fees and/or other duties specific to the destination Country in order to receive your order. 
We don’t make fashion, nor follow traditional practices from the industry. We use local, animal cruelty free materials to make timeless, functional, and above all, conscious pieces to reduce the waste produced by seasonal collections.
Our products aren’t just handmade, but also, we don’t carry stock. All of our bags are made the moment the order is placed, making every single one of them uniquely made for you.
We want to offer high-quality designer bags that are exclusive and luxurious without the hefty price tag.
Helping us is helping new designers. Our goal is to make a design house that can aid and facilitate the launch of emerging designers that don’t count with all the knowledge, tools, and team to launch their brand and products.
We don’t make things out of whim. Every product we design is carefully developed with cautious detail, love, and care. Each bag is inspired by real people with real needs and problems which we take into account in the design process, thus bestowing their name in their honor.
This is teamwork, that counts our artisans and production team as well. It is very important for us to value the work of others and credit them fairly for their efforts and contribution.
We are young entrepreneurs that want to break the stigma of certain fields like design that are undervalued in Latin America by boosting opportunities in the local market.

All the funds we are able to make thanks to our backers will not only count for the production and shipping of products, but also for the development of the second collection that we plan to launch this year once we reach our goal​.

story:
Modernity means travelling. Thousands of young people leave their cities for inspiration and opportunities. Taking a flight is no longer a special event, it’s like taking a bus. However, living on the go is not new. Nomadic tribes move in search of better conditions every season. They have honed their skills to live with no strings attached and beyond any borders.

ASHKA is investigating what modern travellers can learn from Central Asian nomads. We curate a collection of unique products that suit a dynamic and mindful lifestyle in big cities like London. We sell our products online and plan to go offline in the future.

Less is more

To be sold at ASHKA, the product has to meet three criteria: be simple, useful and inspired by tradition. These are the core principles of nomadic life. In other words, less is more.

Flexible curation

Effectively ASHKA is a marketplace with a flexible approach to source or co-create products with international designers, craftsmen and culture organisations, which allows us to build an authentic and stylistically consistent collection.

"High street and luxury brands are increasingly accused of cultural appropriation. For example, take Stella McCartney who was accused of using African prints. While we may generalise about nomads, ASHKA aims to tell a full story about each product we sell."

For this campaign, we have performed profound screening of Central Asian designers and handpicked items from Ayna Izbasar of Turkmenistan and Knockknock Studio of Kazakhstan. We have also collaborated with the graphic designer Matthew Tremaine, leather craftsmen Andrew Weller and social startup Kindness Collective based in London, Rochester and Oxford respectively.

Boosting ASHKA

By supporting this campaign, you will get designer products that you cannot find elsewhere and embark on a cultural nomadic journey.

We will use the proceeds to:

  • Develop our online shop
  • Grow stock and deliver fast in the UK and internationally
  • Participate in London weekend markets

Since ASHKA promotes a freedom-loving lifestyle that Central Asia still lacks, 10% of its profits will be donated to Arzuw Foundation helping young Turkmens finance their education abroad.

Passion + experience

The founder of ASHKA is Alex Ahn, who grew up in Ashgabat,  the capital of Turkmenistan. Talking painting classes and visiting artists' studios at an early age helped him develop a strong interest in traditional nomadic culture and modern design. Since he left Ashgabat 16 years ago, Alex has travelled to over 45 countries in search of inspiration and development.

"My ambition to introduce Central Asia to London using modern design and storytelling. While staying away from stereotypical perceptions of the region, I am seeking inspiration in the lifestyle of nomads spanning across time, ethnicity and ideology."

Based in London and working in corporate communications, Alex is translating his passion for design, travelling and Central Asia into ASHKA.

Help us launch ASHKA!

Explore the full gallery of products.

story:
A new era of Vresh Jeans starts now

 

Our first model was a top-seller and so it's up to you to be part of the next super awesome crowdfunding project of Vresh.

We have developed the product for months together with our community and our design team. So we are proud to introduce our new model - they are cozy, built to last and handmade in Europe. But what is more - we have improved the cut, sourced even better fabrics and added new sizes.

Please help us and support this project. Once you´ve worn a Vresh Jeans you'll never want to wear something else. Promised. 

your advantages summarized:

  • cozy and durable fabrics
  • improved our nice cuttings
  • added new sizes: 28 and 31
  • top price-performance ratio
  • Vresh is a real brand with real people behind
  • every pair is handmade in Europe (near Guimaraes in Portugal)
 
 

Product - Vresh Jeans 2.0 in detail

VRESH JEANS 2.0

 

So why the crowdfunding campaign? Because after the success of our original jeans, we’ve collected feedback from the community and consulted with designers & production partners to create an even better product. VRESH JEANS 2.0 will introduce new colours, fabrics, sizes and features; all based on product research and experience. In short, they’ll be difficult not to love. With our first crowdfunding campaign that raised nearly € 18,000, we sold over 500 pairs of our original jeans- we must be doing something right. The new model will see an improved cut, new sizes that include 28-31 and, in addition to our popular Denim Blue, new colours that include Light Washed, Mid Washed and Shadow Black. If the campaign reaches more than € 30,000, two more colours will be introduced. Each pair of jeans is handmade in Europe and created with a top price-performance ratio in mind. They are cosy and durable, made only with the best fabrics sourced in Portugal by our team.

 Did you forget your belt? No problem, our jeans come with a built-in belt to maximize comfort and minimize sagging. If you remove it, the holes are hidden and sewed together. Your jeans, your style – the choice is up to you!

·         Sizes ranging from 28 - 34

·         Built-in belt (Don’t want this? We can easily remove it without any trace left behind)

·         Double stitching on the legs (More wear, less tear)

·         Metal rivets for enhanced durability

·         Subtle logo embroidery on the back pockets

·         Made with elastane for extra comfort

 

 

Our range of sizes has grown so you can now choose between 28, 30, 31, 32 and 34. To guarantee a perfect fit, we’ve developed two different cuts:

 

SLIM FIT

If you liked the "Krew K-Slim", this will be your favorite fit (TIP: go for a smaller size if you are into the “K-Skinny”). It’s the best choice for fans of the slim-fit look and this time we’ve made the cut even tighter (just a little).


 

REGULAR FIT

If you liked the "Levis 501", this is the style for you. Our Regular Fit looks great on almost everyone and is really comfortable, even for long days at the office. This cut has been so perfect that we aren’t changing a thing.

 

CALCULATION

Cutting off the middlemen is a huge topic nowadays, but we go for more. Not only we should profit from our products, but everyone involved: The manufacturers are paid fair wages, the retailers get their stuff directly from us, our customers can expect the highest quality for a fair price and the environment benefits through durability and sustainable production. Since 2012, we are producing T-Shirts, Hoodies, Beanies and some other cool stuff.

 

 

Value

We’re committed to being involved in every step of the production process, from choosing the perfect fabric to putting the finished product into the customer’s hands. We make sure that manufacturers are paid fair wages, that production is environment-friendly, and that our high-quality products are sold at fair prices. Since 2012, we have been making jeans, hoodies, beanies and other cool products . We encourage retailers to order stock directly from us so that we can maintain a close relationship with our consumers.

Thank you for supporting our crowdfunding campaign. You can now put an end to your search for the perfect jeans by ordering a VRESH pair from us, or you can help us reach our goal by sharing it on Facebook and Instagram.

Yours in responsible fashion,

Michi & Klaus

story:
WHAT IS SNIFFER GPS?

Sniffer GPS is the only dog collar you will ever need in one, sweet package.

BEST-IN-CLASS GPS TRACKING

GPS Tracking sees your dog anywhere they go, and tells you exactly how to find them.

Sniffer navigates you to your pet with google maps, see the app in action!

VIRTUAL DOG FENCE

Set Virtual, GPS Protected Dog Fences wherever you go!

 

A high frequency training tone activates near the edge of your safe zone, training dogs not to stray off.

 

UNMATCHED 30-DAY BATTERY LIFE

We put flexible solar panels right on the collar, that’s right. With power saving techniques and solar power, Sniffer keeps going for up to 30 days without charging.

HIGH VISIBILITY LEDs

For the best nighttime visibility, we decked out our collar with bright LEDs in 32,000 adjustable colors.

Perfect for a hike!

STEADY

RAINBOW

FLASHING

DUAL COLOR

AI SMART HEALTH

Keep track of your dog’s health with our built in activity monitor.

 

Activity monitoring includes: Health alerts, flea and tick reminders, Calorie tracking, sleep, walk, and play time, steps, goals, and any dog related appointments.

 

EMERGENCY MODE

Due to our amazing flexible solar panels, if the battery dies, the collar doesn’t! Solar panels keep the collar working wherever there is light.

WATER PROOF

We know dogs like to get dirty, so we made our Sniffer collar to keep up. It's waterproof in up to three feet for 30 minutes, so go for a swim.

Dirty? Throw it right in the washer to clean it up.

CHARGE ANYWHERE

GPS doesn’t help when the collar is on the table charging, so why take it off? With our easy snap on charger, the collar charges on the go so you don’t have to stop.

FAST, RELIABLE GPS UPDATES

Some collars take 15 minutes to show your dog has run off; that’s 2 miles or running! We update every 30 seconds for fast, reliable information.

Receive an Alert whenever your dog escapes the safezone on the device most convenient to you, whether it’s your phone, email, or even your Alexa device.

EXTENSIVE NETWORK COVERAGE

Sniffer connects to nearly every major cell provider to maximize coverage. It even connects to WiFi and bluetooth!

VIRTUAL LEASH

Our high pitch training tone works with bluetooth or wifi to create a virtual leash for your walks and other outdoor activities!

DURABLE COLLAR, DETACHABLE DEVICE

Our collar is built tough, but also for comfort.

The wider collar takes pulling and tugging better than most, so you’ll never need two collars.

If you love your current collar’s style, Sniffer’s device is easily removable and will fit most any collar!

EASILY ADJUSTABLE

With our simple Tri-glide, the collar easily adjusts to fit any dog in the collar’s size range. And with our buckle clasp, the collar can be easily removed at any time.

CLASSY, CUSTOMIZABLE COLOR OPTIONS

Sniffer GPS comes in a variety of colors, including a community chosen Indiegogo color! A survey asking what color you want your device and collar to be, will be sent out at the end of the campaign.

TECH SPECS

MEET THE TEAM

Aaron Naidu (Chief Technology Officer), Reid Kersey (Founder + CEO), & Austin Bush (Lead Mechanical Engineer)

 

Our journey with GPS dog collars started twenty years ago when our founder, Reid Kersey, had Blue, a puppy who just loved to get out. Blue was more than just a pet — she was Reid’s therapy dog after his father passed away. And every time she got out … well, you can imagine.

Fast forward ten years and Reid was a student at Georgia Tech working part time. His boss had a GPS tracker for his dog — but it spent all of its time on the charger because the battery didn’t last longer than a day. Every time the dog got out, the GPS was useless because it was too time-consuming to take the collar on and off daily for charging.

Knowing there was a better way to track pups, Reid took his idea to his business program at Georgia Tech and got to work designing, developing, and researching the idea with Aaron Naidu. At the end of the semester, the duo walked away with a working prototype, and Sniffer was born. Along the way, Austin Bush joined the team, becoming a full-time partner and founder, as well as the lead mechanical engineer for the company handling product design and manufacturing.

The American Humane Association estimates that 10 million dogs and cats are lost or stolen in the U.S. every year — and 700,000 of them never make it home. That’s because on average a dog can run 15-20 miles per hour, which mean your pup could be miles away in a very short amount of time. There are a lot of tracking products on the market, but none come close to the functionality, health monitoring, and battery life that Sniffer offers.

We’re dog lovers but more importantly, we’re dog parents. And we take that role very seriously. That’s why we built Sniffer, because we sleep better at night knowing that we’ll never lose track of our family, and we know it’ll help you sleep better at night too. So here’s to a safer future, where there’s no such thing as lost dogs.

 

 

TIMELINE

BONUS PERKS!!! T-SHIRTS

CLICK YOUR FAVORITE

Colors and sizes can be chosen in post-order survey

3 COMMON MYTHS

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

 

About the Device

How is Sniffer GPS different from a microchip? 

A microchip is like a dog tag, someone has to find your dog, take it to the vet or a shelter, and scan for the chip in order for it to work. This can take multiple days, and even then, complications with the chip can occur. Sniffer GPS tracks your dog’s location in real time, and alerts you immediately if your dog runs off, so you can find your dog in a matter of minutes.

Is it waterproof? 

Yes, Sniffer is IP67 rated, which means Sniffer GPS can be submerged in up to 1 meter of water (3.3 ft) for 30 minutes without damage. Feel free to let your dog jump in the water and go for a swim.

Can I use Sniffer GPS with more than one pet?  

Yes, each dog has their own profile within the Sniffer GPS app, and the app can track all your pets simultaneously. There is no limit to how many pets you can add under your account.

Does Sniffer GPS attach to my cell phone plan? 

No. No need to worry about adjusting your current cell phone plan. Sniffer GPS uses its own network that we provide.

What is the warranty? 

We offer a 1 year warranty on the device and accessories, as well as a 30 day money back guarantee.

Can I choose a different color for the device and the collar? 

Yes. After the indiegogo campaign, you will receive a post-order survey in which you can choose among the different color options for your order.

Is my data secure? 

Yes, all data is transmitted and stored fully encrypted. We utilize TLS to encrypt any data in transit, and all data is stored heavily encrypted on our secure servers, located on the AWS Cloud.

Light up Collar

Can I change the color of the collar’s light? 

Yes. The collar’s light can display colors everything in the rainbow and can be chosen in the Sniffer GPS app. You can even tell it to flash one particular color or rotate through all the different colors!

Is the collar washable? 

Yes. Simply remove the device from the collar and throw it in the washing machine, solar panels and all.

Do I have to use the included collar? 

No, the device can attach to most collars up to 1.5in wide. However, since the included collar has the embedded solar panels for charging and the integrated high vis light, you would be giving up those features.

Can I use Sniffer GPS on a harness? 

Sniffer GPS will fit most harnesses and collars, however, because we can not guarantee a fit for everything, Sniffer GPS has a 30 day return window if it doesn’t fit your dog’s favorite harness or collar.

Location Updates

How accurate is the GPS? 

Sniffer GPS is accurate within 3 feet. It also averages multiple locations together before updating you to prevent false alarms.

Can I see my dog’s location history? 

Yes, your dog’s location history is stored for one month, and you can view wherever your dog has wandered on the Sniffer GPS app. You can use this data to make sure your dog is actually getting walked by the dog walker, see all the places that your dog has traveled, or just see where they go when they wander.

Subscription

What does the subscription cost? 

The first year of service is free for all of our backers. After that, it is only $5 per month, with no commitment.

Why is a subscription plan required? 

Our device uses cellular service to communicate with your phone, updating you as to where your dog is located. Unfortunately, this cell service comes at a cost, and so a subscription plan is necessary.

Does Sniffer GPS attach to my cell phone plan? 

No. You don’t need to worry about adjusting your current cell phone plan. Sniffer GPS uses its own network which works out-of-the-box with the device.

Can I attach Sniffer GPS to my already existing phone plan? 

No. Sniffer GPS uses a unique service plan of its own so that it can protect in a wide variety of places. As such, this plan must stay apart from any personal phone account.

Does Sniffer GPS​ work in my country? 

Yes. Sniffer GPS operates with dual mode LTE M1 and NB1 with a 2G(GSM/GPRS) fall back. This is a world certified mobile network device that really can operate almost anywhere in the world.

Will Sniffer GPS work if I am outside cellular service? 

The device’s GPS capabilities are always working, but if your phone is in an area with no cell service or WiFi connectivity, your phone will not receive updates from the device. The same is true if your dog is in an area with no cell service or WiFi coverage. However, multiple phones can receive the same dog’s location updates and while you might not be receiving updates in Antarctica, someone back home with the app can still know your dog is safe.

Shipping and Handling

What is the cost of shipping? 

We offer free shipping to the United States. Shipping to other countries will cost a nominal fee that is displayed at the payment section.

Do you ship internationally? What are the fees? 

Yes. Since Sniffer GPS can work in over 194 countries, it is available to ship anywhere in the world. When you back our campaign, simply select your country and the corresponding shipping price will be listed.

What is your return policy? 

Our mission is for you and your pet to make the most out of every moment you share together. So it’s our hope that you are entirely satisfied with Sniffer GPS and its functionality. If for any reason you are not satisfied, we accept returns for a full refund (less shipping both ways) within 30 days of receipt, for unused products in their original packaging.

Can I send a device as a gift? 

Yes. Send us a message at contact@sniffergps.com with your name and order number and we will specially gift wrap your order before sending it out.

Money back guarantee: What if the campaign goal is not met? 

If the Campaign Goal is not met, everyone who purchased a Sniffer Collar will receive a full refund. Everyone who purchased a shirt, will still receive their shirt.

Have other questions or any suggestions?

Email us at contact@sniffergps.com

With our easy snap on charger, the collar charges on the go so you don’t have to stop.FAST, RELIABLE GPS UPDATESSome collars take 15 minutes to show your dog has run off; that’s 2 miles or running! We update every 30 seconds for fast, reliable information.Receive an Alert whenever your dog escapes the safezone on the device most convenient to you, whether it’s your phone, email, or even your Alexa device.EXTENSIVE NETWORK COVERAGESniffer connects to nearly every major cell provider to maximize coverage. It even connects to WiFi and bluetooth!VIRTUAL LEASHOur high pitch training tone works with bluetooth or wifi to create a virtual leash for your walks and other outdoor activities!DURABLE COLLAR, DETACHABLE DEVICEOur collar is built tough, but also for comfort.The wider collar takes pulling and tugging better than most, so you’ll never need two collars.If you love your current collar’s style, Sniffer’s device is easily removable and will fit most any collar!EASILY ADJUSTABLEWith our simple Tri-glide, the collar easily adjusts to fit any dog in the collar’s size range. And with our buckle clasp, the collar can be easily removed at any time.CLASSY, CUSTOMIZABLE COLOR OPTIONSSniffer GPS comes in a variety of colors, including a community chosen Indiegogo color! A survey asking what color you want your device and collar to be, will be sent out at the end of the campaign. TECH SPECSMEET THE TEAMAaron Naidu (Chief Technology Officer), Reid Kersey (Founder + CEO), & Austin Bush (Lead Mechanical Engineer) Our journey with GPS dog collars started twenty years ago when our founder, Reid Kersey, had Blue, a puppy who just loved to get out. Blue was more than just a pet — she was Reid’s therapy dog after his father passed away. And every time she got out … well, you can imagine.Fast forward ten years and Reid was a student at Georgia Tech working part time. His boss had a GPS tracker for his dog — but it spent all of its time on the charger because the battery didn’t last longer than a day. Every time the dog got out, the GPS was useless because it was too time-consuming to take the collar on and off daily for charging.Knowing there was a better way to track pups, Reid took his idea to his business program at Georgia Tech and got to work designing, developing, and researching the idea with Aaron Naidu. At the end of the semester, the duo walked away with a working prototype, and Sniffer was born. Along the way, Austin Bush joined the team, becoming a full-time partner and founder, as well as the lead mechanical engineer for the company handling product design and manufacturing.The American Humane Association estimates that 10 million dogs and cats are lost or stolen in the U.S. every year — and 700,000 of them never make it home. That’s because on average a dog can run 15-20 miles per hour, which mean your pup could be miles away in a very short amount of time. There are a lot of tracking products on the market, but none come close to the functionality, health monitoring, and battery life that Sniffer offers.We’re dog lovers but more importantly, we’re dog parents. And we take that role very seriously. That’s why we built Sniffer, because we sleep better at night knowing that we’ll never lose track of our family, and we know it’ll help you sleep better at night too. So here’s to a safer future, where there’s no such thing as lost dogs.  TIMELINE BONUS PERKS!!! T-SHIRTSCLICK YOUR FAVORITEColors and sizes can be chosen in post-order survey





3 COMMON MYTHSFREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS About the Device How is Sniffer GPS different from a microchip?   A microchip is like a dog tag, someone has to find your dog, take it to the vet or a shelter, and scan for the chip in order for it to work. This can take multiple days, and even then, complications with the chip can occur. Sniffer GPS tracks your dog’s location in real time, and alerts you immediately if your dog runs off, so you can find your dog in a matter of minutes. Is it waterproof?   Yes, Sniffer is IP67 rated, which means Sniffer GPS can be submerged in up to 1 meter of water (3.3 ft) for 30 minutes without damage. Feel free to let your dog jump in the water and go for a swim. Can I use Sniffer GPS with more than one pet?    Yes, each dog has their own profile within the Sniffer GPS app, and the app can track all your pets simultaneously. There is no limit to how many pets you can add under your account. Does Sniffer GPS attach to my cell phone plan?   No. No need to worry about adjusting your current cell phone plan. Sniffer GPS uses its own network that we provide. What is the warranty?   We offer a 1 year warranty on the device and accessories, as well as a 30 day money back guarantee. Can I choose a different color for the device and the collar?   Yes. After the indiegogo campaign, you will receive a post-order survey in which you can choose among the different color options for your order. Is my data secure?   Yes, all data is transmitted and stored fully encrypted. We utilize TLS to encrypt any data in transit, and all data is stored heavily encrypted on our secure servers, located on the AWS Cloud.Light up Collar Can I change the color of the collar’s light?   Yes. The collar’s light can display colors everything in the rainbow and can be chosen in the Sniffer GPS app. You can even tell it to flash one particular color or rotate through all the different colors! Is the collar washable?   Yes. Simply remove the device from the collar and throw it in the washing machine, solar panels and all. Do I have to use the included collar?   No, the device can attach to most collars up to 1.5in wide. However, since the included collar has the embedded solar panels for charging and the integrated high vis light, you would be giving up those features. Can I use Sniffer GPS on a harness?   Sniffer GPS will fit most harnesses and collars, however, because we can not guarantee a fit for everything, Sniffer GPS has a 30 day return window if it doesn’t fit your dog’s favorite harness or collar.Location Updates How accurate is the GPS?   Sniffer GPS is accurate within 3 feet. It also averages multiple locations together before updating you to prevent false alarms. Can I see my dog’s location history?   Yes, your dog’s location history is stored for one month, and you can view wherever your dog has wandered on the Sniffer GPS app. You can use this data to make sure your dog is actually getting walked by the dog walker, see all the places that your dog has traveled, or just see where they go when they wander.Subscription What does the subscription cost?   The first year of service is free for all of our backers. After that, it is only $5 per month, with no commitment. Why is a subscription plan required?   Our device uses cellular service to communicate with your phone, updating you as to where your dog is located. Unfortunately, this cell service comes at a cost, and so a subscription plan is necessary. Does Sniffer GPS attach to my cell phone plan?   No. You don’t need to worry about adjusting your current cell phone plan. Sniffer GPS uses its own network which works out-of-the-box with the device. Can I attach Sniffer GPS to my already existing phone plan?   No. Sniffer GPS uses a unique service plan of its own so that it can protect in a wide variety of places. As such, this plan must stay apart from any personal phone account. Does Sniffer GPS​ work in my country?   Yes. Sniffer GPS operates with dual mode LTE M1 and NB1 with a 2G(GSM/GPRS) fall back. This is a world certified mobile network device that really can operate almost anywhere in the world. Will Sniffer GPS work if I am outside cellular service?   The device’s GPS capabilities are always working, but if your phone is in an area with no cell service or WiFi connectivity, your phone will not receive updates from the device. The same is true if your dog is in an area with no cell service or WiFi coverage. However, multiple phones can receive the same dog’s location updates and while you might not be receiving updates in Antarctica, someone back home with the app can still know your dog is safe.Shipping and Handling What is the cost of shipping?   We offer free shipping to the United States. Shipping to other countries will cost a nominal fee that is displayed at the payment section. Do you ship internationally? What are the fees?   Yes. Since Sniffer GPS can work in over 194 countries, it is available to ship anywhere in the world. When you back our campaign, simply select your country and the corresponding shipping price will be listed. What is your return policy?   Our mission is for you and your pet to make the most out of every moment you share together. So it’s our hope that you are entirely satisfied with Sniffer GPS and its functionality. If for any reason you are not satisfied, we accept returns for a full refund (less shipping both ways) within 30 days of receipt, for unused products in their original packaging. Can I send a device as a gift?   Yes. Send us a message at contact@sniffergps.com with your name and order number and we will specially gift wrap your order before sending it out. Money back guarantee: What if the campaign goal is not met?   If the Campaign Goal is not met, everyone who purchased a Sniffer Collar will receive a full refund. Everyone who purchased a shirt, will still receive their shirt.Have other questions or any suggestions?Email us at contact@sniffergps.com

story:
After our very successful Calendar Watch crowdfunding campaign, we are back to introduce the world's most customizable watch: Quotes Watch. A watch that shows you content that means something to you and gives you inspiration wherever you are. 


 

With its cutting edge dot-matrix epaper display, the Quotes Watch is able to display any kind of text, character or symbol found in Unicode typefaces according to your preferences. It's simple:

Write Your Own: Display whatever you want on the watch. As long as you stay under 140 characters anything is possible. Your favorite quote, a reminder, an emoji, design patters or even a shopping list - it's completely up to you. 

Receive personal messages: Selected loved ones can send you messages directly to your watch through the Quotes app.

Display quotes: You can select to display quotes from the quotes database connected to the app. 

 

As we wanted to give you a watch worthy enough of displaying meaningful content, we invested more than 6 months into finding the perfect design for this unique timepiece. 

We couldn't be more happy with the result: minimalistic design combined with clean lines and some modern elements, give what inspires you a truly worthy frame, without distracting from the content.

 

The Quotes Watch will be available in 5 different colors. You will be able to choose your favorite color at the end of the campaign.

 

To make your Quotes Watch even more customizable, we have also prepared accessory straps in fun color variations. Add € 12 to your pledge to receive an additional strap of your choice. This way you will have two styles with one just watch. 

The watch comes with a magnetic 2 pin USB charging cable. The charging pins are located on the back of the watch. Through the magnetic alignment of the charging cable with the pins, charging is no hassle at all. However, for even more convenience we offer an optional charging-dock to make charging even easier - all you need to do is lay the watch on top of the charging plate. Find this accessory in the reward options. 

The content you can display on the Quotes Watch is extremely flexible thanks to the use of Unicode fonts. With Unicode, you will be able to display virtually anything. From any language characters to hieroglyphics, or even math equations: the world is your oyster. Here are some examples:

 

What? is revolutionizing the watch industry one watch at a time by making watches that are unique in design and functionality for people that want to stand out. We build high quality watches that use just the right amount of technology to set us apart from both smartwatch and classic watch brands.  

SCANDINAVIAN DESIGN & SWISS ENGINEERING 
Our watches are created according to Scandinavian design principles: Functionality, simplicity and clean lines, and when it comes to watch-making, Swiss engineering is best in class. That‘s why it’s at the core of everything we do.  

WE ARE A TRULY INTERNATIONAL TEAM 
It all started in Brooklyn, NY. This is where our founder Igor Basargin joined up with Masashi Kawamura, a renowned Japanese Creative Director, to come up with the concepts of our watches. After successfully launching, we are now operating worldwide, with offices in New York, Switzerland, Vienna and Hong Kong. Our team is made up of multiple Nationalities.   

Risks and challenges 
We have an experienced team, plus we successfully launched Calendar Watch in 2016, which has been well-received and has much of the same materials and technologies; genuine leather, high-grade stainless steel, low energy Bluetooth and an E-paper display.

In addition, we have developed over time a great support network, so that where our team is less experienced, we can still deliver great products.

Demand Forecasting Risk

We’ve done our very best to forecast demand and create a solid production plan according to our previous experience. We are also going to be updating the plan in accordance with the Kickstarter success and demand.

Supply Chain Risk

We’re working with a very capable team, who successfully delivered the previous Calendar Watch project to market. Nevertheless, component delays and unexpected shortages are possible. If this happens, we’ll be sure to keep you informed and work to quickly solve the problem.

Communication is key for us - just take a look at our previous Kickstarter campaigns and you will see that this was one of the aspects our backers liked the most about us!

Thank you in advance for your support!

story:
A Powered Shirt!? 

We're BLANC - we’re passionate about designing problem solving products that are comfortable and useful to allow more exploring than ever before. The company is named after Mont Blanc - the highest peak in western Europe.

Mount Blanc is a symbol of exploration which is home to hiking, skiing, paragliding, mountain biking, ice climbing, travel and on and on - to us Blanc is just that.

Introducing The World’s Warmest Shirt - The Flare 

What Is The World’s Warmest Shirt?

Oh boy, we were hoping you’d ask. We’ve set out to design the warmest shirt on the planet! One major challenge is how to keep warm but also to not overheat or sweat. Most of us layer up to keep warm, but then end up getting too hot. When resting or starting an activity, you’re cold, but when active, you can overheat. We thought, what if there was smart clothing that adapted to the body’s needs?

Here is the shirt that warms you when you need the heat, and doesn't overheat you! It warms you like multiple layers, but is lightweight and can be temperature adjusted to fit your needs. After many prototypes, design changes, manufacturer evaluations, performance tests, focus groups, and late nights...we’re thrilled to share the shirt that will keep you feeling just right no matter where you are headed!

Blanc In The News

 

Our Story

Greg & Chris here - We're two brothers that were raised high up in the Rocky Mountains and have become quite familiar with the feeling of being cold all too well. Greg wanted to figure out a way to help people stave off the cold & as an engineer Greg started working on a technical shirt & built tons of prototypes. He started nailing down a really cool product. 

Greg brings the engineering and product design expertise to the table, while Chris brings experience in successfully launching products on crowdfunding platforms. Chris has launched two successful and Kickstarter and Indiegogo products and has a lot of experience from the top-down to get a campaign prepared and to get the rewards into your hands.

With your help we can meet the production minimums and bring this product to life!

Wait, why is this so warm and how does it keep me so warm?

It’s equal parts dapper and technical. The feel and look of the shirt was designed to be wearable not just under your top jacket but on it's own too! It has low profile features that sneak in technology without screaming tech geek. 

Let’s start with the technical aspects of the shirt that make it so unique.

We’ve integrated a patented & lightweight battery powered carbon fiber heating technology throughout the shirt to keep your body warm for when and where you need it most. These heating elements use a carbon fiber technology that quickly heats up and efficiently draws minimal power. The carbon fibers are also non corrosive for a long lasting build that has been time tested so the shirt is durable + can be fully washed.

Carbon fibers are the most durable & flexible heating fibers that can be packed tightly into tight travel bags.

The shirt's power button is on the lower side, out of the way to avoid getting bumped and where it can be easily seen or felt to turn on.

How does it feel? 


How does it work?

Three Warmth Settings

From lounging, traveling, or playing outside in nippy temperatures there’s a warmth setting that will fit just right. Keep your body warm in vital locations on your body at the right temperature with the touch of a button.

There are three different warmth modes that can be used as a thermostat to cycle through the temperature that fits your needs. 

Low Warmth Setting

Set the colored LED button to white and get hours of long lasting/steady warmth. Perfect for when you need a little extra warmth in a drafty movie theater, on an airplane, or at work.

Medium Warmth Setting

Click the colored LED button to advance to orange for the next warmth setting for an extra warmth boost. This setting is great for getting out the door on those early mornings with that crisp autumn air, at those chilly sporting events that go into double overtime, when you warm up for a run.

High Warmth Setting

Oh Baby, it’s cold outside. The third heat setting is for when you really need furnace-like heat to curb the cold. This is what our ancestors dreamed about. Stay merry while on that family trip chopping down that perfect Christmas tree in the middle of the forest. Wear it under your jacket to keep toasty while on the ski slopes.


The Included Power Bank

The shirt comes with a strong 5000mAh power bank that packs a punch with a run time powering the shirt of up to 5 hours.

The battery pack is lightweight and is about the size of an iPhone 6. The battery stores in the side pocket with room to spare. You won't feel the battery tugging the shirt down.

Using the standard USB connection you can also use larger power bank to power the shirt by placing it in the shirt pocket, in your pocket, or in a pack using the extra long USB cable.   


The power bank can also be used to charge your devices when not heating the shirt - perfect for when a device like your phone needs a boost.    

The power bank has a digital power level display for accurate power checking.

 

 
Sizing (unisex)

The shirt is available in sizes small, medium, large, and extra large. The shirt is stretchy and designed to fit both men and women.

The sizes below are for both men and women. Just make sure you know your dimensions.

Fit Type: Regular, will fit a little snug to your body to transfer the heat more efficiently. 

Easy To Wash

The entire shirt is washable! (yes...the circuits can handle it!) We have extensively tested the shirt in harsh conditions and through many cycles to verify long term use. Just remove the battery pack and throw your shirt in the wash for your next event or trip. It is best to air dry to keep the shirt lasting as long as possible.


Shirt Detailed Specs

We used premium materials from the fabric. The heating elements, circuitry, zippers, and even tags are top notch. 

The shirt material is a lightweight quick dry polyester on the outside with a super soft quick dry fabric on the inside to wick moisture away keeping you warm and dry.

Outer Layer Shirt Materials 

Polyester 90%
Spandex 10% Blend 

Inner Layer Shirt Materials

Soft Dry Wick Polyester Blend 

When will it all ship?

March, 2019




This timeline has been created by factoring the absolute longest time estimations for each stage. We are going to work to try and stay on the earlier side of the estimations to get these shirts into your hands but we are trying to be as realistic as possible :D

Warranty

All of the features were optimized and tested to ensure use and high quality for a shirt that will keep surprising you with it's versatility. If for any reason there is a manufacturer defect, we will replace the shirt within 1 year of your receiving of it. The warranty applies to both the shirt and the battery pack. 

Return Policy

We only used premium products and offer a 1 year warranty. We will repair or replace any shirts and battery packs that would have manufacturer defects or don’t hold up under normal use. We do not offer refunds on shirts that were received as an Indiegogo reward.

We’re passionate about creating amazing products and Indiegogo is a way for us to launch our brand. As you've read, Indiegogo isn't a store and rewards are a thanks for supporting the project which is why we cannot offer refunds or returns. Your pledge means so much and we take it very seriously. We will do anything we can to make sure that this exchange leaves with good vibes for everyone involved. 

BLANC Team

How to back this campaign: 
1. Click "Back This Project"2. Pick your reward level3. Sizing information will be collected in a survey prior to bulk orderWant to add more shirts to your reward? story:
From everyday, to on the road.  The Smart-Pack is thoughtfully designed to streamline your life. 

 

Fast Qi wireless charging, right on your shoulder strap.  The future of convenience. 

 

Opens and packs like a mini luggage, and keeps shirts, pants, socks, and more folded neatly for up to one week trip. 

 

 

Your presto cards, Airpods, & credit cards all within reach. RFID protected.

 

Padded shockproof laptop & tablet sleeve, slots for your notes, pens, cables and more. 

 

Keeps the dirt, moisture, and odors from your shoes completely separate from your clothing. 

 

Keep your valuables bone dry and safe from water damage.  The Smart-Pack features high quality zippers, with seal tech capability. This keeps out dirt, dust, and moisture from seeping inside. 

 

 Dozens of hidden pockets, TSA approved lock, pick-pocket proof zippers & more keep you safe and secure anywhere you go. 

 

 

The exterior of the Smart-Pack is super durable, and completely resistant the harsh elements of mother nature. 

 

Gorgeous leather straps snap into place VIA strong magnets. 

Padded backside is thoughtfully designed for a super comfort fit.  It also promotes a better overall posture. 

 

 

Water Repel-ant Fine Weave Canvas : The exterior of the Smart-Pack is constructed with a lightweight fine weave water-resistant nylon.

Aluminum Metal Zippers: All exterior zippers are extremely durable and stylish aluminum metal.

Oak Leather Accents: The bag's straps, glasses holder, logo, and trimmings throughout, are all  hand-crafted, world class oak leather, giving it a luxury meets tech look.                                    

Hand-Stitched Finish: Detailed stitching throughout the smart-pack shows the complex detailed workmanship. We spared NO expenses.

 

 

Our Lead Designer

Andre Kim came on board to help not only make the smart-pack incredibly useful and innovative, but also kept the classic mountaineering design made popular in the late 50's.

story:
When designing our wallet we wanted to make sure it was super slim while having enough space for plenty of cards and cash. We wanted  our wallet to be easily accessible. A lot of the slim wallets we see on the market just jam a bunch of cards into one pocket, while that may make the wallet slim, you have to take all the cards out every time you want to use one, it's not very convenient or accessible. Last but not least, all pockets are stitched with RFID blocking material to protect you from theft. We believe we have created the perfect wallet that takes the best aspects of different wallets and puts it into one. Introducing the Ideka wallet!

LEATHER

We made certain to use high quality leathers while maintaining an affordable price, Nappa and Saffiano leather will age incredibly well and last you a lifetime.

Top Wallet: Nappa Bottom: Saffiano

Left side: Nappa leather Right side: Saffiano leather

GALLERY 

Optimal amount of cards & cash.

Pouch at the top has a lot of space for more cards if needed.

Specifications

  • Material: Nappa & Saffiano leather
  • Weight: 0.8 Ounce
  • Measurments: ~10.4x7.7 Centimeters
  • RFID blocking
  • 8 Card slots 
  • 2 Quick-draw slots
  • Middle pocket can fit multiple cards/bills, fit's both dollars and euros with just one fold.

Timeline

  • Project ended on Kickstarter on May 4, 2017
  • Two week period to process funds and gather backer info
  • Production will start sometime in May
  • Shipping will begin in June/July, we must first ship our ~350 orders on Kickstarter.

Risks & Challenges

We understand the importance of challenges that can arise for us during or after our campaign. Crowdfunding can involve an element of risk. That being said, we have maintained a firm relationship with our manufacturing partners and they respect our take on quality control and delivering our wallets in a timely manner. Over the past year we've been constantly working with them to ensure that we don't run into any problems.
